description-fr_FR-print:
Les appareils Q20 et QF20 sont dotés de la fonction Switch Grip II. Cela vous permet non seulement de le tenir de la main gauche ou droite mais également de pouvoir filmer à la verticale vos moments émouvants ou hilarants, le tout dans une qualité HD exceptionnelle. Il est alors logique de vouloir partager ses vidéos, grâce au Wi-Fi cela devient possible ! Téléchargez-les sur vos réseaux sociaux préférés en vous connectant à un Hotpost ou depuis chez vous. Il n’a jamais été aussi facile de partagez et profitez de vidéos FULL HD1080p.
Filmez sous tous les angles avec Switch Grip II
Switch Grip II (Enregistrement vertical) 0°, 90°, 180° Une chose sur laquelle les droitiers et gauchers peuvent s’entendre, c’est que le caméscope compact Q20 / QF20 doté du Switch Grip II a été conçue pour tout le monde. Avec ce caméscope, peu importe de quelle main vous le tenez, l’écran LCD s’adapte automatiquement à l’angle de prise de vue. Vous trouvez ça plus confortable de filmer des sujets étroits à la verticale? Bonne nouvelle: vous pouvez faire pivoter l’écran LCD à 90 degrés et l’image restera à l’endroit. Enregistrer des vidéos depuis une position compliquée n’a jamais été aussi simple.
Partagez et sauvegardez instantanément. Simplement
Connectivité Wi-Fi Avec le Wi-Fi intégrer, vous pouvez partager vos moments les plus précieux tout en étant en voyage. Envoyez des photos directement sur Facebook™, Picasa™, Photobucket™ ou par email directement depuis votre caméscope. Vous pouvez envoyer directement vos vidéos sur YouTube et attendre les commentaires de vos amis. Le QF20 vous donne également la possibilité de télécharger vos données sur un service « Cloud ». Ainsi, vous n’aurez plus de problèmes de carte mémoire ou la peur de perdre vos données. La connexion avec un téléviseur en Wi-Fi direct vous permet de partager sur grand écran vos plus beaux moments. Enfin, vous pourrez sauvegarder vos vidéos et photos sur votre PC en un seul click grâce à la sauvegarde automatique. C’est aussi simple que ça, plus besoin de chercher son câble. * uniquement disponible sur le QF20.
Revivez vos aventures en vidéo Full HD
1920 x 1080 / 60p Pourquoi prendre juste des vidéos basiques quand vous pouvez enregistrer des vidéos Full HD? Avec une résolution de 1920 x 1080 60i, vous pouvez capturez tous les détails, le tout avec un respect des couleurs et de la lumière incomparable. Cela permet de garantir une perfection d'image sur votre téléviseur HD ou un moniteur HD, et une expérience visuelle exceptionnelle.
Enregistrer des vidéos au cœur de l’action avec le zoom optique x20
Zoom optique x20, zoom numérique x40 A la fois léger et compact, le Q20 / QF20 se glisse partout avec vous. Son objectif Schneider Kreuznach dote d’un zoom optique x20 and d’un zoom numérique x40 vous permets de capturer tous les détails de l’action même si vous êtes loin de la scène. Les détails sont aussi nets et claires que si vous étiez proche de l’action.
Mettez directement en favoris vos scènes préférées sur votre appareil avec « My clip »
My Clip Regardez vos moments préférés d’une sortie entre amis sans perdre de temps à naviguer dans toutes vos séquences vidéo enregistrées. La fonction « My Clip » vous permets de sélectionner n’importe quelle séquences vidéo et ainsi de les revoir les unes à la suite des autres sans interruption.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Samsung vous présente une nouvelle façon de prendre vos vidéos.
description-en_US-print: Shoot with either hand and share easily - Shoot using right or left hand with Switch Grip II; - Share and save photos wirelessly with built-in Wi-Fi; - Record in stunning 1920 x 1080 60i Full HD clarity; - Get closer to the action with 20x optical zoom. 0º, 90º, 180º - Enjoy a greater degree of flexibility with Switch Grip II One thing lefties and righties can agree on is that the streamlined and compact QF20 / Q20 with Switch Grip II was made for both. Because no matter in which hand it’s held, the camcorder’s LCD screen will adjust to ensure that the picture is shown right-side up. More comfortable shooting while holding the camcorder vertically? Good news: you can rotate the screen 90º, and the image will remain right-side up. Shooting video from difficult positions has never been easier. Instant Sharing & Saving, simply Wi-Fi Connectivity With built-in Wi-Fi capability, you can share any special and exciting videos on the move. Send videos by uploading to Facebook™, Picasa™, Photobucket™ or email directly from the camcorder. You can also upload them to YouTube™ then sit back and wait for the rave reviews. The QF20 also lets you upload to online cloud services so never worried about losing your videos while on the go or running out of memory. The TV Link feature allows you to wirelessly display videos on a Wi-Fi TV screen. You can also save them to your PC with just one click using the Auto Backup feature. No more searching for the cable – it’s that easy. Relive your adventures with Full HD Recording 1920 x 1080 / 60p Why shoot just video when you can shoot Full HD movies? With 1920x1080 60i resolution, you capture richly detailed images with vivid colour and intense clarity. This helps ensure picture perfection on your HDTV or Wi-Fi HD monitor, and a superb viewing experience for you. Presenting a new take on Full HD recording. The QF20 / Q20’s Switch Grip II function not only lets you hold the camcorder in either hand, it also allows for vertical recording so you’re always in perfect position to capture heartwarming moments and hilarious slipups in amazing HD. The QF20 also allows you to share your memories straight away, through its Wi-Fi capabilities, to your favourite online social networks and cloud services, from any Wi-Fi hotspot. It’s never been this easy to shoot and share Full HD 1080p video. My Clip Play back your favourite moments of a night out with friends or a hike through the woods without having to waste time fast-forwarding or rewinding. The My Clip feature allows you to tag any scene in your video, so you can instantly relive the most hilarious bits or amazing sights over and over again with no additional editing. 20x Optical zoom, 40x Digital-zoom Lightweight and compact, the QF20/Q20 goes wherever you go. It also features a Schneider-Kreuznach lens with 20x Optical Zoom (40x Digital Zoom) that puts you in the middle of the action, even when you’re far away. Capture a game-winning goal from the far end of the soccer field, or a band rocking out even from the back row. Details are as crisp and clear as if you were shooting from up close. OIS Duo Plus With OIS (Optical Image Stabiliser) Duo Plus, you can capture clear and steady video, even if you have a case of shaky hands. The QF20 / Q20 combines a built-in OIS with digital image stabilisation technology to prevent bumps, jolts, and shivers from blurring image quality. OIS Duo Plus also compensates for body movement that can occur while you’re moving around, or for the movement of the digital zoom. Smart BGM II (with My Music) Add a professional touch to your movies with Smart BGM II (with My Music).Select one of four preloaded classical pieces to add to your videos, or import your favourite songs from your PC’s music library by using Samsung’s Intelli-Studio. And if there’s talking in the scene, it won’t get drowned out - Smart BGM II automatically lowers the music, so you always hear whoever is speaking. Smart Auto No matter what time of day it is, no matter where you are, with Smart Auto you’re ready for nearly any shooting scenario. Automatically select from one of 11 preset modes - such as Night, Natural Green, Macro and Portrait - to instantly compensate for a variety of varying light conditions or image details. Never again miss shooting a spontaneous scene due to time-consuming setting adjustments. Art Time-lapse Recording Capture an event that takes place over the course of hours such the sun rising and setting and present it in a fraction of the time. Art Time-Lapse Recording captures still frames at preset intervals, then creates an HD file with the stills placed in sequential order. A variety of modes, including Night Time, Zooming, Panning and Reverse Playback, give you more creative options. Record Pause While shooting a video in Record Pause mode, it allows you to briefly pause the recording and then pick up right where you left off without creating a new file. This way you only have one file to work with and don’t have to merge files for editing, sharing or transferring. Shake It Next time you record a get-together, add some fun with Shake It. Just a couple of jostles of the camcorder can randomly add one of several different fun and artistic digital effects to a scene. Shake It even works in Playback Mode, when it will embed preloaded music into your clip. 2.7” Smart Touch LCD Change the way you look at things with the 2.7" QVGA Touch LCD (230k resolution). The large screen delivers clean, crisp images that are saturated with natural colour and deep, dynamic detail. And the size also makes the touchscreen easier to use to find the feature or content you’re looking for. 4.9M Still Photo While recording video and without interruption, you are able to capture still images (5.5 Megapixel) that are as vivid and vibrant as life itself.

description-fr_FR-print: Le caméscope intuitif LEGRIA HF R306 est équipé d'un zoom perfectionné 51x qui vous permettra de plonger au cœur de l'action dans une résolution Full HD à couper le souffle, et d'un stabilisateur d'image intelligent garantissant une image sans flou de bougé. Développez vos talents de réalisateur avec le mode Création de Scénarios. - Zoom perfectionné 51x ; capteur CMOS Full HD. - Stabilisateur d'image optique intelligent. - Création de Scénarios. - Filtres effet Cinéma ; fonction Touche Décoration. - Écran tactile de 7.5cm. - Mode Smart Auto, détection de visage. - Instantané vidéo. - Logement pour carte SDXC. - Enregistrez des vidéos à la volée dans une résolution Full HD à couper le souffle. Zoom perfectionné 51x ; capteur CMOS Full HD Un objectif vidéo authentique Canon HD avec zoom perfectionné 51x vous permet de capturer vos sujets, même éloignés, dans leurs moindres détails. Le capteur CMOS Full HD offre une véritable qualité HD et une excellente reproduction des couleurs même en basse lumière : vos vidéos auront fière allure sur votre téléviseur HD. Stabilisateur d'image optique intelligent Le stabilisateur d'image intelligent compense les effets de vibration comme aucun autre système. Il détecte automatiquement la scène et sélectionne parmi 4 modes les paramètres de stabilisateur d'image optique les mieux adaptés pour compenser le mouvement et éviter les flous de bougé. Il garantit une image vidéo nette et détaillée dans tous les cas de figure, vous permettant ainsi de porter toute votre attention sur la prise de vues. Création de Scénarios Utilisez le mode Création de Scénarios pour créer en toute simplicité des vidéos inoubliables et développer vos talents de réalisateur. Une fois le thème de votre séquence choisi, le mode Création de Scénarios vous fournit à l'écran des suggestions et des conseils de prise de vues qui vous permettront de réaliser des vidéos captivantes. Filtres effet Cinéma ; fonction Touche Décoration Libérez la créativité qui est en vous avec les filtres effet Cinéma. Faites votre choix parmi les 8 filtres de nuances de couleurs réglables pour enregistrer la scène de cinéma idéale. Avec la fonction Touche Décoration, ajoutez des effets amusants à vos vidéos en toute simplicité, sans ordinateur. Écrivez des messages directement sur l'écran tactile à l'aide du stylet, ajoutez des marques ou des animations actives, telles que des étoiles filantes, et associez plusieurs images. Le contrôle au bout des doigts Le fonctionnement est aisé grâce à l'écran LCD tactile haute résolution de 7.5cm (3 pouces) qui garantit un contrôle intuitif des paramètres et simplifie la lecture. Mode Smart Auto, détection de visage Enregistrez facilement des vidéos de haute qualité grâce au mode Smart Auto. La technologie de reconnaissance de scène intelligente sélectionne les paramètres appropriés parmi 38 modes scène ; il ne vous reste plus alors qu'à cadrer et à déclencher. La technologie de détection de visage optimise quant à elle les paramètres de prise de vues pour des portraits toujours réussis. Instantané vidéo Grâce au mode Instantané vidéo, la création de courtes vidéos amusantes à partager avec vos amis est un véritable jeu d'enfant et ne nécessite aucun ordinateur. Enregistrez des séquences vidéo de 2, 4 ou 8 secondes d'une simple pression sur la touche d'enregistrement, créez une liste de lecture, ajoutez de la musique et votre vidéo est prête. Logement pour carte SDXC Le caméscope LEGRIA HF R306 enregistre les vidéos Full HD directement sur carte mémoire SDXC, ce qui est idéal pour les partager. Et avec les différentes capacités de mémoire disponibles, vous pouvez enregistrer de longues heures de vidéo.
description-fr_FR-mobile: 3.28MP, 51x Zoom perfectionné, 32x Zoom optique, 1020x Zoom numérique, Capteur CMOS type 1/4.85, DIGIC DV III, Écran LCD tactile de 7.5cm (3 pouces), AVCHD/MP4, SDXC/SDHC/SD, HDMI, USB2.0, Composante Sortie, AV Sortie, noir
description-en_US-print: The effortless LEGRIA HF R306 has a 51x Advanced zoom to get you close to the action in stunning Full HD, while Intelligent IS keeps movies steady. Use Story Creator to develop your video skills. - 51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS. - Optical Intelligent IS. - Story Creator. - Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration. - 7.5cm touch screen. - Smart Auto, Face Detection. - Video Snapshot. - SDXC card slot. Capture stories on the go in stunning Full HD 51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS A genuine Canon HD video lens with 51x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Story Creator Use Story Creator to effortlessly create memorable movies and help develop your video skills. Choose a theme for your movie and Story Creator gives you on screen suggestions and shooting tips, so you can make captivating videos. Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 8 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration. Write messages straight on the Touch-screen with the Stylus Pen, add stamps or active animations like shooting stars and mix in still images. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of settings and simplifies playback. Smart Auto, Face Detection Effortlessly shoot high quality video with Smart Auto. Intelligent Scene Detection Technology selects the perfect settings from 38 scene modes – all you have to do is point and shoot, whilst Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots. Video Snapshot With Video Snapshot it’s easy to create fun, short movies to share with friends - without a PC. Capture 2, 4 or 8 second clips with just one touch of the record button, create a playlist, add music and your movie is ready. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF R306 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card and are ideal for sharing. Available in a range of sizes allowing you to capture hours of footage.
description-en_US-mobile: 3.28MP, 51x Advanced Zoom, 32x Optical Zoom, 1020x Digital Zoom, 1/4.85 type CMOS, DIGIC DV III, 7.5cm (3.0") Touchscreen LCD, AVCHD/MP4, SDXC/SDHC/SD, HDMI, USB2.0, Component Out, AV Out, black
name: Canon LEGRIA HF R306

description-en_US-print: The XM2's advanced technology delivers unrivalled image quality in its class The XM2 improves on the market leading and successful XM1 in a number of key areas. It comprises of a brand new 1/4" 470,000-pixel 3CCD increasing image quality. Not forgetting a new manual control in picture adjustments and shooting adjustments even for professional users. Technology The XM2 includes a new high-sensitivity 1/4” 470,000-pixel 3CCD for superb 540-line horizontal resolution and super low light performance. A new generation camera signalling processing LSI improves approximately 3dB in S/N ratio from the XM1. The result is an improvement in colour, low light performance, resolution and dynamic range. Pixel shift The XM2 is equipped with a pixel shift system that boosts both resolution and sensitivity and allows users to achieve superb picture quality results. Picture adjustments The following picture adjustments have been greatly improved in the XM2. - Colour gain adjustments, colour phase adjustments, sharpness adjustment and black level can be adjusted to desired value and up to 1 type of preset registration is possible. - Custom preset - after picture adjustments, settings can be stored as a custom - Slow shutter speed - XM2 can be set to slow shutter speeds to 1/6 of a second - Gain control - gain can now be increased up to a maximum of 18dB - Frame movie mode - frame mode can make progressive shooting at 25 fps. Footage with 1/50 slower shutter is very similar to fine cinema. - 16.9 guides - allows accurate 16.9 framing when shooting so that image can be cropped. Improved sound The XM2 supports a direction-accurate stereo microphone that includes two non-directional microphones to give more precise stereo reproduction. Users can choose three types of frequency characteristics for the built-in microphone: normal, voice and wide-screen mode. Additionally, a 2-channel manual audio level control where input level can be adjusted by a special dial and L/R level can be set for 2 channels. Audio-level meter with right-and-left independent 24-segment peak holder and the audio-level meter can be displayed in LCD and EVF. An optional MA -300 microphone adapter allows the simultaneous recording of 2 independent channels from microphones with XLR connections. A BNC picture Out Terminal is also present. PC connectivity The XM2 is equipped with a DV terminal for non-linear editing. By using a USB terminal, transmission of still images from a JPEG file to a PC is easy.
name: Canon Digital IXUS XM2

description-fr_FR-print: Caméscope compact doté d'un zoom puissant et d'une connectivité Wi-Fi pour des créations et une connexion en toute liberté Compact et léger, le LEGRIA HF R38 vous permet de partager vos créations en toute liberté grâce à sa connectivité Wi-Fi intégrée. Rapprochez-vous de vos sujets en Full HD grâce au zoom perfectionné 51x tout en bénéficiant d'une image stable grâce au stabilisateur d'image optique intelligent. - Connectivité Wi-Fi avec prise en charge MP4 - Zoom perfectionné 51x ; capteur CMOS Full HD - Stabilisateur d'image optique intelligent - Création de Scénarios - Filtres effet Cinéma ; fonction Touche Décoration - Stockage direct sur disque dur externe - Écran tactile de 7,5 cm - Mode Smart Auto, détection de visage - Conversion HD-SD - Mémoire de 32 Go ; logement pour carte SDXC Connectivité Wi-Fi avec prise en charge MP4 Sa connectivité Wi-Fi intégrée vous permet de partager vos créations en toute simplicité sur vos réseaux sociaux et de regarder vos vidéos sur des périphériques iOS et des téléviseurs certifiés DNLA. La prise en charge du format MP4 garantit une vitesse de transfert rapide pour les vidéos HD. Zoom perfectionné 51x ; capteur CMOS Full HD Un objectif vidéo authentique Canon HD avec zoom perfectionné 51x vous permet de capturer vos sujets, même éloignés, dans leurs moindres détails. Le capteur CMOS Full HD offre une véritable qualité HD et une excellente reproduction des couleurs même en basse lumière : vos vidéos auront fière allure sur votre téléviseur HD. Stabilisateur d'image optique intelligent Le stabilisateur d'image intelligent compense les effets de vibration comme aucun autre système. Il détecte automatiquement la scène et sélectionne parmi 4 modes les paramètres de stabilisateur d'image optique les mieux adaptés pour compenser le mouvement et éviter les flous de bougé. Il garantit une image vidéo nette et détaillée dans tous les cas de figure, vous permettant ainsi de porter toute votre attention sur la prise de vues. Création de Scénarios Utilisez le mode Création de Scénarios pour créer en toute simplicité des vidéos inoubliables et développer vos talents de réalisateur. Une fois le thème de votre séquence choisi, le mode Création de Scénarios vous fournit à l'écran des suggestions et des conseils de prise de vues qui vous permettront de réaliser des vidéos captivantes. Filtres effet Cinéma ; fonction Touche Décoration Exprimez votre créativité avec les filtres effet Cinéma. Choisissez l'un des 8 filtres de nuances de couleurs réglables pour obtenir la scène de cinéma idéale. Avec la fonction Touche Décoration, ajoutez des effets amusants à vos vidéos en toute simplicité, sans ordinateur. Stockage direct sur disque dur externe Copiez des vidéos directement à partir de la mémoire intégrée ou du logement pour carte SDXC vers un disque dur externe. Accédez aux options de stockage rapidement et en toute simplicité à partir des menus conviviaux à l'écran. Le contrôle au bout des doigts Le fonctionnement est aisé grâce à l'écran LCD tactile haute résolution de 7,5 cm (3 pouces), qui garantit un contrôle intuitif des paramètres et simplifie la lecture. Mode Smart Auto, détection de visage Enregistrez facilement des vidéos de haute qualité grâce au mode Smart Auto. La technologie de reconnaissance de scène intelligente sélectionne les paramètres appropriés parmi 38 modes scène ; il ne vous reste plus alors qu'à cadrer et à déclencher. La technologie de détection de visage optimise quant à elle les paramètres de prise de vues pour des portraits toujours réussis. Conversion HD-SD Convertissez, depuis le caméscope, des vidéos du format HD à SD pour un partage et un téléchargement sur Internet faciles. Double mémoire Flash de 32 Go ; logement pour carte SDXC Une double mémoire flash de 32 Go vous permet de stocker plus de 12 heures de vidéo sur la mémoire intégrée. Le logement pour carte SDXC permet une durée d'enregistrement encore plus longue.
description-fr_FR-mobile: LEGRIA HF R38 - 2.07 MP, 1/4.85 CMOS, 51x Zoom, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") LCD, 32GB, SDXC, Wi-Fi, HDMI mini, Noir
description-en_US-print: The freedom to create and connect: a small camcorder with a big zoom and Wi-Fi The compact and lightweight LEGRIA HF R38 gives you the freedom to share with in-built Wi-Fi. Get closer in Full HD with the 51x Advanced zoom while optical Intelligent IS ensures steady footage. - Wi-Fi with MP4 support - 51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS - Optical Intelligent IS - Story Creator - Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration - Store direct to external HDD - 7.5cm touch screen - Smart Auto, Face Detection - HD-SD conversion - 32GB memory, SDXC card slot Wi-Fi with MP4 support In-built Wi-Fi lets you effortlessly share your creations to social networking sites and view your videos on DNLA certified TVs and iOS devices. Support for MP4 format ensures quick transfer times of HD movies. 51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS A genuine Canon HD video lens with 51x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Story Creator Use Story Creator to effortlessly create memorable movies and help develop your video skills. Choose a theme for your movie and Story Creator gives you on screen suggestions and shooting tips, so you can make captivating videos. Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 8 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration. Store direct to external HDD Copy movies direct from the inbuilt memory or SDXC card slot to an external hard drive. Just follow the simple on-screen menus for quick and easy storage. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of settings and simplifies playback. Smart Auto, Face Detection Effortlessly shoot high quality video with Smart Auto. Intelligent Scene Detection Technology selects the perfect settings from 38 scene modes – all you have to do is point and shoot, whilst Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots. HD-SD conversion Convert movies from HD to SD in camera for really easy sharing and web uploading. 32GB Dual Flash memory, SDXC card slot A 32GB Dual Flash memory lets you store over 12 hours of movies to the built-in memory. Record even longer with the SDXC card slot.
description-en_US-mobile: LEGRIA HF R38 - 2.07 MP, 1/4.85 CMOS, 51x Zoom, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") LCD, 32GB, SDXC, Wi-Fi, HDMI mini, Black
name: Canon LEGRIA HF R38

- Stabilisateur d'image optique intelligent

- Conversion HD-SD
- Mémoire de 8 Go ; logement pour carte SDXC

description-fr_FR-print: Partagez vos créations vidéo exceptionnelles via le Wi-Fi Créez et partagez en toute simplicité des vidéos de qualité professionnelle grâce à la connectivité Wi-Fi du LEGRIA HF M52. Le capteur HD CMOS PRO garantit de superbes images même en basse lumière, tandis que le stabilisateur d'image intelligent compense les effets de vibration. - Connectivité Wi-Fi avec prise en charge MP4 - Capteur Canon HD CMOS PRO - Stabilisateur d'image optique intelligent - Fonction « Audio Scene Select » - Objectif vidéo HD avec zoom 10x, diaphragme à iris - Stockage direct sur disque dur externe - Mémoire de 32 Go ; logement pour carte SDXC - Fonctions Cinéma créatives - Écran tactile de 7,5 cm - Mode Smart Auto, détection de visage, AF instantané Connectivité Wi-Fi avec prise en charge MP4 Sa connectivité Wi-Fi intégrée vous permet de partager vos créations en toute simplicité sur vos réseaux sociaux et de regarder vos vidéos sur des périphériques iOS et des téléviseurs certifiés DNLA. La prise en charge du format MP4 garantit une vitesse de transfert rapide pour les vidéos HD. Capteur Canon HD CMOS PRO Le capteur Canon HD CMOS PRO est spécialement conçu par Canon pour ses caméscopes professionnels. La zone d'acquisition de lumière est 160 % plus grande que sur un capteur CMOS classique, pour une plage dynamique plus large et des performances optimales en basse lumière. Stabilisateur d'image optique intelligent Le stabilisateur d'image intelligent compense les effets de vibration comme aucun autre système. Il détecte automatiquement la scène et sélectionne parmi 4 modes les paramètres de stabilisateur d'image optique les mieux adaptés pour compenser le mouvement et éviter les flous de bougé. Il garantit une image vidéo nette et détaillée dans tous les cas de figure, vous permettant ainsi de porter toute votre attention sur la prise de vues. Fonction « Audio Scene Select » Réaliser des vidéos de qualité exceptionnelle tant sur le plan sonore que visuel est un jeu d'enfant grâce à la fonction « Audio Scene Select » et un microphone zoom intégré de haute qualité. Faites votre choix parmi 5 modes scène pour bénéficier de paramètres audio automatiquement optimisés. Objectif vidéo Canon HD Un objectif vidéo Canon HD haute qualité avec zoom optique 10x propose un diaphragme à iris permettant d'obtenir des flous d'arrière-plan esthétiques. Stockage direct sur disque dur externe Copiez des vidéos directement à partir de la mémoire intégrée ou du logement pour carte SDXC vers un disque dur externe. Accédez aux options de stockage en toute simplicité à partir des menus conviviaux à l'écran. Mémoire de 32 Go ; logement pour carte SDXC Une double mémoire flash de 32 Go vous permet de stocker plus de 12 heures de vidéo sur la mémoire intégrée. Le logement pour carte SDXC permet une durée d'enregistrement encore plus longue. Fonctions Cinéma créatives Développez vos talents de réalisateur avec le mode Création de Scénarios et créez sans le moindre effort de courtes vidéos qui racontent une histoire. Il vous suffit pour cela de sélectionner un thème et de suivre les suggestions de scène intégrées. Exprimez votre créativité avec les filtres effet Cinéma et ajoutez des effets amusants à vos vidéos sans ordinateur grâce à la Touche Décoration. Le contrôle au bout des doigts Le fonctionnement est aisé grâce à l'écran LCD tactile haute résolution de 7,5 cm (3 pouces) qui garanti un contrôle intuitif des paramètres et simplifie la lecture. Prise de vues aisée La réalisation de vidéos haute qualité est un jeu d'enfant grâce au mode Smart Auto. Entièrement automatique, il sélectionne de manière intelligente les paramètres de prise de vues parmi 38 scènes. La fonction de détection de visage optimise les paramètres pour des portraits parfaits et l'AF instantané garantit une mise au point rapide et précise.
description-fr_FR-mobile: LEGRIA HF M52 - 2.07MP, 1/3 HD CMOS Pro, Full HD, 10x Zoom, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") , 32GB, SDXC, HDMI mini, Wi-Fi, Noir
description-en_US-print: Share exceptional movie creations with Wi-Fi Effortlessly create and share professional quality video with the Wi-Fi enabled LEGRIA HF M52. An HD CMOS PRO sensor ensures superb images even in low light while Intelligent IS combats camera shake. - Wi-Fi with MP4 support - Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor - Optical Intelligent IS - Audio Scene Select - 10x HD Video lens, iris diaphragm - Store direct to external HDD - 32GB memory, SDXC slot - Creative cinematic features - 7.5cm touch screen - Smart Auto, Face Detection, Instant AF Wi-Fi with MP4 support In-built Wi-Fi lets you effortlessly share your creations to social networking sites and view your videos on DNLA certified TVs and iOS devices. Support for MP4 format ensures quick transfer times of HD movies. Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor The HD CMOS PRO sensor is designed and made by Canon for its professional camcorders. The light gathering area of the pixels is 160% bigger than conventional CMOS sensors, delivering a wider dynamic range and advanced low-light performance. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Audio Scene Select It’s simple to make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select and a high-sensitivity, built-in zoom microphone. Just select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically. Canon HD Video lens A high-quality, Canon HD Video lens with 10x optical zoom features an iris diaphragm for soft background blurring. Store direct to external HDD Copy movies direct from the inbuilt memory or SDXC card slot to an external hard drive. Just follow the easy on-screen menus for simple storage. 32GB memory, SDXC card slot A 32GB Dual Flash memory lets you store over 12 hours of movies to the built-in memory. Record even longer with the SDXC card slot. Creative cinematic features Use Story Creator to develop your video skills and effortlessly create memorable short videos with a story - just choose a theme and follow the in-built scene suggestions. Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters and add fun effects to your movies without a PC using Touch Decoration. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of shooting and playback functions. Effortless shooting Creating high-quality movies is effortless with Smart Auto. Fully automatic, it intelligently selects shooting settings from 38 scenes. Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots and Instant AF ensures fast and accurate focusing.
description-en_US-mobile: LEGRIA HF M52 - 2.07MP, 1/3 HD CMOS Pro, Full HD, 10x Zoom, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") , 32GB, SDXC, HDMI mini, Wi-Fi, Black
name: Canon LEGRIA HF M52

Il vous suffit pour cela de sélectionner un thème et de suivre les suggestions de scène intégrées. Écrivez des messages directement sur l'écran tactile à l'aide du stylet, ajoutez des marques ou des animations actives, telles que des étoiles filantes, et associez plusieurs images. Disponible dans une large gamme de capacités de mémoire, cette carte compacte est un support idéal pour le partage.

description-en_US-print: Exceptional video quality for every occasion The LEGRIA HF M506 delivers professional quality video with ease whatever the occasion. Featuring Canon’s HD CMOS PRO sensor and Audio Scene Select movies look and sound superb. - Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor - Optical Intelligent IS - Audio Scene Select - 10x HD Video lens, iris diaphragm - Creative cinematic features - 7.5cm intuitive touch screen - Smart Auto (38 scenes), Face Detection, Instant AF - SDXC card slot Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor The HD CMOS PRO sensor is designed and made by Canon for its professional camcorders. The light gathering area of the pixels is 160% bigger than conventional CMOS sensors, delivering a wider dynamic range and advanced low-light performance. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Audio Scene Select It’s simple to make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select and a high-sensitivity, built-in zoom microphone.. Just select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically. Canon HD Video lens A high-quality, Canon HD Video lens with 10x optical zoom features an iris diaphragm for soft background blurring. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of shooting and playback functions. Effortless shooting Creating high-quality movies is effortless with Smart Auto. Fully automatic, it intelligently selects shooting settings from 38 scenes – leaving you free to concentrate on your subject. Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots and Instant AF ensures fast and accurate focusing. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF M506 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card. Available in a wide range of sizes, the cards are easy to carry and ideal for sharing.

description-en_US-print: THE PLEASURE OF FULL HD\n\nExperience an intuitive user interface: 3 inch touch display to capture your stories and highlights in 1080 resolution. You can directly connect it to any standard TV or HD TV via mini HDMI! With its very slim design, your CAMILEO P25 camcorder is always ready to go: shoot your emotions in Full HD!

description-fr_FR-print: Connectivité Wi-Fi avec prise en charge MP4 Sa connectivité Wi-Fi intégrée vous permet de partager vos créations en toute simplicité sur vos réseaux sociaux et de regarder vos vidéos sur des périphériques iOS et des téléviseurs certifiés DNLA. La prise en charge du format MP4 garantit une vitesse de transfert rapide pour les vidéos HD. Zoom perfectionné 51x ; capteur CMOS Full HD Un objectif vidéo authentique Canon HD avec zoom perfectionné 51x vous permet de capturer vos sujets, même éloignés, dans leurs moindres détails. Le capteur CMOS Full HD offre une excellente reproduction des couleurs même en basse lumière : vos vidéos auront fière allure sur votre téléviseur HD. Stabilisateur d'image optique intelligent Le stabilisateur d'image intelligent compense les effets de vibration comme aucun autre système. Il détecte automatiquement la scène et sélectionne parmi 4 modes les paramètres de stabilisateur d'image optique les mieux adaptés pour compenser le mouvement et éviter les flous de bougé. Il garantit une image vidéo nette et détaillée dans tous les cas de figure, vous permettant ainsi de porter toute votre attention sur la prise de vues. Création de Scénarios Utilisez le mode Création de Scénarios pour créer en toute simplicité des vidéos inoubliables et développer vos talents de réalisateur. Une fois le thème de votre séquence choisi, le mode Création de Scénarios vous fournit à l'écran des suggestions et des conseils de prise de vues qui vous permettront de réaliser des vidéos captivantes. Filtres effet Cinéma ; fonction Touche Décoration Exprimez votre créativité avec les filtres effet Cinéma. Choisissez l'un des 8 filtres de nuances de couleurs réglables pour obtenir la scène de cinéma idéale. Avec la fonction Touche Décoration, ajoutez des effets amusants à vos vidéos en toute simplicité, sans ordinateur. Stockage direct sur disque dur externe Copiez des vidéos directement à partir de la mémoire intégrée ou du logement pour carte SDXC vers un disque dur externe. Accédez aux options de stockage rapidement et en toute simplicité à partir des menus conviviaux à l'écran. Le contrôle au bout des doigts Le fonctionnement est aisé grâce à l'écran LCD tactile haute résolution de 7,5 cm (3 pouces) qui garantit un contrôle intuitif des paramètres et simplifie la lecture. Mode Smart Auto, détection de visage Enregistrez facilement des vidéos de haute qualité grâce au mode Smart Auto. La technologie de reconnaissance de scène intelligente sélectionne les paramètres appropriés parmi 38 modes scène ; il ne vous reste plus alors qu'à cadrer et à déclencher. La technologie de détection de visage optimise quant à elle les paramètres de prise de vues pour des portraits toujours réussis. Conversion HD-SD Convertissez, depuis le caméscope, des vidéos du format HD à SD pour un partage et un téléchargement sur Internet faciles. Double mémoire Flash de 8 Go ; logement pour carte SDXC Une double mémoire Flash intégrée de 8 Go vous permet de stocker plus de 3 heures de vidéo Full HD. Le logement pour carte SDXC permet une durée d'enregistrement encore plus longue.

description-en_US-print: Canon XA10 Professional HD video in the palm of your hand The innovative XA10 AVCHD camcorder packs Canon professional technology into an ultra-compact body. Exceptional functionality and versatility ensures outstanding video and audio performance. - Canon HD Video Lens (10x zoom, 30.4mm, F1.8); - Canon HD CMOS Pro sensor; - Professional audio; - AVCHD video to 64GB memory or 2x SDXC slots; - IR shooting mode; - Full manual control; - 8.8cm LCD; 0.6cm EVF; - Dynamic OIS, Powered IS, Instant AF; - Versatile and expandable. Canon HD Video Lens A fast, wide-angle, Canon HD Video lens (30.4mm, F1.8) brings professional image quality to a compact camcorder. Features a shockless, variable speed 10x optical zoom and 8-blade iris for more attractive bokeh effect. 1/3 type HD CMOS Pro sensor An HD CMOS Pro sensor – originally designed and manufactured by Canon for its professional camcorders - captures Full HD at native 1920x1080 resolution. With a pixel size 2.6x bigger than conventional CMOS sensors, it delivers a wider dynamic range and higher sensitivity. Professional audio Professional audio options include 2x XLR inputs, a 3.5mm microphone input jack and a built-in, low-noise microphone. Audio is recorded in 2ch Dolby Digital format using any combination of inputs. 64GB memory plus 2x SDXC slots The XA10 records Full HD AVCHD video at up to 24Mbps to 64GB of built-in flash memory. Relay Recording across 2x SDXC memory card slots allows for continuous filming. Double slot recording allows the same footage to be stored simultaneously on two cards. Infrared shooting mode The XA10 offers infrared (IR) recording in Full HD resolution, for night or low light shooting. Green and white colour options are available to suit the style of your project. Unique Canon lens coatings and a built-in diffuser ensure clear, sharp pictures throughout the frame. An IR lamp is built into the camcorder handle. Full manual control A manual lens ring allows intuitive control of focus. Full manual control of exposure, aperture, shutter speed and gain is possible via the Touch-screen LCD. A custom key and control dial put you in complete control of your creativity. 8.8cm LCD; 0.6cm EVF A large side-mounted 8.8cm (3.5”) Touch-screen LCD with a sharp, 920K dot resolution provides excellent monitoring capability. A waveform monitor and Focus Assist functions make it easy to frame your shot. A 0.61cm (0.24”) 260K dot EVF is also included. Dynamic OIS, Powered IS, Instant AF Canon’s advanced Dynamic Optical Image Stabilisation system with Powered IS mode ensures shake-free video. Instant AF means pin-sharp focus for every shot. Versatile and expandable The ultra compact XA10 is a versatile and expandable camera system – adaptable for use in any situation. The handle is detachable for use in tight spaces and has a stop/start button and zoom level control. A lens filter thread and accessory shoe are also included.
description-en_US-mobile: XA10 - 2.07Mp 1/3" CMOS, Digital Zoom 2x, 1920 x 1080, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") LCD, 3.5mm, 775g, Black
name: Canon XA 10

description-en_US-print:
Share your stories effortlessly with Wi-Fi
It’s easy to get close to the action in superb Full HD with the compact LEGRIA HF R36. Share your creations effortlessly with Wi-Fi and enjoy steady footage with Intelligent IS.

Wi-Fi with MP4 support
In-built Wi-Fi lets you effortlessly share your creations to social networking sites and view your videos on DNLA certified TVs and iOS devices. Support for MP4 format ensures quick transfer times of HD movies.

51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS
A genuine Canon HD video lens with 51x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV.

Optical Intelligent IS
Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting.

Story Creator
Use Story Creator to effortlessly create memorable movies and help develop your video skills. Choose a theme for your movie and Story Creator gives you on screen suggestions and shooting tips, so you can make captivating videos.

Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration
Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 8 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration.

Store direct to external HDD
Copy movies direct from the inbuilt memory or SDXC card slot to an external hard drive. Just follow the simple on-screen menus for quick and easy storage.

Fingertip control
Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of settings and simplifies playback.

Smart Auto, Face Detection
Effortlessly shoot high quality video with Smart Auto. Intelligent Scene Detection Technology selects the perfect settings from 38 scene modes – all you have to do is point and shoot, whilst Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots.

HD-SD conversion
Convert movies from HD to SD in camera for really easy sharing and web uploading.

8GB Dual Flash memory, SDXC card slot
An in-built 8GB Dual Flash memory lets you store over 3 hours of Full HD movies. Record even longer with the SDXC card slot.

name: Canon LEGRIA HF R36

description-fr_FR-print: Avec la caméra Philips ESee CAM200, les photos et vidéos n'ont jamais été aussi simples à prendre et à partager. Faites glisser votre doigt sur l'écran 3 pouces pour les envoyer instantanément par liaison sans fil vers le téléviseur ou Internet.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Vos grands moments sur le téléviseur ou sur le Web, simplement grâce au Wi-Fi intégré
description-en_US-print: Simply swipe your great moments on TV or the Web via built-in WiFi The Philips ESee CAM200 lets you take videos and photos with ease, and brings sharing to a whole new level of simplicity. Swipe on the 3" touchscreen to share your shots on TV or the Internet - instantly, wirelessly. Take quick and easy videos in full HD quality - Relive memories in great detail with full HD videos - Up to 10 megapixel resolution for high quality photos - 3" touch-screen for smooth and intuitive control - Shoot clearer and steadier videos with advanced anti-shake - Flash, auto focus, face & smile detection Swipe to share your favorite moments wirelessly - Built-in Wi-Fi for sharing without wires or PC - Swipe to share videos or photos on TV - Direct Wi-Fi upload to Facebook, YouTube, Twitter without PC - Wirelessly save your videos & photos on your computer - Go Live for wireless video broadcast to website via UStream Bring it with you anywhere - Small and slim design to fit easily into your pocket - Extra long battery life lets you shoot more

description-de_DE-print: Der neue spritzwassergeschützte CAMILEO CLIP Full HD Minicamcorder ist der perfekte Outdoor-Begleiter: Klipsen Sie ihn einfach an Ihre Jacke und nehmen Sie die Action auf, wenn Sie mittendrin sind. Mit nur 85 g Gewicht und kaum größer als eine Scheckkarte ist der CAMILEO CLIP nicht nur überaus handlich, sondern auch schnell und einfach zu bedienen. Ein 5MP-CMOS-Sensor mit BSI-Technologie fängt Ihre aufregendsten Abenteuer in Full HD und brillanten Farben ein - auch wenn die Lichtbedingungen nicht optimal sind. Hauptfunktionen - 1080p Full-HD-Grafikauflösung - Digitaler H.264 HD-Camcorder - Anklipsfunktion - 5MP CMOS-Sensor (bis zu 16MP-Fotos) - BSI-Sensortechnologie - 1,5" (3,8 cm) LCD - 10-facher digitaler Zoom - Electronic Image Stabiliser (EIS) - HDMI- und USB-Anschluss - Unterstützt Micro-SD / SDHC / SDXC - Webcam und Sprachaufnahme - Robustes Design - Spritzwassergeschützt (IPX-2) - Videobearbeitungsfunktion - CAMILEO Uploader
description-de_DE-mobile: 1080p Full HD, H.264 HD, 5MP CMOS, 128MB, micro SD/SDHC/SDXC, 85g, Rot
name: Toshiba Camileo Clip Hot Red

description-en_US-print:
Share your stories effortlessly with Wi-Fi
It’s easy to get close to the action in superb Full HD with the compact LEGRIA HF R36. Share your creations effortlessly with Wi-Fi and enjoy steady footage with Intelligent IS.

Wi-Fi with MP4 support
In-built Wi-Fi lets you effortlessly share your creations to social networking sites and view your videos on DNLA certified TVs and iOS devices. Support for MP4 format ensures quick transfer times of HD movies.

51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS
A genuine Canon HD video lens with 51x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV.

Optical Intelligent IS
Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting.

Story Creator
Use Story Creator to effortlessly create memorable movies and help develop your video skills. Choose a theme for your movie and Story Creator gives you on screen suggestions and shooting tips, so you can make captivating videos.

Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration
Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 8 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration.

Store direct to external HDD
Copy movies direct from the inbuilt memory or SDXC card slot to an external hard drive. Just follow the simple on-screen menus for quick and easy storage.

Fingertip control
Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of settings and simplifies playback.

Smart Auto, Face Detection
Effortlessly shoot high quality video with Smart Auto. Intelligent Scene Detection Technology selects the perfect settings from 38 scene modes – all you have to do is point and shoot, whilst Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots.

HD-SD conversion
Convert movies from HD to SD in camera for really easy sharing and web uploading.

8GB Dual Flash memory, SDXC card slot
An in-built 8GB Dual Flash memory lets you store over 3 hours of Full HD movies. Record even longer with the SDXC card slot.

name: Canon LEGRIA HF R36

description-en_US-print: Canon LEGRIA HF R306 Capture stories on the go in stunning Full HD The effortless LEGRIA HF R306 has a 51x Advanced zoom to get you close to the action in stunning Full HD, while Intelligent IS keeps movies steady. Use Story Creator to develop your video skills. 51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS A genuine Canon HD video lens with 51x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Story Creator Use Story Creator to effortlessly create memorable movies and help develop your video skills. Choose a theme for your movie and Story Creator gives you on screen suggestions and shooting tips, so you can make captivating videos. Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 8 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration. Write messages straight on the Touch-screen with the Stylus Pen, add stamps or active animations like shooting stars and mix in still images. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of settings and simplifies playback. Smart Auto, Face Detection Effortlessly shoot high quality video with Smart Auto. Intelligent Scene Detection Technology selects the perfect settings from 38 scene modes – all you have to do is point and shoot, whilst Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots. Video Snapshot With Video Snapshot it’s easy to create fun, short movies to share with friends - without a PC. Capture 2, 4 or 8 second clips with just one touch of the record button, create a playlist, add music and your movie is ready. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF R306 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card and are ideal for sharing. Available in a range of sizes allowing you to capture hours of footage.

Le CAMILEO CLIP ne pèse que 85 g et n'est pas plus grand qu'une carte de visite. Vous serez surpris par sa légèreté, mais également pas sa simplicité d'utilisation. Le capteur CMOS de 5 mégapixels avec technologie BSI enregistre vos aventures les plus palpitantes en qualité Full HD et avec des couleurs vives, même lorsque l'éclairage n'est pas optimal. description-en_US-print: Share exceptional movie creations with Wi-Fi Effortlessly create and share professional quality video with the Wi-Fi enabled LEGRIA HF M52. An HD CMOS PRO sensor ensures superb images even in low light while Intelligent IS combats camera shake. - Wi-Fi with MP4 support. - Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor. - Optical Intelligent IS. - Audio Scene Select. - 10x HD Video lens, iris diaphragm. - Store direct to external HDD. - 32GB memory, SDXC slot. - Creative cinematic features. - 7.5cm touch screen. - Smart Auto, Face Detection, Instant AF. Wi-Fi with MP4 support In-built Wi-Fi lets you effortlessly share your creations to social networking sites and view your videos on DNLA certified TVs and iOS devices. Support for MP4 format ensures quick transfer times of HD movies. Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor The HD CMOS PRO sensor is designed and made by Canon for its professional camcorders. The light gathering area of the pixels is 160% bigger than conventional CMOS sensors, delivering a wider dynamic range and advanced low-light performance. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Audio Scene Select It’s simple to make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select and a high-sensitivity, built-in zoom microphone. Just select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically. Canon HD Video lens A high-quality, Canon HD Video lens with 10x optical zoom features an iris diaphragm for soft background blurring. Store direct to external HDD Copy movies direct from the inbuilt memory or SDXC card slot to an external hard drive. Just follow the easy on-screen menus for simple storage. 32GB memory, SDXC card slot A 32GB Dual Flash memory lets you store over 12 hours of movies to the built-in memory. Record even longer with the SDXC card slot. Creative cinematic features Use Story Creator to develop your video skills and effortlessly create memorable short videos with a story - just choose a theme and follow the in-built scene suggestions. Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters and add fun effects to your movies without a PC using Touch Decoration. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of shooting and playback functions. Effortless shooting Creating high-quality movies is effortless with Smart Auto. Fully automatic, it intelligently selects shooting settings from 38 scenes. Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots and Instant AF ensures fast and accurate focusing.

Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. description-en_US-print:
Simple, affordable, fun. Widely-available DV tape makes a great choice if you're into editing your own shots. Handycam® quality video with super power 40x Carl Zeiss lens. Easy to use touchscreen LCD and long 14 hour battery life for extended shooting.

- Standard Definition video recording on affordable DV tape 
800k pixel CCD sensor 
- Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens with 40x optical zoom / 2000x digital zoom 
- Super SteadyShot for improved still image and video stability, especially in low light 
- 2.5” LCD touchscreen 
- Colour viewfinder 
- Start / Stop and Zoom buttons on LCD screen frame 
- Up to 14 hours STAMINA continuous shooting time (with optional battery) 
- DV (i.LINK) connection for video editing with connected PC (output only) 
- USB streaming for webcam use 
- Fun, easy to use Picture Motion Browser software with web upload assist function
description-en_US-mobile: DCR-HC53 MiniDV, 40x optical zoom / 2000x digital zoom, USB streaming
description-de_DE-print:
- Videoaufnahmen in Standard Definition-Qualität auf günstigen DV-Bändern
- CCD-Sensor mit 800.000 Pixeln
- Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar Objektiv mit optischem 40fach-Zoom und digitalem 2000fach-Zoom
- SteadyShot INSIDE für bessere Videostabilität, insbesondere bei niedriger Belichtung
- 2,5" großer LCD-Touchscreen
- Farbsucher
- Start-/Stopp- und Zoom-Taste am LC-Display-Rahmen
- Dank STAMINA Akku bis zu 14 Stunden fortlaufende Aufnahmezeit (mit optionalem Akku)
- DV-Verbindung (i.LINK) für die Videobearbeitung auf einem angeschlossenen PC (nur Ausgang)
- USB-Streaming für den Einsatz einer Webcam
- Benutzerfreundliche Picture Motion Browser-Software mit Internet-Upload-Assistenten.
description-de_DE-mobile: DCR-HC53 - Mini-DV, 40x opt., USB, 8MP, 1/6" CCD, 6.35 cm (2.5 ") LCD
name: Sony DCR-HC53

description-fr_FR-print:
- Jusqu'à 27 heures d'enregistrement en définition standard sur un disque dur de 40 Go
- Enregistrement HYBRID sur Memory Stick™ en option pour un partage aisé
- Capteur CCD de 1 mégapixel
- Objectif Carl Zeiss® Vario-Tessar® avec zoom optique 25x / zoom numérique 2000x
- Stabilisateur Super SteadyShot pour une meilleure stabilité des images et de la vidéo, notamment en cas de faible luminosité
- Enregistrement d'images fixes de 1 mégapixel sur Memory Stick™ amovible
- Grand écran tactile LCD hybride 2,7”
- Bouton « Quick on » pour un démarrage rapide depuis le mode sommeil
- Index des visages et « Film Roll » pour des recherches simples et rapides
- Microphone zoom pour une meilleure directivité sonore
- STAMINA : autonomie pouvant atteindre jusqu'à 9 heures en continu (avec batterie en option)
- Bouton de gravure DVD directe et sauvegarde facile sur PC via la connexion USB 2.0 haut débit (sortie uniquement) avec la station Handycam fournie
- Logiciel Picture Motion Browser amusant et facile à utiliser, avec fonction d'aide de chargement sur le Web.
description-en_US-print: DCR-SR55E Shoot up to 27 hours of megapixel quality video and still photos, with no need to carry tapes or discs. Powerful 25x Carl Zeiss lens. Built-in zoom microphone automatically links sound to image zoom, plus Face Index and Film Roll Index for easy browsing. - Up to 27 hr of high quality Standard Definition recording on 40GB hard drive - HYBRID recording on optional Memory Stick for easy sharing 1 megapixel CCD sensor - Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens with 25x optical zoom / 2000x digital zoom - Super SteadyShot for improved still image and video stability, especially in low light - 1 megapixel still image recording onto removable Memory Stick 2.7” Wide Hybrid LCD touchscreen - Quick ON button for fast start-up from sleep mode - Face Index and Film Roll Index for quick, easy searches - Zoom microphone for clearer dialogue and sound of foreground subjects - Up to 9 hours STAMINA continuous shooting time (with optional battery) - One Touch Disc Burn and Easy PC back up via USB 2.0 High speed connection (output only) with supplied Handycam Station - Fun, easy to use Picture Motion Browser software with web upload assist function
description-en_US-mobile: DCR-SR55E HDD 40GB 27h 1.07Mpix 2.7
description-de_DE-print:
- 40-GB-Festplatte mit bis zu 27 Stunden Aufnahmezeit in hoher SD-Qualität
- HYBRID-Aufnahme auf einen optionalen Memory Stick zur leichteren Weitergabe der Videodaten
- CCD-Sensor mit 1 Mio. Pixel
- Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar Objektiv mit optischem 25fach-Zoom und digitalem 2000fach-Zoom
- Super SteadyShot für bessere Standbilder und mehr Videostabilität, insbesondere bei niedriger Belichtung
- Standbilder können mit einer Auflösung von 1 Mio. Pixel auf den abnehmbaren Memory Stick aufgenommen werden
- 2,7" großer Hybrid-LCD-Touchscreen im Breitbildformat
- Quick ON Taste für Schnellstart aus dem Energiesparmodus
- Face Index und Film Roll Index erleichtern die Suche
- Zoom-Mikrofon für klare Dialoge und Vordergrundgeräusche
- Der STAMINA Akku bietet bis zu 9 Stunden fortlaufende Aufnahmezeit (mit optionalem Akku)
- One Touch Disc Burn und einfache Erstellung von Sicherungskopien auf dem PC über die schnelle USB 2.0-Verbindung (nur Ausgang) an der mitgelieferten Handycam Station
- Benutzerfreundliche Picture Motion Browser-Software mit Internet-Upload-Assistenten.
name: Sony DCR-SR55E hand-held camcorder

description-en_US-print: The effortless LEGRIA HF R306 has a 51x Advanced zoom to get you close to the action in stunning Full HD, while Intelligent IS keeps movies steady. Use Story Creator to develop your video skills. - 51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS. - Optical Intelligent IS. - Story Creator. - Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration. - 7.5cm touch screen. - Smart Auto, Face Detection. - Video Snapshot. - SDXC card slot. Capture stories on the go in stunning Full HD 51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS A genuine Canon HD video lens with 51x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Story Creator Use Story Creator to effortlessly create memorable movies and help develop your video skills. Choose a theme for your movie and Story Creator gives you on screen suggestions and shooting tips, so you can make captivating videos. Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 8 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration. Write messages straight on the Touch-screen with the Stylus Pen, add stamps or active animations like shooting stars and mix in still images. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of settings and simplifies playback. Smart Auto, Face Detection Effortlessly shoot high quality video with Smart Auto. Intelligent Scene Detection Technology selects the perfect settings from 38 scene modes – all you have to do is point and shoot, whilst Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots. Video Snapshot With Video Snapshot it’s easy to create fun, short movies to share with friends - without a PC. Capture 2, 4 or 8 second clips with just one touch of the record button, create a playlist, add music and your movie is ready. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF R306 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card and are ideal for sharing. Available in a range of sizes allowing you to capture hours of footage.
description-en_US-mobile: 3.28MP, 51x Advanced Zoom, 32x Optical Zoom, 1020x Digital Zoom, 1/4.85 type CMOS, DIGIC DV III, 7.5cm (3.0") Touchscreen LCD, AVCHD/MP4, SDXC/SDHC/SD, HDMI, USB2.0, Component Out, AV Out, Black
name: Canon LEGRIA HF R306

description-en_US-print: Small and light with a sleek new design, the VIXIA HF M50 camcorder has 8GB of internal memory to record up to 3 hours of stunning HD video. Image quality is unsurpassed, thanks to the camcorder’s newly designed, professional-level Canon HD CMOS Pro Image Sensor. The high-sensitivity sensor provides outstanding resolution, better low-light performance, and beautiful, natural detail in both shadow and highlight areas. Intelligent IS and SuperRange Optical Image Stabilization designed for the Genuine Canon 10x HD Video Lens make every scene clear and steady, and new built-in features make it easy to give your videos added creativity. Operation is fun and simple with a Flat Touch Panel LCD you'll control with your fingertips. This camcorder has the flexibility you crave: enjoy the convenience of recording in AVCHD or MP4 format to the internal flash drive or to a removable SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card. And now with built-in Wi-Fi®, you can immediately upload video from the camcorder directly to social networking sites via CANON iMAGE GATEWAY, or your own home computer. You can also choose to upload video to your iPhone®, iPad® or iPod touch® by installing the Canon Movie Uploader app, and enjoy wireless viewing on your DLNA™-compatible TV.
description-en_US-mobile: 2.37MP, 1/3" HD CMOS PRO, 1920 x 1080, AVCHD/MPEG-4, 10x Optical/200x Digital, 8GB Flash, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") LCD, HDMI/Composite/USB, Wi-Fi, SD/SDHC/SDXC, Black
name: Canon VIXIA HF M50

description-en_US-print: Experience the compact, easy-to-use camcorder that has 8GB of internal memory to record up to 3 hours of breathtaking Full HD video while offering impressive zooming power and exciting new creative options. Superb imaging is ensured with a new, more sensitive Canon 3.28 Megapixel Full HD CMOS Image Sensor and Canon's exclusive DIGIC DV III Image Processor. Video is steady and clear even at the large end of the 51x Advanced Zoom, thanks to SuperRange Optical Image Stabilization and Intelligent IS. The VIXIA HF R30 is equipped with flexible features to suit your shooting and sharing needs, and a new interface makes the large Flat Touch Panel LCD simpler than ever. Record in AVCHD or MP4 format to the internal flash drive or to a removable SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card. Use the built-in Wi-Fi® to upload video from the camcorder directly to YouTube, Facebook via CANON iMAGE GATEWAY, your own home computer, or a DLNA™-compatible TV. And with Cinema-Look Filters and Touch Decoration, you can be sure that your videos express yourself like never before.
description-en_US-mobile: 3.28MP, 1/4.85" CMOS, 1920 x 1080, AVCHD/MPEG-4, 51x Advanced Zoom, 8GB Flash, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") LCD Touch Panel, Wi-Fi, HDMI/USB/Composite, Black
name: Canon VIXIA HF R30

description-fr_FR-print: Autonomie de 3 h Bénéficiez d’une consommation plus basse et d’une batterie plus efficace grâce à la technologie avancée de Samsung. Cette technologie innovante vous permet de profiter d’une autonomie allant jusqu’à 3 h pour enregistrer vos vidéos HD. Désormais vous pouvez filmez votre enfant jouer au football sans faire de pauses pour changer de batterie, et ainsi, ne rien manquer de ses actions! Capteur CMOS BSI Le caméscope H400 full HD permet de réaliser des vidéos aux couleurs éclatantes. En effet, son capteur CMOS rétro-éclairé possède une haute sensibilité nettement supérieure à celle d'un capteur traditionnel. Il permet d’obtenir une grande netteté d’image et améliore la qualité d’enregistrement en basse lumière. Vous pouvez donc filmer facilement une fête d’anniversaire à la lumière des bougies ou encore les premiers pas de votre enfants, chez vous.
description-fr_FR-mobile: HMX-H400BP - 1/4" CMOS, 5MP, PAL, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") LCD, 30x/45x Zoom, f=2.47-74.1mm, Full HD, USB 2.0, HDMI, SD/SDHC, Win, Li-Ion, 228g
description-en_US-print: Get more life out of your battery Long battery life (3 Hours) Enjoy low power consumption and a more efficient battery with Samsung’s advanced technology. With this innovative technology, you can enjoy up to three hours of battery life while recording your HD videos. That means you can continuously record your child’s baseball game without missing any of the action while changing batteries. Plus, you no longer have to carry around an extra battery or charger for those shorter trips. (Please note: This feature is available only while using the Continuous Recording mode with a bundled battery). More natural hues in every image BSI CMOS Sensor Whether lush greens in a garden, cool blues of an ocean, or a ruby-toned party dress, accurately capture the many colors of life. The H400 features a CMOS Sensor, which filters light into separate red, green and blue elements for color reproduction that is richer, deeper, and more natural looking than any taken with a CCD Sensor. You’ll also enjoy clearer images, with no vertical smears. OIS Duo + shakes off unsteady hands OIS Duo + With OIS (Optical Image Stabilizer) Duo +, you can capture clear and steady video, even if you have a case of shaky hands. The H400 combines a built-in OIS with digital image stabilization technology to prevent bumps, jolts, and shivers from blurring image quality. OIS Duo + also compensates for body movement that can occur while you’re moving around, or for the movement of the digital zoom. Capture things you couldn’t before 45x Digital-zoom (30x Optical zoom) Lightweight and compact, the H400 goes wherever you go. It also features a Schneider Kreuznach lens with 45x Digital zoom (30x Optical zoom) that puts you in the middle of the action, even when you’re far away. Capture a game-winning goal from the far end of the soccer field, or a band rocking out even from the back row. Details are as crisp and clear as if you were shooting from up close. Get a wider view of life 3.0” Wide Touch LCD Change the way you look at things with the 3.0" Wide Touch LCD. The large screen delivers clean, crisp images that are saturated with natural color and deep, dynamic detail. And the size also makes the touchscreen easier to use to find the feature or content you’re looking for. Bookmark your favorite scenes with My Clip My Clip Play back your favorite moments of a night out with friends or your hike through the woods - without having to waste time fast-forwarding or rewinding. The My Clip feature allows you to tag any scene in your video, so you can instantly relive the most hilarious bits or amazing sights over and over again - with no additional editing. Art Time-lapse Capture an event that takes place over the course of hours such as a butterfly emerging from its chrysalis and present it in a fraction of the time. Art Time-Lapse Recording captures still frames at preset intervals, then creates an HD file with the stills placed in sequential order. A variety of modes, including Night Time, Zooming and Panning, give you more creative options. Smart Auto No matter what time of day it is, no matter where you are, with Smart Auto you’re ready for nearly any shooting scenario. Automatically select from one of 11 preset modes - such as Night, Natural Green, Macro and Portrait - to instantly compensate for a variety of varying light conditions or image details. Never again miss shooting a spontaneous scene due to time-consuming setting adjustments. Record Pause The Samsung H400 is filled with a number of unique features, including Samsung’s Record Pause. While shooting a video in Record Pause mode, it allows you to briefly pause the recording and then pick up right where you left off without creating a new file. This way you only have one file to work with and don’t have to merge files for editing, sharing or transferring. With the H400, recording your child’s playoff baseball game and sharing it with your family has never been easier. Face Detection The H400 never forgets a face: Face Tracking tracks the faces of subjects in motion; Face Detection automatically adjusts the focus and exposure after detecting a face on the screen; and Face Recognition remembers the best focus for those faces photographed most - so everyone will love the final photo.
description-en_US-mobile: HMX-H400BP - 1/4" CMOS, 5MP, PAL, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") LCD, 30x/45x Zoom, f=2.47-74.1mm, Full HD, USB 2.0, HDMI, SD/SDHC, Win, Li-Ion, 228g, Black
name: Samsung HMX-H400BP hand-held camcorder

description-en_US-print: Wi-Fi with MP4 support In-built Wi-Fi lets you effortlessly share your creations to social networking sites and view your videos on DNLA certified TVs and iOS devices. Support for MP4 format ensures quick transfer times of HD movies. Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor The HD CMOS PRO sensor is designed and made by Canon for its professional camcorders. The light gathering area of the pixels is 160% bigger than conventional CMOS sensors, delivering a wider dynamic range and advanced low-light performance. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Audio Scene Select It’s simple to make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select and a high-sensitivity, built-in zoom microphone. Just select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically. Store direct to external HDD Copy movies direct from the inbuilt memory or SDXC card slot to an external hard drive. Just follow the easy on-screen menus for simple storage. Creative cinematic features Use Story Creator to develop your video skills and effortlessly create memorable short videos with a story - just choose a theme and follow the in-built scene suggestions. Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters and add fun effects to your movies without a PC using Touch Decoration. 32GB memory, SDXC card slot A 32GB Dual Flash memory lets you store over 12 hours of movies to the built-in memory. Record even longer with the SDXC card slot. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of shooting and playback functions. Effortless shooting Creating high-quality movies is effortless with Smart Auto. Fully automatic, it intelligently selects shooting settings from 38 scenes. Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots and Instant AF ensures fast and accurate focusing. Canon HD Video lens A high-quality, Canon HD Video lens with 10x optical zoom features an iris diaphragm for soft background blurring.
description-en_US-mobile: 2.37MP, 1/3 type HD CMOS, 1920x1080, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, 10x, AVCHD/MP4, 32 GB, SD/SDHC/SDXC, HDMI, USB 2.0, 360g, Black
name: Canon LEGRIA HF M52

description-en_US-print:
Crowd pleaser.

Capture incredibly crisp 1920x1080/60i Full HD video and thrill your audiences by making anytime movie time with a built-in high contrast projector. Use the brilliant 2.7" LCD touchscreen to simplify switching up menu settings on the fly for a fun, easy way to set up the shots, better preserving the memories you'll treasure forever. Running out of daylight? Not a problem. Back-illuminated Exmor® CMOS sensor gets phenomenal results even when lighting conditions are less than optimal so you can keep going long after the sun is gone.

The Makings of a Masterpiece

Immortalize precious moments in time by shooting in exquisitely rich Full 1920x1080/60i HD and special occasions become even more special the second time around. Capture 5.3MP still images for yet another way to share the excitement.

Ready, Set, Project

Light up the room and everyone in it by sharing treasured memories whenever and wherever you choose with nothing more than the camcorder you used to record them. Transform your Handycam camcorder into a mobile movie theater capable of projecting up to a 100" diagonal image using the projector cleverly built into the LCD panel. Savor the true-to-life sound Clear Phase stereo speakers provide when combined with S-Master digital amplifier technology during playback.

Better Shots in Low Light

Experience stunning low-light sensitivity with improved image clarity and drastically reduced grain with a back-illuminated Exmor® R CMOS sensor. Engineered specifically for compact cameras and camcorders, the Exmor R CMOS sensor is designed to let you shoot video in lower lighting conditions with better results.

30x Zoom

Extended digital zoom works in conjunction with 25x optical zoom to get you 30x closer to the action while maintaining HD image quality, even as you pan in for that extreme close-up.

Legendary Lens

Step it up with a professional-quality Carl Zeiss® Vario-Tessar® lens designed specifically for compact camcorders. Precision ground optics help maintain the sharpness and contrast of larger lenses, while SteadyShot® image stabilization helps reduce bothersome blur caused by camera shake.

A Brilliant Touch

Vibrant 2.7" Clear Photo LCD™ touch screen (230k) makes framing up and reviewing footage a breeze. Sharp, vivid images make subjects pop off the screen – even outdoors – while enabling you to switch up menu settings on the fly ensuring the best shoot possible.
description-en_US-mobile: 5.3 MP, 1920 x 1080 Full HD, 25x optical zoom, MS Pro duo/SD/SDHC/SDXC, 210 g, Black

description-en_US-print: Small and light with a sleek new design, the VIXIA HF M52 camcorder has 32GB of internal memory to record up to 12 hours of stunning HD video. Image quality is unsurpassed, thanks to the camcorder's newly designed, professional-level Canon HD CMOS Pro Image Sensor. The high-sensitivity sensor provides outstanding resolution, better low-light performance, and beautiful, natural detail in both shadow and highlight areas. Intelligent IS and SuperRange Optical Image Stabilization designed for the Genuine Canon 10x HD Video Lens make every scene clear and steady, and new built-in features make it easy to give your videos added creativity. Operation is fun and simple with a Flat Touch Panel LCD you'll control with your fingertips. This camcorder has the flexibility you crave: enjoy the convenience of recording in AVCHD or MP4 format to the internal flash drive or to a removable SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card. And now with built-in Wi-Fi®, you can immediately upload video from the camcorder directly to social networking sites via CANON iMAGE GATEWAY, or your own home computer. You can also choose to upload video to your iPhone®, iPad® or iPod touch® by installing the Canon Movie Uploader app, and enjoy wireless viewing on your DLNA™-compatible TV.
