description-en_US-print: Canon LEGRIA HF R306 Capture stories on the go in stunning Full HD The effortless LEGRIA HF R306 has a 51x Advanced zoom to get you close to the action in stunning Full HD, while Intelligent IS keeps movies steady. Use Story Creator to develop your video skills. 51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS A genuine Canon HD video lens with 51x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Story Creator Use Story Creator to effortlessly create memorable movies and help develop your video skills. Choose a theme for your movie and Story Creator gives you on screen suggestions and shooting tips, so you can make captivating videos. Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 8 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration. Write messages straight on the Touch-screen with the Stylus Pen, add stamps or active animations like shooting stars and mix in still images. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of settings and simplifies playback. Smart Auto, Face Detection Effortlessly shoot high quality video with Smart Auto. Intelligent Scene Detection Technology selects the perfect settings from 38 scene modes – all you have to do is point and shoot, whilst Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots. Video Snapshot With Video Snapshot it’s easy to create fun, short movies to share with friends - without a PC. Capture 2, 4 or 8 second clips with just one touch of the record button, create a playlist, add music and your movie is ready. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF R306 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card and are ideal for sharing. Available in a range of sizes allowing you to capture hours of footage.

description-en_US-print: Defined High Def Not all high definition is created equal. Get it in decidedly gorgeous, truly Full 1920x1080/60i HD for exceptional high definition quality. Better Shots in Low Light Experience stunning low-light sensitivity with improved image clarity and drastically reduced grain with a back-illuminated Exmor R CMOS sensor. Engineered specifically for compact cameras and camcorders, the Exmor R CMOS sensor is designed to let you shoot video in lower lighting conditions with better results. Bye Bye Blur SteadyShot image stabilization with Active Mode compensates for greater degrees of camera shake to deliver stunningly smooth video from wide angle to full telephoto shooting. Innovative 3-way shake-canceling adds electronic roll stability for even smoother video capture. 30x Extended Zoom Extended digital zoom works in conjunction with 25x optical zoom to get you 30x closer to the action, maintaining HD image quality as you pan in for an extreme close-up. Legendary Lens Step it up with a professional-quality Carl Zeiss® Vario-Tessar® lens designed specifically for compact camcorders. Precision ground optics help maintain the sharpness and contrast of larger lenses, while SteadyShot image stabilization helps reduce annoying blur caused by camera shake. A Brilliant Touch Vibrant 2.7" Clear Photo LCD touch screen makes framing up and reviewing footage a breeze. Sharp, vivid images make subjects pop off the screen – even outdoors – while enabling you to switch up menu settings on the fly ensuring the best shoot possible.

description-en_US-print:
Incredible zoom for incredible details
52x Optical Zoom (65x intelli-zoom)
We know that a powerful optical zoom lens is a critical feature in any camcorder so that’s why the Samsung F80 comes with a 65x intelli-zoom (52x optical zoom lens) lens. It brings you as close to the action as you need to be and ensures that every image is as clear and crisp as you remember them. To create a higher zoom rate, we’ve added additional pixels from the image sensor to the existing optical zoom.

Capture crystal-clear video with HD recording
HD Recording (1,280 x 720 30p)
Experience the same clarity, richness, and vibrancy you do while watching high definition movies — with your own videos. 1,280 x 720 30p HD recording offers 2.5x better resolution than conventional standard definition camcorders. And since video is captured at 30 frames per second, you’ll enjoy a cinematic-like presentation — especially when played back on your large screen HDTV or desktop HD monitor.

Convert your memories to high definition
HDMI Output
You live in an HD world, relive it in high-definition too. Simply connect the F80 to any HDTV, HD monitor or DVD player via an HDMI cable, and then watch as birthday parties, soccer games and vacation adventures play back sharply and vibrantly, with full-quality high resolution. Enjoy every detail as vividly as you remember seeing it.

True color with CMOS
Whether lush greens in a garden, cool blues of an ocean, or a ruby-toned party dress, accurately capture the many colors of life. The F80 features a CMOS Sensor, which filters light into separate red, green and blue elements for color reproduction that is richer, deeper, and more natural looking than any taken with a CCD Sensor. You’ll also enjoy clearer images, with no vertical smears.

My Clip
Play back your favorite moments of a night out with friends or your hike through the woods — without having to waste time fast-forwarding or rewinding. The My Clip feature allows you to tag any scene in your video, so you can instantly relive the most hilarious bits or amazing sights over and over again — with no additional editing.

Record Pause
When shooting a long video, like a baseball game or a child’s play, you’ll probably want to take a break for any long pauses or intermission. With the Record Pause feature on the Samsung F80, you can pause the recording and then pick up right where you left off without creating a new file. This way you only have one file to work with and don’t have to merge files for editing, sharing or transferring.

Smart BGM II
Add mood to your movies like filmmakers do — enhance your video with Smart Background Music II (with My Music). You can choose from preloaded selections, or create a soundtrack using songs from your computer’s music library. You don’t even have to adjust the sound when someone’s speaking — the music volume automatically becomes lower so none of the words are ever drowned out.

USB Charging
The convenient USB Charging feature helps you keep the F80 fully charged while on the go. Instead of having to search for an electrical outlet, simply plug the F80 into your laptop or any device with a USB port. The F80 even charges when you use the USB cord to upload your content, making it easy to be powered up and ready to shoot — wherever you are.

Time Lapse
Time-Lapse recording enables an event such as sunsets or cloud passing by in the sky that takes hours to be captured and condensed. Still frames are taken at preset intervals and then put in sequential order to create an HD video file that depicts the passing of time.

description-fr_FR-print: VOS SOUVENIRS PRENNENT UNE AUTRE DIMENSION Vous allez enregistrer vos souvenirs en 3D. Avec le caméscope CAMILEO Z100, filmer en 3D est désormais facile et abordable. Vous pouvez effectuer des zooms en 3D et filmer même dans de mauvaises conditions d'éclairage. Grâce à l'écran tactile 3D de 7,1 cm, vos films en 3D prennent vie devant vous. Et sans lunettes ! Le partage est également simplifié grâce au mini-port HDMI : vous pouvez diffuser les films sur un grand écran en 3D et le logiciel CAMILEO Uploader permet de partager les photos et les vidéos en ligne. Le Z100 est également un caméscope 2D complet, idéal pour tous vos films. Le Z100 donne vie à vos souvenirs grâce au film 3D. Les deux capteurs CMOS 5 mégapixels capturent toute l'action en 3D, même dans de mauvaises conditions d'éclairage. Vous pouvez également effectuer des zooms en 3D, jusqu'à 4x. L'écran tactile de 7,1 cm à barrière de parallaxe diffuse instantanément des images en 3D. Pas besoin de lunettes ! Vos films 3D peuvent être diffusés sur le grand écran d'un téléviseur 3D ou sur Internet, directement depuis le Z100. Les mini-ports HDMI et USB 2.0, de même que le logiciel Camileo Uploader simplifient le partage et la diffusion sur écran. Vous pourrez utiliser une carte jusqu'à 128 Go pour stocker tous vos souvenirs. Vos films 3D peuvent être diffusés sur le grand écran d'un téléviseur 3D ou sur Internet, directement depuis le Z100. Les mini-ports HDMI et USB 2.0, de même que le logiciel Camileo Uploader simplifient le partage et la diffusion sur écran. Vous pourrez utiliser une carte jusqu'à 128 Go pour stocker tous vos souvenirs. Les fonctionnalités du mode 2D avancé du Z100 simplifient les photos et la vidéo. Vous pouvez effectuer une mise au point sur l'action avec un zoom numérique jusqu'à 10x. Les fonctions de suivi des visages, de ralenti, de détection de mouvement et de détection des sourires déclenchent des photos de grande qualité jusqu'à 16 mégapixels.

description-en_US-print: Flash Memory Camcorder Shoot. Capture. See. Be HD. Superb Imaging Revved with Intense Zooming Power Experience the compact, easy-to-use camcorder that captures breathtaking Full HD video while offering impressive zooming power and exciting new creative options. Superb imaging is ensured with a new, more sensitive Canon 3.28 Megapixel Full HD CMOS Image Sensor and Canon's exclusive DIGIC DV III Image Processor. Video is steady and clear even at the large end of the 51x Advanced Zoom, thanks to SuperRange Optical Image Stabilization and Intelligent IS. The VIXIA HF R300 is equipped with flexible features to suit your shooting and sharing needs, and a new interface makes the large Flat Touch Panel LCD simpler than ever. Record in AVCHD or MP4 format to a removable SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card. And with Cinema-Look Filters and Touch Decoration, you can be sure that your videos express yourself like never before. Genuine Canon HD Video Lens with 51x Advanced Zoom You won't miss any of the action when shooting video with the VIXIA HF R300 camcorder. The camcorder's wide-angle area has been expanded to 33.9mm (35mm equivalent), making complex scenes easier to shoot and adding more image to all your footage. Like every Canon camcorder, the VIXIA HF R300 is equipped with a Genuine Canon HD Video Lens. Canon's high definition video lenses use aspherical lens technology to achieve low chromatic aberration with high resolution while maintaining compact dimensions. Super spectra coating technology lowers flare and ghosting. The big news is the camcorder's impressive 51x Advanced Zoom. Long-range shooting allows you to create videos with dynamic variety, and is less likely to disrupt the action you're shooting. It's perfect for formal ceremonies, animals in the wild, candid family videos and more. Advanced Zoom, available in manual mode, has been achieved with more efficient use of the effective imaging area. It takes the camcorder's telephoto power all the way to 1,729mm (35mm equivalent) for extraordinary flexibility in shooting. 3.28 Megapixel Full HD CMOS Image Sensor The VIXIA HF R300 camcorder is equipped with a 3.28 Megapixel Full HD CMOS Image Sensor for true 1920 x 1080 resolution. Canon's advanced, high-resolution HD CMOS Image Sensor has been improved for the VIXIA HF R300, with extra sensitivity that delivers beautifully lifelike Full HD Video with natural color, even in low light. Original on-chip noise reduction brings bright clarity to every frame. Video is rich, clear and amazingly detailed anywhere you view it, even when played back on a large HDTV. DIGIC DV III Image Processor DIGIC DV III is specifically engineered to optimize the imaging performance of the camcorder's HD CMOS Image Sensor. Images exhibit beautiful clarity with minimal noise. Gradation is richly rendered from highlight to shadow. Performance in low-light situations is superb, with natural detail and color. The advanced processing speed of DIGIC DV III powers many of the camcorder's cutting-edge technologies as well, giving you more creative freedom than ever before. Record to Removable SD Memory Cards The VIXIA HF R300 camcorder records Full HD Video directly to a removable SD memory card. Widely available in several capacities, SD memory cards let you share your videos quickly and easily. In addition to SD memory cards, the VIXIA HF R300 lets you use super-high capacity SDXC cards. The same size as a standard SD card, an SDXC card can hold up to 2,048 GB, and provides ultra-fast data transfer. Record in AVCHD or MP4 Format The VIXIA HF R300 camcorder gives you the flexibility of dual codec recording, allowing you to record in AVCHD or MP4 format, so you can pick the format that best suits your needs. AVCHD's higher bit-rate and finer resolution will yield the highest quality video for viewing on an HDTV or archiving to Blu-ray™. And for use with today's most typical video applications, the camcorder lets you record in MP4 format, too. MP4 format produces files you can share right away - with no need for conversion. Video is immediately available to upload to social networking sites like Facebook™ or YouTube™, or view on an iPhone™, iPad™ or iPod Touch™. Intelligent IS Intelligent IS makes it easy to shoot clear, sharply focused video, even in situations that typically cause camera shake. The Intelligent IS system analyzes the shooting situation for you, then automatically switches to the image stabilization method best able to produce sharp, steady video. Four IS systems cover the gamut of shooting situations. Dynamic IS corrects minor movement and the shaking caused by walking while shooting. Macro IS delivers perfectly steady close-up shots. Powered IS comes into play when you're using the camcorder's powerful zoom, correcting shake that can occur in telephoto shots. Tripod Mode stops IS when the camcorder is stationary. 3.0-inch Flat Touch Panel LCD Big and bright, the VIXIA HF R300's 3.0-inch Flat Touch Panel LCD provides super intuitive control that feels instantly familiar. With a touch, you can shift focus immediately to any subject. Exposure for any area of the screen can be controlled with a touch as well. And with Touch & Track, you simply place your finger on a moving subject and the focus will follow that subject. "Pressable" buttons are also available for selecting settings and controlling camcorder operations on-screen. A new Home button on the camcorder takes you to the main LCD screen, where clear explanations of shooting modes and recording settings help you make informed choices for an exceptionally simple and enjoyable shooting experience. Smart AUTO and Auto Tele Macro Smart AUTO lets you capture clear, bright, well-focused video while the camcorder takes care of all the details. The system recognizes 38 shooting situations based on numerous factors, then automatically chooses the optimal settings for the situation. When you shoot a nearby subject in telephoto zoom mode, Auto Tele Macro gives your video the high-end artistic effect of a well-focused subject against a beautifully blurred background. Cinema-Look Filters Giving your videos more creativity is easy with new Cinema-Look Filters. Cinema Standard subdues brights and enhances darks for the feel of film. Vivid accentuates primary colors for a cheerful effect that's perfect for kids' birthday parties. Cool adds a bluish tint for a futuristic feel. Nostalgic recreates the look of 1970s TV shows. Sepia adds a distinctive fade and antique tint. Old Movies imparts the aged look of early cinema. Dynamic B&W creates dramatic high-contrast grayscale. Touch Decoration Using the camcorder's LCD screen and an included stylus, you can embellish your recorded video freehand: draw graphics, write words, it's completely up to you! With a choice of 27 different frame graphics, clip art and animated effects, you can give your video a whole new dimension. New, easy-to-understand icons have been incorporated that make options for animated effects clear at a glance. Story Creator Creating a compelling video that truly documents an important event can be challenging, so the VIXIA HF R300 camcorder steps in to help with Story Creator. The feature is even easier to use than ever, so now even beginning videographers can cover an event with confidence. Before shooting, you'll see a list of scenes you'll want to be sure to catch for several different types of occasions. And now each scene selection includes specific shooting tips that help with scene structure and composition, including suggestions for wide-shots, close-ups, even recommendations for length of shots. After shooting, you can watch your video in a coherent story order based each scene's theme, as opposed to the order in which each scene was shot. 24p Cinema and 30p Progressive Modes The VIXIA HF R300 camcorder's sophisticated shooting mode options offer superior creativity and functionality. 24p Cinema Mode gives your video a film-like feel, making it look as if it were shot at the same frame rate as movie film, with a frame capture rate of 24p recorded at 60i. The camcorder also gives you the option of recording in 30p Progressive Mode, which is ideal for clips you intend to post online. Microphone and Headphone Terminals The VIXIA HF R300 camcorder offers exceptional audio flexibility with microphone and headphone terminals. The microphone terminal allows you to capture professional-quality sound with an external microphone and manual audio level control ensures proper volume for any situation. In addition, you'll find a dedicated headphone terminal, ideal for remote communication with the optional Wireless Microphone WM-V1 and other applications.

name: Canon VIXIA HF R300

description-en_US-print: Pro Image Quality with Compact Convenience Small and light with a sleek new design, the VIXIA HF M500 camcorder's image quality is unsurpassed, thanks to the camcorder's newly designed, professional-level Canon HD CMOS Pro Image Sensor. The high-sensitivity sensor provides outstanding resolution, better low-light performance, and beautiful, natural detail in both shadow and highlight areas. Intelligent IS and SuperRange Optical Image Stabilization designed for the Genuine Canon 10x HD Video Lens make every scene clear and steady, and new built-in features make it easy to give your videos added creativity. Operation is fun and simple with a Flat Touch Panel LCD you'll control with your fingertips. This camcorder has the flexibility you crave: enjoy the convenience of recording video in either AVCHD or MP4 format or to a removable SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card. - A Genuine Canon 10x HD Video Lens with SuperRange Optical Image Stabilization provides unsurpassed, professional-looking image quality. - Newly designed Canon HD CMOS Pro Image Sensor is a professional-level 1/3-inch native 1920 x 1080 image sensor which delivers outstanding video resolution, improved low-light performance, and a wide dynamic range. - 20% improved low-light performance compared to the Canon HD CMOS Pro Image Sensor used in Canon's 2011 VIXIA Camcorders. - Record Full HD video directly to a removable SD memory card (SDHC/SDXC compatible) for fast and easy sharing of your memories. - Choose to record in AVCHD for the highest quality viewing on an HDTV or archiving, or in MP4 format for easy sharing with mobile devices or cloud applications. - Intelligent IS automatically chooses from four different modes to optimize image stabilization for the shooting condition. - Audio Scene Select enables easy operation and setup for outstanding audio that matches the pristine image quality. - 3.0-inch Flat Touch Panel LCD with a new graphical user interface (GUI) offers fast and easy control right at your fingertips. - Smart AUTO makes shooting great videos easy by intelligently selecting the best settings from 38 predefined situations including Auto Tele Macro that provides spectacular close-ups and the dramatic look of a video shot with shallow depth-of-field. - Cinema-Look Filter offers nine different built-in filters to create video with a variety of professional cinematic looks, and Touch Decoration allows you to superimpose and record a variety of fun and exciting images for a creative flair. - Story Creator provides a list of suggested scenes that have improved shooting tips to help you produce your own masterpiece. - 24p Cinema Mode provides the look and feel of a Hollywood movie and 30p Progressive is ideal for clips intended to be posted on the web. - Microphone terminal with manual audio level control, and headphone terminal provide exceptional flexibility.

description-en_US-print: Canon LEGRIA HF R36 Share your stories effortlessly with Wi-Fi It’s easy to get close to the action in superb Full HD with the compact LEGRIA HF R36. Share your creations effortlessly with Wi-Fi and enjoy steady footage with Intelligent IS. Wi-Fi with MP4 support In-built Wi-Fi lets you effortlessly share your creations to social networking sites and view your videos on DNLA certified TVs and iOS devices. description-fr_FR-print: Le HV30, qui succède au modèle primé HV20, profite de tous les avantages du système Canon HD (optique Canon HD, capteur CMOS Canon Full HD et processeur DIGIC DV II) pour vous offrir des images HDV1080i de qualité exceptionnelle. Zoom avancé 41x de Canon L'excellente qualité d'une optique vidéo Canon alliée à la puissance du traitement DIGIC DV II dotent le DC310 d'une capacité de zoom supérieure : un zoom avancé offrant un grossissement jusqu'à 41x. Enregistrement direct sur DVD Bénéficiez des avantages de l'enregistrement direct sur DVD (-R/-RW/-R double couche). Lorsque votre vidéo est terminée, il vous suffit de finaliser le DVD dans le caméscope pour pouvoir le visionner sur la quasi-totalité des lecteurs DVD de salon. Fonction "Quick Start" Ne manquez plus aucun grand moment grâce à la fonction "Quick Start". Une simple pression du bouton de démarrage rapide permet quasi-instantanément de mettre le caméscope sous tension lorsqu'il est en mode veille : vous êtes prêt à commencer à filmer en une seconde environ. Commandes intuitives La manette située sur le cadre de l'écran LCD assure l'accès aisé et intuitif aux commandes de prise de vue et de lecture. Des enregistrements plus longs L'utilisation d'un disque DVD-R double couche vous permet d'enregistrer jusqu'à 108 minutes de vidéo. Avec cette augmentation de la capacité d'enregistrement, l'espace d'enregistrement ne vous fera plus jamais défaut lors des longues excursions. La batterie haute capacité en option prolonge plus encore la durée d'enregistrement. Enregistrement au véritable format 16/9è Les caméscopes Canon enregistrent au véritable format 16/9è haute résolution : vos vidéos sont parfaitement adaptées au visionnage sur un téléviseur à écran large. Cadrez et prévisualisez vos vidéos dans leurs dimensions réelles sur l'écran LCD 16/9è 2,7 pouces. Pour économiser votre batterie, filmez plutôt à l'aide du viseur électronique (EVF) 16/9è 0,35 pouce. DIGIC DV II Développé à l'origine pour notre gamme de caméscope haute définition, le DIGIC DV II équipe désormais nos modèles de caméscopes DVD. Ce processeur d'image sophistiqué est doté d'une technologie perfectionnée de réduction du bruit, garantissant ainsi des images plus propres et plus nettes. Grâce à un double traitement du signal, le DIGIC DV II est également capable de traiter la vidéo et la photo séparément, optimisant ainsi leurs couleurs, pour l'affichage comme pour l'impression. Eclairage vidéo via l'écran LCD Orientez l'écran LCD du DC310 vers l'avant pour profiter de sa fonction très pratique d'éclairage vidéo. Il procure ainsi une source lumineuse supplémentaire permettant de continuer à filmer même dans des conditions de faible éclairage. Fonctions Photo avancées Le DC310 permet également de prendre des photos. Ces dernières peuvent être stockées sur une carte mémoire SD ou SDHC (haute capacité) et peuvent être imprimées directement sur les imprimantes dotées d'un emplacement pour carte mémoire compatible.
description-fr_FR-mobile: HV30 Caméscope
description-en_US-print: Successor to the award-winning HV20, the HV30 derives all the benefits of the Canon HD Camera System - Canon HD Lens, Full HD CMOS sensor and DIGIC DV II processor - for outstanding HDV1080i images. Canon HD Camera System The HV30 inherits the HV20’s Canon HD Camera System – the unique combination of a genuine Canon HD Video Lens, a 2.96MP Full HD CMOS sensor and the DIGIC DV II processor. Designed and manufactured by Canon, these components integrate seamlessly to deliver superb HDV1080i (High Definition Video) images, recorded to tape. Instant AF Focusing in HD can be difficult, since even slight errors are noticeable. The HV30 employs a unique hybrid system called Instant AF for extremely fast, accurate auto focusing – making it easier to capture pin sharp HD pictures. Canon HD Video Lens A 10x optical zoom lens, specially engineered for HD video, inherits Canon’s extensive expertise in broadcast lens manufacture. With Canon’s Super Range Optical Image Stabilizer, all kinds of camera shake are compensated for. Filmmaker’s system An Advanced Accessory Shoe lets moviemakers adapt the camcorder to their needs – a range of peripherals can be added to suit any shooting situation. Manual audio controls allow sound recording to be finely controlled; an HDMI output jack is the quickest way to connect to a compatible HD TV or computer. Multiangle Vivid LCD The HV30 features Canon’s advanced 2.7” Multiangle Vivid LCD screen. Making it easier to monitor recording when shooting from particularly high or low angles, it has a wide 135-degree viewing angle. HCAR surface treatment ensures sharp images, a wider range of vibrant colours and reduced screen reflection. Cinema-style 25p shooting For ambitious moviemakers, the HV30 features true 25p (progressive) shooting. Allied to a dedicated CINE image mode, movies have the look and feel of film. 25p shooting also offers improved low-light performance, increasing shooting options even further. Shoot for longer The HV30 is compatible with Canon’s optional high capacity battery (BP-2L24H) – extending shooting times and cutting out the need to carry spares. Advanced photography Digital photos are stored to MiniSD card. Advanced photo features includes a one-push histogram display to monitor brightness levels. Split path processing allows simultaneous video and 2.07MP still capture. Print photos directly on PictBridge compatible printers. Analogue-to-digital conversion Via an AV input connection, analogue footage (including old home movies) can be transferred to digital tape for safekeeping.
description-en_US-mobile: HV30 High Definition Camcorder
description-de_DE-print: HDV1080i-Aufzeichnung in herausragender Qualität - der HV30 ist wie das Vorgängermodell HV20 mit dem Canon HD Camera System ausgestattet: Canon HD-Objektiv, Full-HD-CMOS-Sensor und für HD optimierter DIGIC-DV-II-Prozessor sorgen für High Definition Videos. Canon HD Camera System Canon HD-Videoobjektiv, 2,96 Megapixel Full-HD-CMOS-Sensor und für HD optimierter DIGIC-DV-II-Prozessor – das Canon HD Camera System ist die starke Kombination für starke Leistung. Alle Komponenten des HD Camera Systems sind von Canon selbst entwickelt und gefertigt und perfekt aufeinander abgestimmt – ein wesentlicher Faktor für brillante 1080i High Defintion Videos. Der HV30 zeichnet Videos auf MiniDV-Band auf. Instant AF Die HD-Aufzeichnung stellt mit ihrer HD-Auflösung hohe Anforderungen: so machen sich bereits kleine Fehler bei der Scharfstellung deutlich bei der Bildqualität bemerkbar. Zur bemerkenswert schnellen und äußerst präzisen automatischen Scharfstellung ist der HV30 mit dem „Instant-AF“ ausgestattet, einem innovativen Hybridsystem für außergewöhnliche Bildqualität. Canon HD-Videoobjektiv Canons langjährige Erfahrung im Bau von Fernsehkamera-Objektiven ist die starke Basis für die überzeugende Qualität des Canon HD-Objektivs mit 10fach optischem Zoom.Der optische Super-Range-Bildstabilisator reduziert ungewollte Verwacklungsunschärfe. Der Camcorder für engagierte Hobbyfilmer Über den erweiterten Zubehörschuh lassen sich Mikrofone, Videoleuchten und andere Peripheriegeräte betreiben. Das ermöglicht den vielseitigen, kreativen Einsatz des Camcorders für praktisch jeden Drehort. Für erstklassige Klangqualität ist die Tonsteuerung auch manuell präzise möglich. Praktisch: die HDMI-Schnittstelle für die unkomplizierte Wiedergabe der Videos auf HD-ready TV-Geräten mit nur einem einzigen Kabel. Dreh- und schwenkbares LC-Display Der HV30 ist mit einem neuen dreh- und schwenkbaren 2,7-Zoll-LC-Display ausgestattet. Es ermöglicht die komfortable Kontrolle der Aufnahmen aus einem weiten Betrachtungswinkel von 135 Grad. Die HCAR-Oberflächenvergütung des LC-Displays wurde auf optimale Darstellung des Farbraums ausgelegt, das Bild wirkt gestochen scharf, die Bildschirmreflexionen bleiben minimal. 25p Vollbildaufnahmen für echtes Kinoflair Ideal für engagierte Hobbyfilmer: der 25p-Cinema-Modus für klassischen Kino-Look. Eine Kombination aus 25p (Progressive) und CINE-Modus.Weiterer Vorteil: mehr Flexibilität beim Dreh unter schlechten Lichtverhältnissen. Das lange Videovergnügen Der HV30 ist mit dem optional als Zubehör erhältlichen Hochleistungsakku (BP-2L24H) für erhöhte Aufnahmezeiten kompatibel. Fortschrittliche Digitalkamerafunktionen Digitale Fotos werden auf einer MiniSD-Karte gespeichert. Zu den fortschrittlichen Fotofunktionen gehört eine Histogramm-Anzeige auf Knopfdruck zur Überwachung der Helligkeitswerte. Großes Plus des DIGIC-DV-II-Prozessors und der getrennten Signalverarbeitung von Fotos und Videos: Auch während laufender Videoaufzeichnung sind Standbilder mit 2,07 Megapixel möglich. Fotodirektdruck auf PictBridge-kompatiblen Druckern. Analog-Digital-Wandler Über einen AV-Eingang können analoge Aufzeichnungen (z. B. alte private Videoaufnahmen) digitalisiert und auf Band gesichert werden.
description-de_DE-mobile: HV30 2,96Mpix CCD 10xopt Zoom, 16 GB interner Speicher
name: Canon HV30 High Definition Camcorder

description-en_US-print:
The new HXR-NX30U high-definition camcorder is a palm-size addition to the NXCAM line. The NX30U utilizes breakthrough Balanced Optical SteadyShot™ image stabilization technology to help eliminate camera shake and offers other convenient features such as a built-in projector, all combined in our smallest, lightest handheld professional camcorder. The HXR-NX30U records at full 1920 x 1080 HD resolution using a Carl Zeiss Vario-Sonnar T* lens for superb optical quality. The camcorder's 1/2.88-inch image sensor uses Sony's Exmor R™ CMOS technology to significantly increase low-light performance, speeds image readout, reduces artifacting and enables a range of frame rates. The NX30U also features a detachable XLR unit and professional-quality audio. The HXR-NX30U is perfect for documentary makers, video journalists, schools or corporate users, for hand-held telephoto shooting.

- Sony Ultra-wide Angle 26.3mm G lens
- Optical SteadyShot image stabilization with Active Mode. Balanced Optical SteadyShot w/FIXED SHOT mode.
- Native 16:9, Back-illuminated Exmor R™ CMOS sensor provides exceptional low light and high signal no noise recordings.
- Full HD, 1920x1080 progressive recording at 60P, 30P and 24P.
- View-DR (visibility enhanced wide dynamic range)
- Built-in projector
- 96 GB Internal flash Memory.
- Direct data backup (clips or card images) via USB from the camera to an external HDD without a PC.
- A detachable audio pod includes two balanced XLR audio inputs with phantom power and attenuation options.
- 3.5” touch-screen XtraFine™ LCD display (921K)
- GPS Geo Tagging
- Infrared NightShot® (night vision) filming and photography
- Built-in LED Light
- Timecode/User Bit Recording and HDMI Embedded Timecode Output
description-en_US-mobile: HXRNX30E: Full HD, CMOS, 96GB, 24.1MP
name: Sony HXRNX30E hand-held camcorder

description-en_US-print:
The PMW-100 is Sony's first handheld camcorder supporting the 50 Mbps MPEG HD422 codec. It is a good companion to the PMW-500 XDCAM HD422 shouldermount camera. With its one 1/3" (actual size: 1/2.9") Full HD Exmor CMOS sensor (1920x1280), the PMW-100 is able to achieve high resolution, high sensitivity, low noise, and wide dynamic range in a small camera. The PMW-100 can be used for both SD and HD applications. It can be set to record 50 Mbps MPEG HD422 as MXF files on UDF formatted cards just like the PMW-500 memory camcorder or the PDW-700/F800 optical disc based camcorders. Or you can set the camcorder for FAT mode recording to shoot SxS cards which are compabile with the XDCAM EX format made by the PMW-EX1/R or PMW-320/350. For SD applications you can make DVCAM recordings as either MXF files or XDCAM EX compatible files.

- Single 1/3-inch Exmor CMOS sensor (actual size: 1/2.9 - inch)
- 50 Mbps MPEG HD422 recording as MXF files (UDF mode only)
- SD Recording and Playback (DVCAM) standard
- 10x Fixed Zoom Lens (f= 5.4 - 54 mm) (servo/manual switchable)
- Two ExpressCard SxS Memory Card Slots
- Record up to 4 hours 50 Mbps MPEG HD422 in camcorder using two 64 GB SxS-1A memory cards (must be purchased separately)
- UDF (Professional Disc compatible) or FAT (XDCAM EX compatible) file format mode shooting to have similar high res files and workflows with existing Professional Disc and XDCAM EX camcorders
- NightShot Function
- Low power consumption
- Compact and lightweight at under 4 lbs
- 16:9, 3.5 inch color LCD
- Slow & Quick motion
- Focus Magnification for focus assistance
- Slow Shutter Function
- Shutter Angle Settings
- Picture Cache Recording
- High-quality four-channel audio recording
- HD/SD-SDI output and composite/HD-Y output
- USB interface for connecting camcorder as card reader
- Six Standard Gamma settings and Four HyperGama Settings
- The VCL-HG0737K 0.8x wide converter option can be used with the PMW-100 lens
description-en_US-mobile: PMW100: CMOS, 10x zoom, Full HD, 1360g
name: Sony PMW100 hand-held camcorder

description-en_US-print: Experience the compact, easy-to-use camcorder that has 32GB of internal memory to record up to 12 hours of breathtaking Full HD video while offering impressive zooming power and exciting new creative options. Superb imaging is ensured with a new, more sensitive Canon 3.28 Megapixel Full HD CMOS Image Sensor and Canon's exclusive DIGIC DV III Image Processor. Video is steady and clear even at the large end of the 51x Advanced Zoom, thanks to SuperRange Optical Image Stabilization and Intelligent IS. The VIXIA HF R32 is equipped with flexible features to suit your shooting and sharing needs, and a new interface makes the large Flat Touch Panel LCD simpler than ever. Record in AVCHD or MP4 format to the internal flash drive or to a removable SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card. Use the built-in Wi-Fi® to upload video from the camcorder directly to YouTube, Facebook via CANON iMAGE GATEWAY, your own home computer, or a DLNA™-compatible TV. And with Cinema-Look Filters and Touch Decoration, you can be sure that your videos express yourself like never before.

description-en_US-mobile: Mini DV Camcoder VP-D381
description-de_DE-print: Mini Dv Camcorder mit 2,7" Display. Mini DV Camcorder mit einem 34-fach optischen Zoom und einem 2,7" Wide-Display. Er verfügt über eine deutsche Menüführung, einen AV-Ausgang und 16:9 Recording. Kontrastverstärkung Verbessert die Bildqualität durch besseren Kontrast. Farbwertabgleichung durch automatische Helligkeitsmessung. Grautonabgleichung für maximale Kontrastwerte. Schwarz-Weiß-Streckung über den gesamten Bildbereich. Farbwertverstärkung Gibt die Farben, die unser Auge wahrnimmt, authentisch wieder. DSP6 verarbeitet Farbinformationen von CCD und Farbwertmesser, außerdem werden Hauttöne und Farbschattierungen gesucht und justiert. Besserer Weißabgleich DSP5 zeigt bei der Weißwiedergabe gelbliche Schatten. Die DSP6-Technologie ermöglicht dagegen die Wiedergabe von reinem Weiß durch Farbtemperaturmessung und -abgleich für ein farbgetreues Bild. Bessere Rauschunterdrückung Die Rauschunterdrückung tut genau das, was der Name verspricht. Wenn Sie bei Schwachlicht Aufnahmen mit einem DSP5-bestückten Camcorder machen, sind die dunklen Farben gesprenkelt, d. h., sie enthalten Pixel anderer Farben wie etwa Grau oder Weiß. DSP6 dagegen ermöglicht Schwachlichtaufnahmen mit sehr sauberen, gleichmäßigen Farben. Digitaleffekte (16:9) DSP6 unterstützt den vollen 16:9-Breitbildmodus. Bei Auswahl der 16:9-Effekte werden die versteckten Bildbereiche sichtbar. Achten Sie auf die roten Kreise. Digitale Fernseher erlauben außerdem die störungsfreie Wiedergabe von 16:9-Bildern, die mit einem Samsung Camcorder aufgenommen wurden. Zoom Lens (Optical 34x, Digital 1200x) Mit dem 34fach-/1.200fach-Zoom holen Sie entfernte Objekte ganz einfach heran.
description-de_DE-mobile: Mini DV Camcoder VP-D381
name: Samsung Mini DV Camcoder VP-D381

description-en_US-print: Spontaneous entertainment.\nCapture incredibly crisp 1920x1080p Full HD video and quickly create a mobile movie theater by flipping-out a brilliant built-in projector. Demonstrate your cinematic prowess with CinemaTone presets and advanced manual controls with expanded focus, zebra and peaking. Balanced Optical SteadyShot™ image stabilization helps take the shake out of movies while an impressive 96GB1 of internal Flash memory lets you store up to 31 hours of HD footage.\n

description-en_US-print: Samsung NX20

description-en_US-print: With its practical, compact design and the convenient zoom buttons located right on the LCD frame, the CCD-TRV138 Hi8™ Handycam® camcorder is the ideal camcorder for any situation. Video Hi8™ Recording Records outstanding video quality up to 400 lines of horizontal resolution with Hi-Fi sound on affordable 8mm and Hi8 tapes. 2.5" SwivelScreen™ LCD Display (123K Pixels) Provides excellent viewing clarity with improved resolution. The high resolution 123K pixel LCD screen rotates up to 270 degrees for multiple viewing angles providing sharp, detailed images for monitoring or playback. Easy Dubbing Connect the Handycam camcorder to a VCR to effortlessly make VHS copies of your home videos. The camcorder can control up to 59 brands of VCRs. Program AE (Auto Exposure) Modes Program AE modes make recording easy even when filming in challenging situations. Choose from Portrait, Beach & Ski, Sports Lesson, Landscape, Spotlight or Sunset & Moon modes. Fader Effect(s) Enhance your personal videos by adding professional looking fader effects. Choose from Black, Mosaic, White, Monotone and Stripe. Built-In White LED Light Brighten your video, and reduce shadows when shooting in low-light situations. The LED light uses considerably less power than bulb-based light systems, with the same light output. 1/6" CCD Imager, 320K Pixels Gross 1/6" CCD Imager with 200K (effective) pixels provides great detail and clarity along with exceptional analog video performance. InfoLITHIUM® Battery with AccuPower™ Meter System Charge the battery at anytime because unlike NiCad (Nickel Cadmium) batteries, Sony's rechargeable Lithium Ion batteries are not subjected to a life shortening "memory effect". Sony's exclusive AccuPower™ meter displays the battery time remaining in minutes, in either the viewfinder or on the LCD screen. NightShot® Plus Infrared System With Sony's NightShot Infrared System you can capture natural looking video, even when shooting in low light. Record subjects up to 10 feet away using the built-in infrared system, without the monochrome color common with earlier low-light recording systems. Picture Effects Get creative when recording or playing back your videos with Sony's Picture Effect Modes. Effects available in Camera mode: Negative Art, Sepia, Monotone, Solarize, Slim, Stretch, Pastel and Mosaic. Titling Add professional looking titles to your video. Select from 8 presets, or customize 2 titles with up to 22 characters. Manual Focus Allows the user to manually adjust the focus of the camcorder using the dial. Manual focusing also allows the user to control the focus in difficult situations where either the environment or the subject does not allow the camcorder's auto focus to perform optimally, such as when shooting through a window or in a crowded environment. 20X Optical/990X Digital Zoom The optical zoom helps to bring the action close up from far away. In addition, with the Digital Zoom and interpolation means that extreme digital zooming is clearer, with less distortion than previous types of digital zooms. Multi-Language Menu Change the menu display from English to English (Simplified), Canadian French, Latin American Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Korean or Traditional Chinese. Stamina® Battery Power Management System Using the optional NP-QM91D InfoLITHIUM® Battery, the CCD-TRV138 can continuously record for up to 16 hours on a single full charge, providing extra long battery life. End Search Automatically advances the video tape to the last 5 seconds of the recorded scene. This prevents accidentally recording over previously recorded videos. Battery Information At the touch of a button, battery information is displayed on the LCD screen when charging and when the camcorder is turned off. The display will show how much the battery is charged, in 10% increments and the recordable time left when using the LCD screen or in the viewfinder. Easy Handycam Button Using a camcorder can be intimidating for some people, so with a press of the Easy Handycam button, most of the advanced features of the camcorder are "locked out" leaving only the buttons essential for recording operational.
description-en_US-mobile: 1/6" CCD Imager, 320K, Hi8, MPEG2, 6.35 cm (2.5 ") SwivelScreen™ LCD Display, White LED Light, 20X Optical/990X Digital Zoom
name: Sony CCD-TRV138 hand-held camcorder

description-en_US-print: See the bigger picture Get even closer with the new 70x extended zoom feature. Advanced image processing technology ensures almost no visible image degradation, letting you enjoy a greater shooting range, from wide to telephoto. Smooth and steady videos, every time Whether you're standing still or on the move, SteadyShot drastically reduces camera shake for smooth, blur-free recordings – even when you're zooming in and out. Wider, clearer, better The 2.7" Wide Clear Photo LCD screen delivers better visibility, higher screen resolution, sharper contrast and more accurate colour reproduction than ever before. Auto-correct settings for every shot With Intelligent Auto, it's easy to capture your moments in the best light. Just point your Handycam at your subject, and the correct camera settings will be adjusted automatically from 18 different scene combinations. It's hassle-free even for first-time users, so you can concentrate on getting your perfect shot and leave the details to us. Detects faces automatically The Face Detection feature automatically detects up to eight faces in a scene, optimising the exposure for the best results. It's handy for quick and easy shooting of scenes with people, guaranteeing correct exposures and bright faces every time. Capture great videos, even in the dark Shoot clear, vivid videos in low light conditions with the built-in LED video light. Bright and energy-efficient, it can illuminate any subject up to 1.5 metres. Picture Motion Browser (PMB) Share your videos easily with PMB Portable, already embedded in your Handycam. PMB Portable lets you upload videos to Facebook and YouTube easily when you connect your Handycam to a computer via a USB cable – no installation required. For advanced importing options, check out the full version of PMB in the CD-ROM provided with every Handycam. Direct Copy With Direct Copy, you can also back up videos directly onto your external hard drive, via a USB adapter. Dual-Compatibility Memory Card Slot Shoot and store more on your Handycam with a memory card slot that's compatible with both MS and SD cards.
description-en_US-mobile: HandyCam, 1/8 CCD, 60x opt. zoom, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") LCD, USB 2.0, 195g, black
name: Sony DCR-SX22 hand-held camcorder

description-fr_FR-print: Camescope Full HD, compatible Wi-Fi® et équipé de SteadyShot, de 5 modes d'enregistrement, d'un boîtier étanche et d'un kit mains libres - Structure résistante accompagnée d'un boîtier étanche pouvant descendre jusqu'à 60 m de profondeur - Wi-Fi® intégré permettant le partage de films à la volée - Dites adieu aux images floues grâce à SteadyShot Allez plus loin. Plus rapides. Plus profond. Emportez votre Action Cam dans vos futures aventures et ne perdez pas une miette de l'action, même si elle se déroule à 60 m de profondeur sous-marine. Partagez vos films avec votre téléphone grâce au Wi-Fi® intégré. Réalisez des films fluides avec SteadyShot. Donnez une nouvelle dimension à vos films. Photos en mains libres, même sous l'eau Vous prévoyez de plonger en profondeur ? Pas d'inquiétude : une housse étanche jusqu'à 60 m de profondeur vous est offerte avec votre Action Cam. Procurez-vous des accessoires pour filmer tout en gardant les mains libres : vous aurez alors un appareil photo que vous pourrez emmener partout. Partage de films grâce au Wi-Fi® intégré Lorsque la scène est terminée, regardez-la à nouveau sur votre smartphone avec l'application PlayMemories Mobile et la fonction Wi-Fi® intégrée de l'Action Cam. Plus de câbles ni de branchements : il n'y a que vous, plus en forme que jamais ! L'image parfaite Finies les images floues grâce à la fonction SteadyShot. Ne sacrifiez pas la netteté sous prétexte que les conditions ne sont pas optimales. Choisissez parmi 5 modes d'enregistrement, dont le mode Full HD ou HD super ralenti à 120 images par seconde pour visionner l'action 4 fois plus lentement. Un rendu optimal à chaque fois Des images de poudreuse d'une grande pureté, la jungle urbaine... Saisissez les moindres détails dans n'importe quelle situation grâce au puissant objectif Carl Zeiss®. Rien n'échappe à des prises de vue très grand angle à 170°. Le capteur CMOS Exmor R™ vous permet d'enregistrer de magnifiques images HD même dans des conditions de faible luminosité. Tessar//conception optique robuste (idéal pour les scènes en extérieur)//reflets et lumière parasite minimisés grâce à un revêtement antireflet haute qualité. Mettez votre Action Cam à jour avec de nouvelles fonctions Téléchargez le nouveau microprogramme pour découvrir encore plus de possibilités avec votre Action Cam. Réalisez des vidéos tout en fluidité grâce à la rapidité de la Full HD 60 images/s. Activez la fonction sous-marine pour profiter des réglages adéquats lors de vos plongées ; ou choisissez de désactiver le son des commandes de votre Action Cam, pour profiter d'une discrétion optimale.
description-fr_FR-mobile: 16.8 MP, CMOS, 6 lux, MPEG4-AVC/H.264, USB, 65 g
description-en_US-print: Catch all the action, all the time Go further. Faster. Deeper. Pack the Action Cam on your next adventure and shoot all the action, even if it takes you 60m down in the open ocean. Share films to your phone with built-in Wi-Fi. Shoot smooth footage with SteadyShot. Take your filming to new frontiers. Shoot hands-free – even underwater Going deep down? Don’t sweat it – the Action Cam comes with a case that's waterproof to 60m. Throw in accessories that help you film hands-free and you’ve got a camera you can take anywhere. Share films with built-in Wi-Fi When the action’s over, watch it back on your smartphone using the PlayMemories Mobile app and Action Cam’s built-in Wi-Fi. No cables, no hook-ups. Just you, in full flow. Picture perfect Forget shaky footage with our unique SteadyShot feature. It keeps footage smooth when things get rough. Pick from five recording modes, including Full HD and HD super-slow, which shoots 120 frames a second so you can replay the action four times slower. Always Look Good Pristine powder or city streets. Wherever you play, catch every detail with a powerful Carl Zeiss lens. Its ultra-wide 170° angle means you won’t miss a thing. And a super-sensitive Exmor R™ CMOS sensor guarantees beautiful HD, even in low light. Tessar//robust optic build (good for outdoor action)//reduced reflection & less stray light due to high quality coating that leads to reduced reflexion.
description-en_US-mobile: 16.8 MP, CMOS, 6 lux, MPEG4-AVC/H.264, USB, 65 g, Black
name: Sony HDR-AS15

description-fr_FR-print: - Vidéo Full HD 24p / 25p / 50p pour un rendu cinéma. - Objectifs interchangeables pour une créativité sans limites. - Un zoom puissant assure une image parfaite. La puissance est entre vos mains Réalisez des vidéos Full HD en toute liberté, avec un zoom puissant et la souplesse des objectifs interchangeables. Capturez de splendides séquences vidéo, avec une richesse de détails et une grande profondeur de champ, grâce au capteur CMOS HD, au son stéréo de grande qualité ou au son Surround 5.1. Un son d'exception Profitez de dialogues et d'autres bruits limpides avec un son stéréo ou Surround 5.1 canaux grâce au microphone Quad Capsule Spatial Array ultra-précis. Pratiques, la commande de niveau sonore et l'adaptateur XLR en option ajoutent une qualité sonore et des accessoires professionnels. Augmentez le potentiel de vos images Associé à un objectif zoom type E puissant, cet appareil photo vous permet d'effectuer un zoom avant ou arrière, lentement et en douceur, sans mouvement brusque ou sautillement sur vos prises de vue. Vous pouvez modifier la vitesse afin de l'adapter à la scène et effectuer un zoom avant jusqu'à 11x à l'aide d'une molette se trouvant sur l'appareil. Plus d'objectifs, plus de créativité Les photographes expérimentés apprécient la liberté de choisir l'objectif adapté à chaque situation. Profitez dès maintenant des mêmes possibilités créatives illimitées avec votre camescope, en choisissant l'objectif parfaitement adapté à chaque scène. Admirez tous les détails Améliorez la qualité de vos photos grâce au viseur OLED qui vous offre une résolution bien plus importante que la résolution Full HD, une image 100 % nette, ainsi qu'un contrôle manuel précis de l'exposition, de l'ouverture, de la balance des blancs et d'autres paramètres. La molette programmable et les boutons d'accès rapide vous permettent de modifier les réglages tout en laissant libre court à votre créativité. - Des images encore plus nettes - Réalisez des vidéos de qualité professionnelle grâce au grand capteur APS-C 16,1 mégapixels (de dimension comparable à celui d'un reflex numérique). - Des images et un son incroyables, comme au cinéma - Découvrez une dimension de créativité inédite. Capturez des séquences vidéo détaillées, avec un aspect cinéma en 24 images par seconde et un son de haute qualité. - Rentrez de plein fouet dans votre sujet - Grâce au puissant objectif zoom 18-200 mm de type E, vous pouvez agrandir votre sujet jusqu'à 11x. - Rapidité et puissance - Un processeur BIONZ garantit des vidéos et des photos nettes et détaillées, il permet des prises de vue rapides et réactives. - Choisissez votre objectif - Utilisez l'objectif de type E qui convient le mieux à chaque scène, ou optez pour un objectif reflex de type A de Carl Zeiss et Sony (adaptateur requis). - Filmez tout en HD - Saisissez le moindre détail en vidéo Full HD 1 920 x 1 080 (format AVCHD) à 24Mbit/s, pour plus de netteté et de clarté. - Sélectionnez votre fréquence d'images - Filmez en Full HD en choisissant votre fréquence d'images : 24 images par seconde pour un aspect cinéma, ou 25p / 50p pour plus de fluidité. - Des photos de qualité reflex - Prenez des photos de qualité reflex avec une faible profondeur de champ pour un rendu professionnel. - Effectuez vos réglages du bout des doigts - L'écran tactile LCD ajustable vous permet de régler votre appareil en toute facilité. - Enregistrement avec son Surround - Le microphone Quad Capsule Spatial Array est doté de quatre capsules omnidirectionnelles permettant d'enregistrer en stéréo ou en son Surround 5.1.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Camescope Full HD avec objectif interchangeable, Capteur Exmor 16.1MP, puissant objectif zoom de type E, son 5.1, 24p / 25p / 50p, écran tactile et viseur OLED
description-en_US-print: - Full HD video at 24/ 25/ 50p for a cinematic view. - Interchangeable lenses for limitless creativity. - Power zoom delivers a smoother view. The power is in your hands Shoot Full HD video the way you want to, with a power zoom and the creative flexibility of interchangeable lenses. Capture exquisite video with an HD CMOS sensor, delivering detail and depth of field, plus high-quality stereo or 5.1ch surround sound. Movie magic in every shot Give your HD videos a smooth cinematic look, even in low light, with a 16.1 megapixel Exmor APS HD CMOS sensor that can shoot in 25, 50p or movie standard 24 frames per second. Swap lenses and create background defocus ('bokeh') effects - just like on a cinema camera. Sounds better Capture pristine dialogue and other sounds in stereo or 5.1 channel surround sound with the precision Quad Capsule Spatial Array Microphone. There’s also a handy audio level control plus an optional XLR adaptor to add professional sound and accessories. Power-up your shooting Coupled with an E-mount power zoom lens, you can zoom-in or pull back, smoothly and slowly, without jerks or jumps in your shot. Controlled from a lever on the main body, you can adjust the speed to suit the scene and zoom in up to 11x. More lenses - more creativity Serious photographers value the freedom of choosing the right lens to suit any shooting situation. Now you can explore the same creative limitless possibilities with your camcorder, picking the perfect lens to match the demands of any scene. Revel in the detail Fine-tune your vision with an OLED viewfinder that gives you higher than Full HD resolution, a 100% picture, plus precise manual control over exposure, iris, white balance and other settings. An assignable dial and quick-access buttons make it easy to adjust settings without interrupting your creativity. - Get a sharper view - Shoot pro-quality video with a large, DSLR sized APS-C sensor with 16.1 megapixels. - Real cinematic images and sound - Explore a new dimension in creative artistry. Capture beautifully detailed, cinematic video images plus high-quality audio in cinematic 24 frames per second. - Add some power to your shots - With an E-mount power zoom lens included, you can smoothly zoom in on your subject with up to 11x magnification at 18-200mm. - Fast and powerful performance - A BIONZ processor ensures clear, detailed video and still images plus quick, responsive shooting. - Choose your view - Pick the right E-mount lens for any scene, or use your favourite A-mount DSLR lenses by Carl Zeiss and Sony (requires adaptor). - Capture it all in HD - Capture all the detail with Full HD 1920 x 1080 video shooting (AVCHD format) at 24mbs for increased detail and clarity. - Select your frame rate - Shoot smooth, Full HD video footage with choice of cinematic 24 frames per second, or standard 25/50p frame rates. - DSLR quality photos - Shoot stills with DSLR-like picture quality and shallow depth of field for professional looking shots. - Touch to control - An adjustable LCD touchscreen offers easy fingertip operation. - Record in surround sound - The Quad Capsule Spatial Array Microphone has four omnidirectional capsules, for stereo or 5.1ch surround sound recording.
description-en_US-mobile: Interchangeable lens Full HD camcorder, 16.1MP Exmor sensor, E-mount power zoom lens, 5.1 sound, 24/25/50p, touchscreen, & OLED viewfinder
name: Sony NEX-VG30EH

description-fr_FR-print:
Le NEX-EA50EH est un caméscope NXCAM professionnel doté d'un capteur CMOS HD APS-C Exmor™ et d'un système d'objectif interchangeables à monture E. Il offre une grande liberté créative pour le tournage de films en Full HD et pour la capture d’images fixes de grande qualité. Il est fourni avec le nouvel objectif à monture E et zoom puissant SEL-18200 E PZ 18-200 mm F3.5-6.3 OSS. Il dispose des fonctionnalités suivantes : mise au point automatique, diaphragme variable et stabilisation Steady Shot de l'image avec mode actif. Ces fonctions en font l'objectif idéal pour la capture d'images en mouvement. Les réalisateurs peuvent obtenir une vitesse du zoom constante et un zoom lent et fluide, ce qui peut être difficile avec des objectifs à zoom manuel.

Le nouveau design du caméscope permet à l'utilisateur de tourner de la façon la plus adaptée. Il peut ainsi changer rapidement entre une configuration de poing/d'épaule sans devoir recourir à des accessoires supplémentaires.

Ce produit est livré avec la garantie totale Prime Support. Elle comprend un service de réparation rapide, une assistance technique professionnelle et le prêt gratuit d'une unité de remplacement pendant la durée de réparation de votre appareil. Grâce à cette garantie, Sony prend soin de votre équipement et vous apporte le soutien nécessaire en cas de problème.

Les Sony Professional Solutions Specialists seront en mesure de vous proposer le NEX-EA50EH courant octobre. Veuillez contacter votre distributeur le plus proche pour pré-commander votre caméscope.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Exmor APS HD CMOS, 1080/60p, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") 1920x480 LCD, HDMI, USB, XLR, MS/SD, 1720g
description-en_US-print: The NEX-EA50EH is a professional NXCAM Camcorder with a large format Exmor™ APS-C HD CMOS sensor and interchangeable E-mount lens system providing exceptional creative freedom when shooting both Full HD movies and high-quality still photos. It is supplied with the newly developed SEL18200PZ18-200mm Power Zoom E-mount lens providing auto focus, continuous variable iris and Optical Steady Shot™ image stabilization with Active Mode, making it ideal for shooting moving images. Film-makers can achieve a constant zoom speed and smooth slow zoom, both of which can be difficult to accomplish with manual zoom lenses. An innovative design with an extendible shoulder-pad allows you to switch between handheld and shoulder-mount operation as required, with no need for additional accessories. This product comes with the full PrimeSupport package. That’s fast, hassle-free repairs, a helpline offering expert technical advice, and a free loan unit while yours is repaired. Plus the peace of mind that Sony is looking after your equipment – and your business.
description-en_US-mobile: Exmor APS HD CMOS, 1080/60p, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") 1920x480 LCD, HDMI, USB, XLR, MS/SD, 1720g
description-de_DE-print:
Die NEX-EA50EH ist ein professioneller NXCAM-Camcorder, der Anwendern mit einem großformatigen Exmor™ APS-C HD CMOS-Sensor und auswechselbaren Objektivsystem mit E-Mount kreative Freiheit bei der Aufnahme von Full HD-Filmen und qualitativ hochwertigen Standbildern bietet. Die NEX-EA50EH ist mit dem neu entwickelten Power-Zoomobjektiv SEL18200PZ (18 - 200 mm) mit E-Mount ausgerüstet, das sich durch einen Autofokus, eine kontinuierlich verstellbare Blende und eine Bildstabilisierung durch Optical Steady Shot™ mit Active Mode auszeichnet. Somit ist sie ideal für die Aufnahme von Bewegtbildern geeignet ist. Filmemacher können eine konstante Zoomgeschwindigkeit und einen gleichmäßigen, langsamen Zoom erreichen, was mit manuellen Zoomobjektiven nur schwer zu realisieren ist.

Dank des innovativen ausfahrbaren Schulterpolsters können Nutzer schnell zwischen Hand- und Schulterkonfiguration wechseln, ohne dass dafür zusätzliches Zubehör erforderlich ist.

Dieses Produkt wird mit einem PrimeSupport-Vertrag geliefert. So profitieren Sie von der technischen Unterstützung durch unsere Helpline, von schnellen, unkomplizierten Reparaturleistungen sowie von der Möglichkeit eines kostenfreien Leihgeräts für die Reparaturdauer und können sich darauf verlassen, dass Ihr Produkt durch Sony geschützt ist.

Die NEX-EA50EH ist ab Oktober 2012 bei Sony Professional Solutions Specialists erhältlich. Vorbestellungen werden von Ihrem Händler vor Ort entgegengenommen.
description-de_DE-mobile: Exmor APS HD CMOS, 1080/60p, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") 1920x480 LCD, HDMI, USB, XLR, MS/SD, 1720g
name: Sony NEX-EA50EH

description-fr_FR-print:
- Boîtier en titane pur résistant aux rayures, avec revêtement dur haute qualité
- Enregistrement vidéo HD 1 920 x 1 080 sur support amovible Memory Stick PRO Duo™ : plus besoin de cassettes ni de disques
- Capteur ClearVid CMOS et avec technologie dérivée Exmor™ pour des images très détaillées avec haute sensibilité et faible bruit
- Processeur d'image haut débit BIONZ pour une meilleure qualité d'image et un temps de réponse plus rapide
- Objectif Carl Zeiss® Vario-Tessar® avec zoom optique 10x / zoom numérique 120x
- La fonction de détection des visages règle automatiquement la mise au point, l'exposition, la balance des couleurs et les tons chair pour des visages à la fois plus nets et plus naturels
- Optimisateur dynamique de densité pour régler l'exposition et le contraste des photos en contre-jour
- Mode x.v.Colour pour des couleurs vives et naturelles
- Enregistrement de photos de 4 mégapixels
- Enregistrement vidéo/photo simultané : images fixes de 2,3 mégapixels et enregistrement vidéo simultanés
- Grand écran tactile 2,7" avec technologie « Clear Photo LCD Plus » permettant d'afficher les images et de contrôler les fonctions
- Bouton « Quick on » pour un démarrage rapide depuis le mode sommeil
- Index des visages, index des scènes et index visuel pour une recherche rapide et facile à l'aide de l'écran tactile
- Enregistrement de son Surround 5.1 avec micro zoom pour une meilleure directivité sonore
- BRAVIA Sync via la connexion HDMI™ pour un contrôle de la lecture grâce à une télécommande compatible avec les téléviseurs BRAVIA
- Sortie PhotoTV HD pour un affichage optimisé des images fixes sur les téléviseurs BRAVIA compatibles
- Connexion haut débit USB 2.0 pour un transfert rapide sur un PC (sortie uniquement).

- Recording on Memory Stick™

description-fr_FR-mobile: CAMILEO BW20 RED IN
description-en_US-print: The camcorder for all seasons Ruggedized and ready for anything, the CAMILEO® BW20 Full HD water- , dust- and shock-proof camcorder offers the versatility and convenience you need to take dazzling high-def movies for life’s great adventures. Soak up the fun At the beach, hiking, sailing, snorkeling, family pool parties, or whatever your activity, this camcorder goes where smartphones fear to tread. And it will stop at nothing to bring you beautiful 1920 x 1080p Full HD video—even while submerged up to 16 feet, with available underwater color correction. Plus, it keeps rolling even after being dropped1. Rough seas ahead? No problem. Video stabilization helps smooth out the action. And when you and your friends are ready to take the plunge, a 5x digital zoom lets you zero in and capture the look on everyone’s face. Take awesome still photos, thanks to a 5-megapixel BSI CMOS sensor. Share your experiences easily with simple YouTube® uploads and HDMI® output to an HDTV. Or swap out cards and shoot longer with a Micro SD slot. Look closely and you’ll discover more beneath the surface with CAMILEO® BW20 Camcorder. - 1 Up to five feet.
description-en_US-mobile: Full-HD 5MP CMOS, 16MP photo, MicroSD-/SDHC-/SDXC, miniHDMI, mini USB 2.0, 132g
description-de_DE-print: Für Ihre schönen Erinnerungen ist der wasserfeste*, extra robuste Camileo BW20 ganz Auge und Ohr – Wasser und anderen Widrigkeiten zeigt er dagegen die kalte Schulter. Dieser sportive Camcorder fühlt sich besonders im Freien wohl: Ob Strandtag, Bootsausflug oder Campingtour, alle Outdoor-Aktivitäten nehmen Sie damit in Full-HD-Qualität mit 1080p-Auflösung auf. Mit elektronischer Bildstabilisierung, entspiegeltem Display und Aufzeichnung bis 5 m Wassertiefe ist er bestens auf Ihre Abenteuer vorbereitet. * Bis 5 m für bis zu 30 Minuten, entsprechend Schutzart IPX8 Hauptmerkmale - Full-HD-Auflösung bis 1920 x 1080p (30 fps) - Wasserfest (bis 5 m)* - Stoßfest (bis 1,5 m) - Staubgeschützt (IP6X) - 5-MP-CMOS-Sensor (BSI) - Optimierte Leistung bei wenig Licht (2 Lux) - Elektronische Bildstabilisierung (EIS) - Unterwassermodus - Entspiegeltes LCD-Display mit 5,08 cm (2") - Schnittstellen: Mini-HDMI, Mini-USB - microSD-Kartensteckplatz - Camileo Uploader-Software
description-de_DE-mobile: Full-HD 5MP CMOS, 16MP photo, MicroSD-/SDHC-/SDXC, miniHDMI, mini USB 2.0, 132g
name: Toshiba CAMILEO BW20

description-fr_FR-mobile: CAMILEO S40 BLUE IN
description-en_US-print:
The Toshiba Full HD Camileo S40 is eye catching in more ways than one. Its attractive, super-slim design allows you to take it everywhere, so you can capture everything that pleases you. Featuring a choice of colour accents, it also doubles as an elegant 16 megapixel digital still camera. Just pull it out of your pocket, and shoot stunning 1920x1080p Full HD video with up to 5x digital zoom. 10x digital zoom is available for HD and VGA resolution. Electronic Image Stabilisation (EIS) is built in for great results -- and sharing to social networks is a breeze thanks to Camileo Uploader software.

- Full HD resolution up to 1920 x 1080p (30fps)
- 5MP CMOS sensor (BSI)
- Optimised low light performance (2 lux)
- Electronic Image Stabiliser (EIS)
- 7,62cm (3") anti-glare touchscreen
- Intuitive navigation
- 5x digital zoom (Full HD), 10x digital zoom (HD, VGA)
- Interfaces: Mini HDMI, micro USB
- MicroSD card slot
- Camileo Uploader software
description-en_US-mobile: Camileo S40, Full HD, 5MP, CMOS, EIS, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, 10x, 128MB NAND, MicroSD, Mini HDMI, micro USB 2.0
description-de_DE-print:
Der Toshiba Camileo S40 mit Full-HD-Auflösung ist ein echter Hingucker – und das im doppelten Sinn. Denn er hat nicht nur ein attraktives, superschlankes Design, mit dem er Sie mühelos überallhin begleitet, sondern macht mit 16 Megapixel Auflösung auch als Fotokamera eine gute Figur – und fällt mit seinen unterschiedlichen Farbakzenten dabei immer angenehm auf. Einfach aus der Tasche ziehen, schon können Sie Full-HD-Videos in beeindruckender 1920x1080p-Auflösung aufnehmen. Dabei steht Ihnen ein 5-facher Digitalzoom zur Verfügung, bei HD- und VGA-Auflösung sogar ein 10-facher. Für perfekte Ergebnisse ist außerdem eine elektronische Bildstabilisierung (EIS) integriert. Und mit der Camileo Uploader-Software können Sie die Ergebnisse im Handumdrehen online mit Freunden teilen!

- Full-HD-Auflösung bis 1920 x 1080p (30 fps)
- 5-MP-CMOS-Sensor (BSI)
- Optimierte Leistung bei wenig Licht (2 Lux)
- Elektronische Bildstabilisierung (EIS)
- Entspiegelter Touchscreen mit 7,62 cm (3")
- Intuitive Navigation
- 5-facher Digitalzoom (Full HD), 10-facher Digitalzoom (HD, VGA)
- Schnittstellen: Mini-HDMI, Micro-USB
- microSD-Kartensteckplatz
- Camileo Uploader-Software

description-en_US-print:
The HVR-HD1000E has been created to meet the growing demand from users who are looking for an entry-level professional shoulder mount design with full 1080i HDV recording as well as retaining DV capabilities.

The HVR-HD1000E's shoulder-mount design and black matte body is similar to that of other professional camcorders; making it perfect for weddings, corporate communications and sporting events where appearance can make a big difference. The ergonomically balanced shoulder mount design also reduces operator fatigue on long shoots where a tripod might not be practical.

As well as offering highdefinition HDVTM1080i recording, the HVR-HD1000E features a built-in down converter to output DV content - ideal for standard DVD productions. It can also record natively in DV, including a Long Play DV mode for maximum flexibility.

For multi-tasking videographers, the HVR-HD1000E also features three special still photo modes - ideal for producing DVD cases and even making wedding photo albums.

Whether you are recording weddings and corporate communications or teaching students, the HVR-HD1000E is simply the best choice on the market today for an entry level, shoulder mount professional camcorder.

description-en_US-print:
Capture every moment with the latest in pocket sized Camcorder technology - the multi-functional Camileo Pro HD. Offering high definition digital video and still image photography, this handy SD based product can go wherever you go and makes capturing clear and colourful memories simple.

Record hours of video and take still pictures up to 8 Megapixel resolution and easily view them on the 2.4" colour TFT LCD screen; it's everything you need for home movies.

Main Features: Digital Video Camcorder and Still Camera; Digital Voice Recorder; Mass Storage Device; 3x Optical & 4x Digital Zoom; H264 video format; 5 mega pixel CMOS sensor; Night Mode.
System Requirements: Windows® 2000/XP/Vista™; Pentium 4 3GHz, or above; 512MB RAM, or above; 1GB free hard disk space; available USB port; CD-ROM drive.
description-en_US-mobile: Camileo Pro HD Camcorde
name: Toshiba Camileo Pro HD

description-en_US-print: HandyCam® Camcorder-Flash/Memory Stick Enjoy easy shooting with the light and compact Standard Definition Memory Stick Camcorder. It features an improved 60x Optical Zoom (70x Extended Zoom), SteadyShot for steadier shoots and intelligent AUTO makes capturing a great shoot easy in any conditions. - 1/8” 800K pixel CCD - Sony Lens 60x optical zoom - 70x Extended Zoom - SteadyShot - 2.7” Wide Clear Photo LCD - PMB portable See The Bigger Picture Get even closer with the new 70x extended zoom feature. Advanced image processing technology ensures almost no visible image degradation, letting you enjoy a greater shooting range, from wide to telephoto. Smooth And Steady Videos, Every Time Whether you're standing still or on the move, SteadyShot drastically reduces camera shake for smooth, blur-free recordings – even when you're zooming in and out. Wider, Clearer, Better The 2.7" Wide Clear Photo LCD screen delivers better visibility, higher screen resolution, sharper contrast and more accurate colour reproduction than ever before. Auto-Correct Settings For Every Shot With Intelligent Auto, it's easy to capture your moments in the best light. Just point your Handycam® at your subject, and the correct camera settings will be adjusted automatically from 18 different scene combinations. It's hassle-free even for first-time users, so you can concentrate on getting your perfect shot and leave the details to us. Detects Faces Automatically The Face Detection feature automatically detects up to eight faces in a scene, optimising the exposure for the best results. It's handy for quick and easy shooting of scenes with people, guaranteeing correct exposures and bright faces every time. Capture Great Videos, Even In The Dark Shoot clear, vivid videos in low light conditions with the built-in LED video light. Bright and energy-efficient, it can illuminate any subject up to 1.5 metres. Picture MotionBrowser (PMB) Share your videos easily with PMB Portable, already embedded in your Handycam®. PMB Portable lets you upload videos to Facebook and YouTube easily when you connect your Handycam® to a computer via a USB cable – no installation required. For advanced importing options, check out the full version of PMB in the CD-ROM provided with every Handycam®. Direct Copy With Direct Copy, you can also back up videos directly onto your external hard drive, via a USB adapter. Dual-Compatibility Memory Card Slot Shoot and store more on your Handycam® with a memory card slot that's compatible with both MS and SD cards.
