description-fr_FR-print: Doté de deux logements pour carte mémoire SDHC, le LEGRIA HF S200 offre une grande souplesse d'enregistrement. Le Système vidéo Canon HD offre une qualité HD inégalée, et sa fonction d'enregistrement "relais" bascule automatiquement entre les cartes. - Système vidéo Canon HD 8 millions de pixels - Écran LCD tactile 8,8cm (3,5 pouces) - Deux logements pour carte mémoire SDHC - Enregistrement "relais" et conversion HD-SD - Molette de contrôle manuel, prise pour télécommande - Son de haute qualité - Stabilisateur d'image optique dynamique et stabilisateur d'image motorisé - Pré-enregistrement, AF instantané - x.v.Color ; mode Cinéma 25p - Système extensible Enregistrement HD flexible : votre imagination est la seule limite. Système vidéo Canon HD 8 millions de pixels Obtenez des images époustouflantes et d'excellentes performances en conditions de faible luminosité grâce au système vidéo Canon HD : le LEGRIA HF S200 associe un capteur CMOS Full HD 8 millions de pixels, un objectif vidéo HD Canon et le processeur DIGIC DV III. Écran LCD tactile 8,8cm (3,5 pouces) Un écran LCD tactile 8,8cm (3,5 pouces) haute résolution permet un affichage complet et très détaillé pour l'enregistrement de vidéos HD. Grâce à une interface LCD unique basée sur les gestes, les fonctions d'enregistrement et de lecture telles que le suivi tactile, la mise au point tactile et l'exposition tactile sont accessibles du bout des doigts. Enregistrement sur carte mémoire Enregistrez directement vos vidéos sur des cartes mémoire haute capacité. Une carte de 32 Go permet de stocker plus de 12 heures de vidéo HD. Grâce aux deux logements pour carte mémoire et à l'enregistrement "relais", l'enregistrement bascule d'une carte à l'autre lorsque l'une d'entre elles est pleine. Partage de vidéos simplifié Pour un partage facile des vidéos, le LEGRIA HF S200 vous permet de convertir des fichiers AVCHD (MPEG4) en fichiers MPEG2 de Définition Standard moins volumineux, pouvant être gravés sur DVD ou téléchargés sur Internet. Contrôle professionnel La touche personnalisable vous permet d'activer l'une des cinq fonctions pouvant être attribuées à la molette de contrôle manuel, telles que la mise au point, l'exposition ou le volume audio. Une prise spécifique vous permet d'utiliser les télécommandes externes disponibles en option. Une qualité audio incomparable Enregistrez et contrôlez un son de qualité supérieure avec une entrée microphone et une prise casque. L'atténuateur de micro configurable élimine les sauts de volume pour garantir un enregistrement audio impeccable. Des images plus stables Grâce au stabilisateur d'image optique doté du nouveau mode dynamique, vous réaliserez des séquences plus stables, même lorsque vous bougez. Le stabilisateur d'image motorisé assure une grande stabilité des images sur l'ensemble de la plage de focales. Ne laissez rien vous échapper ! Lorsque vous sélectionnez le mode pré-enregistrement, le caméscope commence à enregistrer trois secondes avant que vous n'appuyiez sur la touche d'enregistrement. Ces secondes sont ajoutées au début de chaque séquence vidéo, ce qui vous évite de manquer un moment crucial, même si vous appuyez trop tard sur la touche d'enregistrement. L'AF instantané permet une mise au point rapide et extrêmement précise. Couleur étendue Le processeur DIGIC DV III prend en charge l'espace couleurs x.v.Color pour des teintes plus profondes et plus riches lorsque les vidéos sont lues sur un téléviseur HD compatible. Le mode Cinéma 25p donne à vos vidéos l'aspect du film de cinéma traditionnel et optimise les images en conditions de faible éclairage. Accessoires créatifs La mini griffe porte-accessoires perfectionnée permet d'utiliser des périphériques en option, tels qu'un éclairage vidéo. Le filetage de l'objectif 58 mm est compatible avec les filtres professionnels.
description-fr_FR-mobile: HF S200 - 1/2.6-CMOS, 8,59 Megapixel, 10x optical zoom, DIGIC DV III, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") LCD, 0.3 Lux, SD/SDHC, USB 2.0
description-en_US-print: With two SDHC memory card slots, the LEGRIA HF S200 offers versatile recording. While Relay Recording automatically switches between cards, the Canon HD Camera System delivers ultimate HD quality. 8MP Canon HD Camera System Get stunning images and superb low-light performance via the Canon HD Camera System: the LEGRIA HF S200 combines an 8.0MP Full HD CMOS sensor, a Canon HD Video Lens, and the DIGIC DV III processor. 8.8cm (3.5”) touch-screen LCD A high-resolution 8.8cm (3.5”) touch-screen LCD offers a highly detailed, 100% view for shooting HD movies. A unique, gesture-based LCD interface gives you fingertip access to shooting and playback functions, including Touch Tracking, Touch Focus and Touch Exposure modes. Memory card recording Record directly to high capacity SDHC memory cards – a 32GB card can store over 12 hours of HD movies. Dual card slots with Relay Recording mean recording will automatically switch between cards when one becomes full. Easy movie sharing For easier sharing of your movies, the LEGRIA HF S200 lets you convert AVCHD (MPEG4) files to smaller, standard definition MPEG2 files, ready for burning to DVD or uploading to the web. Professional control A Custom Key lets you activate one of five variables that can be assigned to the manual Control Dial, including focus, exposure, and audio level. A remote control jack input enables the use of optional external remote controls. Audio excellence Capture and monitor superior audio with a microphone input connection and headphone jack. An configurable Mic Attenuator compensates for sudden volume changes, ensuring that audio is always recorded at the optimum level. Steadier shots An Optical Image Stabilizer with a new Dynamic mode lets you record steadier footage, even when you’re moving. Powered IS keeps footage super-steady when shooting at the telephoto end of the zoom range. Don’t miss a thing In Pre REC mode, the camcorder starts recording three seconds before the Record button is pressed. These seconds are added to the beginning of each clip, so you can still capture that crucial moment even if you pressed the Record button too late. Instant AF achieves highly accurate focus at speed. Extended colour DIGIC DV III supports x.v.Color – for deeper, richer hues during playback on compatible HDTVs. 25p Cinema Mode matches the look of traditional film, and provides enhanced low-light shooting performance. Creative extras With a mini Advanced Accessory Shoe, optional accessories – such as a video light – can be used. The 58mm lens thread is compatible with professional filters.
description-en_US-mobile: HF S200 - 1/2.6-CMOS, 8,59 Megapixel, 10x optical zoom, DIGIC DV III, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") LCD, 0.3 Lux, SD/SDHC, USB 2.0
description-de_DE-print: Der LEGRIA HF S200 mit zwei SDHC-Speicherkartenslots bietet vielseitige Aufzeichnungsmöglickeiten. Per Relay Recording wechselt er automatisch für unterbrechungsfreie Aufzeichnung zur nächsten Speicherkarte; das Canon HD Camera System sorgt für brillante HD-Qualität. Canon HD Camera System (8 Megapixel) Das einzigartige Canon HD Camera System des LEGRIA HF S200 aus Full HD-CMOS-Sensor mit 8,0 Megapixeln, Canon HD-Videoobjektiv und DIGIC DV III-Prozessor sorgt für exzellente Bildqualität und überzeugende Leistung auch bei wenig Licht. 8,8 cm (3,5 Zoll) Touchscreen-LCD und elektronischer Sucher Das hoch auflösende 8,8 cm (3,5 Zoll) Touchscreen-LCD unterstützt Sie beim Aufzeichnen von HD-Videoclips. Das innovative Touch Control LC-Display gibt schnellen Zugriff auf Funktionen wie Nachführung, Scharfstellung und Belichtung. Aufzeichnung auf Speicherkarten Die Aufnahmen werden direkt auf SDHC-Speicherkarten (High Capacity) aufgezeichnet. Eine 32-GB-Karte bietet ausreichend Speicherplatz für über 12 Stunden Videomaterial. Die Funktion Relay Recording ist dabei besonders praktisch: Es wird automatisch erkannt, wenn eine Speicherkarte voll ist und ohne Unterbrechung zur anderen gewechselt. Einfach Videos (Ver-)Teilen Damit Sie Ihre Videoclips noch einfacher weitergeben können, können die AVCHD-Dateien (MPEG4) mit dem LEGRIA HF S200 in Standard Definition MPEG2-Dateien mit geringerem Datenvolumen konvertiert werden, zum Brennen auf DVD oder für den Web-Upload. Professionelle Steuerung Über die Custom-Taste lässt sich das manuelle Wählrad mit einer von fünf Einstellungen, z. B. für Scharfstellung, Belichtung oder Audiopegel, belegen. Über einen entsprechenden Anschluss lässt sich der Camcorder über optional erhältliche externe Fernsteuerungen bedienen. Exzellente Tonqualität Über den Mikrofoneingang und den Kopfhöreranschluss erreichen Sie eine hervorragende Tonqualität. Ein konfigurierbares Mikrofondämpfungselement kompensiert plötzliche Lautstärkeänderungen und stellt dabei sicher, dass die Audiospur immer mit optimalem Pegel aufgezeichnet wird. Gestochen scharfe Aufnahmen Der optische Bildstabilisator hat einen neuen Dynamik-Modus, der Verwacklungsunschärfen noch effektiver verringert, auch wenn Sie sich bewegen. Der Powered IS reduziert Verwacklungsunschärfen besonders bei Aufnahmen im Telebereich.

Relay Recording automatically detects when one storage medium is full, and switches to the other. Easy movie sharing For easier sharing of your movies, the LEGRIA HF S20 lets you convert AVCHD (MPEG4) files to smaller, standard definition MPEG2 files, ready for burning to DVD or uploading to the web. Professional control A Custom Key lets you activate one of five variables that can be assigned to the manual Control Dial, including focus, exposure, and audio level. A remote control jack input enables the use of optional external remote controls. Audio excellence Capture and monitor superior audio with a microphone input connection and headphone jack. A configurable Mic Attenuator compensates for sudden volume changes, ensuring that audio is always recorded at the optimum level. Steadier shots An Optical Image Stabilizer with a new Dynamic mode lets you record steadier footage, even when you’re moving. Powered IS keeps footage super-steady when shooting at the telephoto end of the zoom range. Don’t miss a thing In Pre REC mode, the camcorder starts recording three seconds before the Record button is pressed. These seconds are added to the beginning of each clip, so you can still capture that crucial moment even if you pressed the Record button too late. Instant AF achieves highly accurate focus at speed.

La technologie utilisée est capable de traiter 12 visages à la fois, aussi bien en mode vidéo que pour les instantanés. Chaque prise de vue se fait au plus près... C'est vous la star! Principales caractéristiques - Enregistrement de films haute définition - Photos haute résolution - Zoom optique de 9x - Ecran large à cristaux liquides - Capacité de prise de vues sous faible éclairage (3 lux) - Emplacement de carte SD/SDHC/SDXC - Détection des visages

description-en_US-print: The ultra compact Camileo SX900 features Full HD (1920 x 1080p) video and high resolution digital image capture. Excellent low light capability ensures you can capture fantastic quality video and still photos all day long. The 9x optical zoom makes simple work of capturing distant subjects, while face and colour detection in photo mode allows to keep your targets in focus at all times. With an HDMI output, playing back your footage on your HD TV is easy. The ultra sleek barrel grip design makes the SX900 easy to take anywhere with you, and with multiple scene modes, focus and light settings, the SX900 helps you capture all your precious memories in Full HD. - Capteur CMOS ClearVid 3x pour une meilleure reproduction des couleurs
- Stabilisateur d'image optique
- Objectif Carl Zeiss® Vario-Sonnar® T* de précision ED (Extra-low Dispersion)
- Zoom optique 20x avec extension numérique 1,5x
- Grand écran ACL hybride 3,5" avec technologie « Clear Photo LCD Plus » (adapté à la haute définition)
- Viseur couleur 16/9
- Bague de mise au point et de zoom manuelle indépendante
- Réglage manuel du gain, de l'iris, de la vitesse d'obturation, de la balance des blancs et du niveau audio
- Assistance à la prise de vue : Zebra (luminosité), Colour peaking (mise au point), Histogram (réparition de la luminosité)
- Modes « Picture profile » et « Camera profile » (conservent vos réglages préférés)
- Sortie HDMI™
- Entrée / sortie i.LINK™ pour HDV et DV

description-fr_FR-mobile: HDR-FX7E - 20x opt., 8.89 cm (3.5 ") LCD, 1/4" CMOS, HDV
description-en_US-print:
-“Full-HDV” High Definition recording. 
-New 3ClearVid CMOS Sensor system with Enhanced Imaging Processor. 
-Carl Zeiss® Vario-Sonnar T* with 20x optical zoom. 
-3.5” Wide Clear Photo LCD plus screen. 
-Advanced manual functions. 
-Compact and light weight plus 8-hour recording with STAMINA battery.    

   7th September 2006 - Serious amateur videographers can enjoy superb High Definition picture quality with the first ever HDV camcorder featuring the revolutionary Sony-developed 3ClearVid CMOS Sensor system. Teamed with the camera’s superb Carl Zeiss® Vario-Sonnar T* 20x optical zoom lens, the new 3ClearVid sensor delivers High Definition pictures with exceptional resolution, purity and natural colour reproduction.
   The new HDR-FX7E extends the benefits of 1080-line “full-HDV” shooting to a wide range of applications. Its HDMI interface allows digital connection of uncompressed High Definition video and audio signals to HD-ready televisions and other displays via a single cable. Recorded HDV video can be conveniently edited with a choice of available HDV non-linear editing software. Capturing widescreen 16:9 HDV 1080i video on standard MiniDV tapes, the HDR FX7E can also record and playback standard definition DV format signals.
   40% smaller and 25% lighter than the first-generation HDR-FX1E, the HDR FX7E Handycam combines superb performance with a wide range of manual control functions and exceptional battery life.
description-en_US-mobile: Full-HDV 1080i camcorder. High Definition Video Handycam with 3ClearVid CMOS Sensor, 20x optical zoom Carl Zeiss® Vario-Sonnar T* lens and a host of manual features.

- Komponenten-Videoeingang, S-Video, Videoausgang

description-en_US-print: A compact and manoeuvrable camcorder that delivers professional-quality HDV1080i recording, the XH A1S provides total user control with a comprehensive array of custom settings and presets. Professional-quality HDV recording The XH A1S delivers 1080i HD recording with selectable frame rates of 50i and 25F. Choose 50i and shoot with ultra-crisp realism, or adopt 25F for the traditional look of film. 24F/30F/60i shooting modes are available via an optional upgrade, for truly global recording capability. The power of 3CCD and DIGIC High-resolution shooting is enabled by a 1/3” 1.67 megapixel 3CCD sensor system that works in harmony with Canon’s DIGIC DV II – a processor built to handle the amount of data required for HD. Canon L-series HD Video Lens Canon has redesigned the 20x L-series HD Video Lens to make it more comfortable to use, and more efficient in operation. The lens now features a new control ring design, as well as simultaneous, independent control of Focus, Iris and Zoom. Lens ring operation can be modified to suit the individual user’s needs. Fluorite lens elements and Ultra-Low Dispersion (UD) glass are used to combat chromatic aberrations, so users can expect exceptional clarity, while a shift-type Super Range Optical Image Stabiliser (OIS) helps ensure footage remains steady. Enhanced audio functionality Canon has increased the audio options on the XH A1S to give cameramen greater flexibility and control. The camera incorporates twin XLR audio inputs but adds independent limiters in manual mode and simultaneous use of built-in and XLR microphones. Independent XLR sensitivity settings are also included. Advanced image control The range of image adjustment functions has been expanded and includes options such as wider white balance adjustment (from 2000k to 15000k), selective RGB noise reduction options and Auto Gain Control (AGC) limit – with increased fine-tuning options. Up to nine Custom Presets can be stored in-camera or to SD memory card for easy transfer to a compatible Canon camcorder. More robust, easier to use The XH A1S is easy to use, featuring improvements in the layout of exterior buttons to prevent accidental operation. Mechanical refinements include sturdier terminals such as a 6-pin Firewire connection. Canon CPS Video Support Canon’s exclusive CPS Video Support offers users a priority repair service and email and phone support from a dedicated team.
description-en_US-mobile: XH A1s, 20x Optical Zoom, 4.5 - 90mm, f/1.6 - 3.5, 1/3" CCD, 7.112 cm (2.8 ") LCD
name: Canon XH A1s

description-en_US-print: - 3x 1/3” 800.000 pixel progressive scan CCDs. - 50i & 25p frame rate. - Total manual image control. - Pro Quality 16:9 and 4:3 recording. - XL interchangeable lens system. - 20x optical zoom "L-Series" lens with zoom and focus presets. - Super range Optical Image Stabilizer. - Flourite lens component and 2 Independent neutral density filters. - Professional audio and video connectivity - 4 audio channels with 2 built-in XLR connectors, phantonm power and BNC video output. - SMPTE time code with Rec Run, Free Run and preset settings. - IEEE1394 for remote camera control and direct recording to PC. - Fully adjustable EVF and shared 2" LCD. Professional’s choice With 3x 1/3” 800k progressive scan CCDs, the broadcast quality XL2 is the flagship of the Canon range, setting the standard in versatile, light-weight professional digital video. Revolutionising its class, the XL2 provides full manual control over a myriad of variables, allowing all the fine adjustments necessary to satisfy even the most demanding professional videographer. Both 16:9 (960 x 576 effective pixels) and 4:3 (720 x 576 effective pixels) formats are supported. A 3rd generation signal processing LSI delivers outstanding Signal/Noise ratio performance, with high sensibility and low smear. Cine feel Film-like texture, tone and expression are now routine, with 25p recording and a special Cine Look mode. Gamma curve controls include Knee adjustments to tame white clipping and Black controls bring out or suppress detail in the low brightness areas. Colour matrix is selectable from Video and Cinema, while V Detail allows flexible resolution in the vertical direction. Skin Detail allows control over phase and chroma for softer, warmer skin tones. A Film Grain setting adds the warmth and natural compression of film. Manual control is provided over Master RGB, Setup level, Master Pedestal, Gain, Coring, Sharpness, Noise Reduction, Colour Gain and Hue. ControlLens Fluorite and aspheric elements in the 20x zoom lens eliminate both chromatic and spherical aberrations. A circular iris provides beautiful background blur and built-in neutral density (ND) filters allow the iris to open fully in harsh light conditions. The XL mount system is compatible with all XL video lenses, and over 60 Canon EF lenses via an optional adapter. Go steady Optical image stabilization (OIS) eliminates unwanted camera shake before the image reaches the sensor. SuperRange OIS extends IS by examining the image after it is received by the sensor and suppressing low frequency movements. In sync Both Rec Run and Free Run SMPTE time code is supported. 2 built-in phantom powered XLR jacks and a BNC jack for monitor output is provided. An IEEE1394 connection allows direct hard disk recording.
description-en_US-mobile: XL2 - 0.8 Megapixels, 20x, 1/3", CCD, LCD, Mini-DV
name: Canon XL XL2

description-en_US-print: With an innovative touch-screen interface, enhanced Video Snapshot and Smart Auto, the compact and stylish LEGRIA HF M31 offers effortless Full HD shooting in any situation. - 32GB Dual Flash Memory and Relay Recording - Easy HD Shooting - 6.8cm (2.7”) touch-screen LCD - Video Snapshot - 3.3MP Canon HD Camera System - Dynamic OIS and Powered IS - Easy sharing - Pre REC, 25p Cinema Mode – plus 3.3MP stills - Superior audio - Flexible system Dual Flash Memory With 32GB of Dual Flash Memory, the LEGRIA HF M31 offers both internal capacity and memory card shooting. And, with Relay recording, you’ll never have to stop shooting to change media; if the built-in memory becomes full, Relay recording will automatically continue on an SD or SDHC card. Easy HD shooting Shooting HD has never been easier. Smart Auto’s scene recognition technology optimises settings according to the situation, whether it’s a dramatic sunset or a family event. Instant AF achieves pin-sharp focus quickly and Face Detection Technology optimises shooting settings for perfect people shots. Touch-screen technology The LEGRIA HF M31 provides a unique way to control your camcorder. The large 6.8cm (2.7”) touch-screen enables you to control of the camcorder’s shooting and playback functions with simple on-screen gestures for a new, more intuitive way of movie-making. Canon HD Camera System The Canon HD Camera System combines a 3.3MP Full HD CMOS sensor, an 18x optical zoom Canon HD Video Lens and the DIGIC DV III processor to deliver superb Full HD movies. Dynamic OIS and Powered IS When shooting video, small shakes of the camcorder can appear magnified in playback. To counter this, the LEGRIA HF M31 uses two systems of image stabilisation – Dynamic Optical Image Stabilizer reduces shake caused when shooting while walking and Powered Image Stabilizer keeps the image steady for telephoto shots. Easy sharing Sharing your videos is easier than ever before with the LEGRIA HF M31. In-camera HD to SD conversion lets you reduce the size of your files in-camera, while the bundled PIXELA software makes uploading a breeze. Pre REC, 25p Cinema Mode – plus 3.3MP stills The LEGRIA HF M31 has many shooting features for creating better movies. In Pre REC mode, the camcorder starts recording three seconds before the Record button is pressed, so you won’t miss any of the action. 25p cinema mode creates more cinematic-looking movies. And you can even snap 3.3MP still photos to complement your movies. Flexible system The LEGRIA HF M31 has a built-in HDMI connection for direct output to an HDTV, while a built-in mic and headphone jack enable you to capture better audio. The mini Advanced Accessory Shoe and a range of accessories – including the WP-V2 Waterproof case for taking your camcorder swimming or snorkelling – allow the HF M31 to grow with your experience.
description-en_US-mobile: LEGRIA HF M31 - 32GB, 2.7” LCD, 3.3MP, 1/4" CMOS, opt. 15x, DIGIC DV III, 0.4 lux, TTL, 2304 x 1296
name: Canon LEGRIA HF M31

description-en_US-print: Canon’s most advanced flash memory camcorder, the LEGRIA HF S21 puts pro-level HD shooting in your hands. Stunning Full HD imaging combines with the storage capacity of 64GB Dual Flash Memory. 8MP Canon HD Camera System Get stunning images and superb low-light performance via the Canon HD Camera System: the LEGRIA HF S21 combines an 8.0MP Full HD CMOS sensor, a Canon HD Video Lens, and the DIGIC DV III processor. 8.8cm (3.5”) touch-screen LCD and EVF A high-resolution 8.8cm (3.5”) touch-screen LCD offers a 100% view for shooting HD movies. A unique, gesture-based LCD interface gives you fingertip access to functions such as Touch Tracking, Touch Focus and Touch Exposure modes. The LEGRIA HF S21 also features a colour EVF for framing the scene. 64GB Dual Flash Memory 64GB Dual Flash Memory combines large built-in capacity – enough for over 24 hours of HD movies – with dual SDHC slots for recording to memory cards. Relay Recording automatically detects when one storage medium is full, and switches to the other. Easy movie sharing For easier sharing of your movies, the LEGRIA HF S21 lets you convert AVCHD (MPEG4) files to smaller, standard definition MPEG2 files, ready for burning to DVD or uploading to the web. Professional control A Custom Key lets you activate one of five variables that can be assigned to the manual Control Dial, including focus, exposure, and audio level. A remote control jack enables the use of optional external remote controls. Audio excellence Capture and monitor superior audio with a microphone input and headphone jack. A configurable Mic Attenuator compensates for sudden volume changes, ensuring that audio is always recorded at the optimum level. Steadier shots An Optical Image Stabilizer with a new Dynamic mode lets you record steadier footage, even when you’re moving. Powered IS keeps footage super-steady when shooting at the telephoto end of the zoom range. Don’t miss a thing In Pre REC mode, the camcorder starts recording three seconds before the Record button is pressed. These seconds are added to the beginning of each clip, so you can still capture that crucial moment even if you press the Record button too late. Instant AF achieves highly accurate focus at speed.
description-en_US-mobile: LEGRIA HF S21 - 8MP, 8.8cm (3.5”) touch-screen LCD, 64GB Dual Flash Memory, IS
name: Canon LEGRIA HF S21

name: Canon LEGRIA HFM32

description-en_US-print: KODAK PLAYTOUCH Video Camera Go ahead. Touch it. You know you want to. Its unique touchscreen lets you glide through HD video like never before. That’s the beauty of the KODAK PLAYTOUCH Video Camera. It puts the high-end features you want right at your fingertips. With on-screen editing, you can easily keep the moments you want and trim the ones you don’t. And when you’re ready to turn today’s escapades into tomorrow’s buzz, getting them online is easier than ever. Just press the Share button and your videos are automatically ready for the Web. With the KODAK PLAYTOUCH Video Camera, the power to be seen is as simple as touching a screen. The real KODAK MOMENT happens when you share. One-button upload—turn moments into memories With the Share button and Kodak's Share button app, sharing your pictures is amazingly simple. - Record your video or snap your picture; - Press the Share button and tag it to KODAK Gallery, YouTube, FACEBOOK, FLICKR, and ORKUT sites, plus e-mail too; - Connect your PLAYTOUCH to your computer, and with Kodak’s Share button app, your videos and pictures are automatically uploaded; - Your pictures and videos are also automatically transferred to your computer. Turn today’s escapades into tomorrow’s buzz—in HD - The bright 3.0 in. capacitive touchscreen LCD is optimized for reviewing in landscape mode to give you the ultimate 1080p HD video-sharing experience; - There’s always room for more—record up to 10 hours of HD video with expandable SD/SDHC card slot (up to 32 GB). The power to edit in the palm of your hand - The KODAK PLAYTOUCH features on-camera editing capability, so you can fine-tune your footage, cut out what you don’t want, or extract still images from video; - When you’re ready to upload, just press Share, choose your destination, pop out the USB arm, and you’re good to go. You’re the director - Choose the video quality that works for you: - Full 1080p HD at 30 fps; - 720p HD at 60 fps—great for super-slow-motion playback; - 720p HD at 30 fps; - WVGA at 30 fps—good for smaller files; - You can even take 5 MP HD still pictures; - Define your style with four capture effects, including black and white, sepia, high saturation, and 1970’s film look; - Catch the highlights with slow-motion playback right in the palm of your hand; - Record from a distance or play back on your TV conveniently with the optional remote. Don’t let sun glare ruin your recording - Simply use your camera settings to turn on the LCD Glare Shield feature; - LCD Glare Shield feature gives you two filters to choose from that help you see your subject on the display screen in reflective outdoor situations; - These filters are only applied to your display screen, not your footage, so everything you record will look as great as the moment you shot it. Smooth, stable, and always able - Get sharper videos and less blur thanks to built-in digital image stabilization; - Capture your friends in their best light with smart face tracking technology; - See more details and accurate colors with incredible low-light performance. Ready for the big screen—right out of the box - Built-in USB arm makes it easy to debut your videos on your computer and automatically e-mail or share to your favorite site; - Capture more moments thanks to the rechargeable Li-Ion battery with in-camera charging; - It doesn’t matter if you own a MAC or a PC—the KODAK PLAYTOUCH is compatible with both; - Complimentary HDMI cable lets your videos debut in full glory on your HDTV. Peace of mind when you’re showing off - Safe Mode protects your videos and settings while you let others enjoy your PLAYTOUCH—it allows the user to take and review videos and pictures, but edit, share, and delete functions are disabled; - Safe Mode also locks many of your settings, so until safe mode is turned off they cannot be changed during use. Be creative with great video software - Edit and trim videos; - Add a voice-over to narrate your footage when editing on a PC; - Add pictures and music to your videos to make cool mash-ups; - Grab and edit still images from video frames to get that perfect shot. Shoot, watch, and share 1080p HD video right out of the box - KODAK PLAYTOUCH Video Camera; - KODAK Li-Ion Rechargeable Digital Camera Battery KLIC-7004; - USB cable and adapter for camera charging; - HDMI and AV cables; - Premium wrist strap; - Camera pouch; - User Guide; - ARCSOFT MEDIA IMPRESSION Software for Kodak (on-camera, PC only).
description-en_US-mobile: 1355692, 1/3.2''CMOS, 3.0''LCD, 4x, 5 mp, 1920x1080/30 fps, MPEG-4, USB 2.0, AV out, HDMI, 128 MB, 100g, black
name: Kodak 1355692 hand-held camcorder

description-en_US-print: KODAK Mini Video Camera Did that just happen? Some moments in life need an instant replay button. With the KODAK Mini Video Camera you’ve got one with you wherever you go. This itty-bitty video camera easily slides into a pocket—even your skinny jeans. With one touch, the KODAK Mini captures all the highlights, and the pop-out USB arm makes it seriously simple to share the fun on FACEBOOK and YouTube sites. Plus, it’s built to withstand your craziest days—from a fumble in the rain, to a trip to the bottom of your bag. The Mini is ready when you are—so the next time you hear, “Did that just happen?” you can show the instant replay. The real KODAK Moment happens when you share. Itty-bitty size. Big video fun. - The size of a credit card, this ultra-thin, lightweight video camera can go anywhere; - Take it where life takes you so you can capture all the fun; - The Mini’s sleek design lets you slip it into any pocket or purse. Capture your craziest days with no worries - Dive into the fun—its waterproof design helps protect it should things get a bit wet and wild—rain, snow, or even in the pool; - Accidents happen, and luckily the Mini isn’t afraid of a little fall—it’s built to take it. Make a scene wherever you go - No cables to worry about, just pop out the USB arm to upload, share, and charge; - Share on FACEBOOK and YouTube sites with ease—built-in software and USB arm make editing, uploading, and sending e-mail simple; - Replay your videos instantly with the vivid, high-contrast 1.8 in. color LCD; - See more details and accurate colors with enhanced low-light performance. What you get. And how you use it. - Capture more moments thanks to the rechargeable Li-Polymer battery with in-camera charging; - It doesn’t matter if you own a MAC or a PC—the KODAK Mini is compatible with both; - There’s always room for more—record hours of video with expandable card slot and included 2 GB MICROSD card. Be creative with great video software - Cut and trim videos; - Transform video frames into amazing photos; - Add effects to your movies (black-and-white, sepia, old movie, fisheye, exposure, sketch, sharpen, negative, water color, and mute audio). What's in the box - KODAK Mini Video Camera; - 2 GB MICROSD Memory Card; - User Guide; - ARCSOFT MEDIA IMPRESSION SE Software for Kodak (stored in camera memory, for PC only).
description-de_DE-print: KODAK Mini-Videokamera Ist das wirklich gerade passiert? Es gibt Momente im Leben, die möchte man sich einfach noch einmal ansehen. Mit der KODAK Mini-Videokamera ist das jetzt möglich. Die klitzekleine Videokamera lässt sich einfach in die Hosentasche stecken – auch wenn die Jeans noch so eng ist. Mit nur einem Knopfdruck halten Sie mit der KODAK Mini die besonderen Momente in Ihrem Leben fest, und dank des herausziehbaren USB-Arms ist es ganz einfach, den Videospaß auf FACEBOOK und YouTube weiterzugeben. Und dabei ist sie so robust, dass sie selbst den chaotischsten Tag übersteht. Sie werden vom Regen überrascht? Kein Problem. Die Mini ist allzeit bereit. Wenn Sie also das nächste Mal hören: "Ist das wirklich gerade passiert?", haben Sie den Beweis. So richtig KODAK wird's erst beim Weitergeben. Klitzeklein. Großer Videospaß. - Diese ultradünne, leichte Videokamera hat gerade einmal die Größe einer Kreditkarte und ist damit der ideale Begleiter; - Nehmen Sie sie überall mit hin und halten Sie die lustigen Momente fest; - Mit ihrem eleganten Design passt die Mini in jede Tasche. Halten Sie ganz entspannt Ihre aufregendsten Momente fest - Tauchen Sie ein in das Vergnügen: Dank ihres wasserdichten Gehäuses macht es gar nichts, wenn Wasser ins Spiel kommt – sei es Regen, Schnee oder sogar der Pool; - Wenn es etwas wilder zugeht, darf Ihnen die Mini auch einmal aus der Hand fallen: Das robuste Design steckt das weg. Setzen Sie jede Situation in Szene - Für Hochladen, Weitergeben und Aufladen einfach den USB-Arm ausklappen – ganz ohne den Einsatz von Kabeln; - Dank der integrierten Software und dem USB-Arm ist es kein Problem, Aufnahmen auf FACEBOOK und YouTube hochzuladen oder per E-Mail zu versenden; - Betrachten Sie Ihre Videos direkt auf dem klaren, kontrastreichen 4,6 cm (1,8") -LC-Farbdisplay; - Auch bei schwierigen Lichtverhältnissen erhalten Sie detailgetreue Aufnahmen mit lebendigen Farben. Das ist im Paket enthalten – für einen noch größeren Videospaß - Dank des Li-Polymer-Akkus und der integrierten Ladefunktion halten Sie noch mehr Erinnerungen fest; - MAC- oder PC-Fan? Die KODAK Mini ist mit beiden Systemen kompatibel; - Wenn es einmal länger dauert: Der erweiterbare Speicherkartensteckplatz für MICROSD/MICROSDHC-Karten ermöglicht stundenlange Videoaufnahmen. Werden Sie kreativ mit der leistungsfähigen Video-Software - Bearbeiten Sie Ihre Videos mit Funktionen wie Schneiden und Ausschneiden; - Fertigen Sie atemberaubende Fotos von Videoframes an; - Verwenden Sie Effekte für Ihre Videos (Schwarzweiß, Sepia, alter Film, Fischauge, Belichtung, Skizze, Schärfen, Negativ, Wasserfarbe und Stumm (kein Ton)). Lieferumfang KODAK Mini-Videokamera; Benutzerhandbuch; ARCSOFT MEDIA IMPRESSION SE-Software für Kodak (im Speicher der Kamera, nur für PC).
name: Kodak 1374883 hand-held camcorder

description-en_US-print: KODAK Mini Video Camera Did that just happen? Some moments in life need an instant replay button. With the KODAK Mini Video Camera you’ve got one with you wherever you go. This itty-bitty video camera easily slides into a pocket—even your skinny jeans. With one touch, the KODAK Mini captures all the highlights, and the pop-out USB arm makes it seriously simple to share the fun on FACEBOOK and YouTube sites. Plus, it’s built to withstand your craziest days—from a fumble in the rain, to a trip to the bottom of your bag. The Mini is ready when you are—so the next time you hear, “Did that just happen?” you can show the instant replay. The real KODAK Moment happens when you share. Itty-bitty size. Big video fun. - The size of a credit card, this ultra-thin, lightweight video camera can go anywhere; - Take it where life takes you so you can capture all the fun; - The Mini’s sleek design lets you slip it into any pocket or purse. Capture your craziest days with no worries - Dive into the fun—its waterproof design helps protect it should things get a bit wet and wild—rain, snow, or even in the pool; - Accidents happen, and luckily the Mini isn’t afraid of a little fall—it’s built to take it. Make a scene wherever you go - No cables to worry about, just pop out the USB arm to upload, share, and charge; - Share on FACEBOOK and YouTube sites with ease—built-in software and USB arm make editing, uploading, and sending e-mail simple; - Replay your videos instantly with the vivid, high-contrast 1.8 in. color LCD; - See more details and accurate colors with enhanced low-light performance. What you get. And how you use it. - Capture more moments thanks to the rechargeable Li-Polymer battery with in-camera charging; - It doesn’t matter if you own a MAC or a PC—the KODAK Mini is compatible with both; - There’s always room for more—record hours of video with expandable card slot and included 2 GB MICROSD card. Be creative with great video software - Cut and trim videos; - Transform video frames into amazing photos; - Add effects to your movies (black-and-white, sepia, old movie, fisheye, exposure, sketch, sharpen, negative, water color, and mute audio). What's in the box - KODAK Mini Video Camera; - 2 GB MICROSD Memory Card; - User Guide; - ARCSOFT MEDIA IMPRESSION SE Software for Kodak (stored in camera memory, for PC only).

description-en_US-print: Canon XF300 The XF300, one of Canon’s first file-based professional camcorders, combines an MPEG-2, 50Mbps, 4:2:2 codec with a Canon L-series lens and 3 Full HD CMOS sensors for superb HD video stored on CF card. Capture high quality HD to CF cards The XF300 records MPEG-2 MXF (Media eXchange Format) files – up to 1920 x 1080 Full HD at 50Mbps (4:2:2) – to CompactFlash (CF) memory cards. CF media is inexpensive and widely available: dual card slots allow filming to continue without interruption. Flexible editing Integrating seamlessly with existing workflows, movies shot on the XF300 are captured as industry-standard MXF files compatible with all major editing packages. 18x wide-angle lens Drawing on Canon’s broadcast lens expertise – and informed by the feedback of professionals – the lightweight 18x L-series HD Video Lens delivers superb optical quality. Unique Ultra-Low Dispersion (Hi-UD) elements are used to prevent chromatic aberration. Separate rings offer independent control of Focus, Zoom and Iris (F1.6) – with full manual control available, end stops are provided for the focus and zoom rings. 3x Full HD CMOS Full HD at 1920 x 1080 resolution is captured via three 1/3 type 2.07 Megapixel Full HD CMOS sensors – designed and manufactured by Canon in-house. High speed scanning minimises the effects of a rolling shutter. 10.1 cm LCD and 1.3 cm EVF The 10.1 cm (4”) LCD screen can be positioned either side of the camera. Offering superior resolution (1.2M dots), the Focus Assist tool helps achieve sharp images. A built-in Waveform Monitor (WFM) helps verify exposure and other shooting parameters. Alternatively, a 1.3 cm (0.52”) Electronic Viewfinder (EVF) is available. Variable frame rate A wide range of frame rates is available, from 12 to 50 fps. This gives cameramen the freedom to alter the capture rate for additional creative flexibility. Independent audio Audio can be captured via twin XLR inputs and also with the front-mounted stereo microphone. Custom pictures Twenty-six Custom Picture options can be adjusted to achieve the perfect look. These can be stored in-camera – via SD card - and settings can even be transferred between camcorders. Canon XF300 Legria HD Camcorder The XF300, one of Canon’s first file-based professional camcorders, combines an MPEG-2, 50Mbps, 4:2:2 codec with a Canon L-series lens and 3 Full HD CMOS sensors for superb HD video stored on CF card. Features: - MPEG-2 MXF recording to CF cards at up to 50Mbps (4:2:2); - Comprehensive NLE support; - 18x wide angle Canon L-series lens; - 3 x 1/3 type Full HD Canon CMOS sensors; - 10.1 cm LCD (1.23M dots); 1.3 cm (1.55M dots) EVF; - Variable frame rates.
description-en_US-mobile: XF300, 3x1/3''CMOS, 4"LCD, 0.52"EVF, RGB Prism, 18x, UDMA4 30-50MB/s, 1920x1080, 32GB, 80mins, USB2.0, HDMI, 9W, 2700g, black
name: Canon XF300

description-en_US-print: Share movies on memory card The LEGRIA FS305 records movies straight to SD or SDHC memory cards – easy to carry and ideal for sharing. Smaller, lighter The LEGRIA FS305 is the lightest, smallest digital camcorder Canon has ever made. That makes it a great companion throughout your day. Movies – in a snap Video Snapshot mode makes it incredibly easy to create movies for sharing with friends and family. Every time the Record button is pressed, a short four second clip is captured. Simply transfer your clips to a playlist on the memory card, select a soundtrack, and you’re instantly ready to play your movie on a TV – no need for editing on a PC. Four seconds is the average length of one ‘cut’ in a TV show, helping to give your final movie an expert feel. Sample music tracks are provided on a supplied CD but you can also load your own music to a memory card. 41x Advanced Zoom Letting you get closer to all of the action, the DIGIC DV II processor combines with the optical precision of a genuine Canon Video Lens to deliver the reach of a 41x Advanced Zoom. Dual Shot Dual Shot sets all controls to automatic, making the camcorder really easy to use. You can shoot high quality video and photos, without the bother of switching between settings on the Control Dial. IS with Dynamic mode Record steadier footage, even when you’re moving. The LEGRIA FS305 features an Image Stabilizer with a new Dynamic mode, which compensates for a wider range of camera shake. Pre REC In Pre REC mode, the camcorder starts recording three seconds before the Record button is pressed. These three seconds are automatically added to the beginning of each clip, so you can still capture the start crucial moment even if you pressed the Record button too late. True Wide 16:9 Record stunning, panoramic widescreen movies in true 16:9. Monitor your video footage the way it appears on a widescreen TV via the 6.7cm (2.7") 16:9 LCD. Intelligent battery and Quick Charge Shoot for up to 3.5 hours on a single charge. The intelligent battery displays remaining charge in minutes. When you do need to replenish, it takes just 20 minutes to recharge for an hour’s recording. Easy DVD burning Easily burn a DVD. Canon’s DW-100 DVD Burner (available separately) offers simple one-touch burning.
description-en_US-mobile: Legria FS305, SD/SDHC, 6.7cm (2.7") 16:9 LCD, DW-100 DVD Burner, USB 2.0
name: Canon LEGRIA FS305

description-en_US-print: CAMILEO P20 The Camileo P20 is a digital camcorder with Full HD 1080p video capture and a large 7.5cm (3") touch screen display for ease of use and intuitive menu navigation. Extensive connectivity is included with HDMI and USB ports for connecting to HD TVs and other devices. You can also upload videos from the Camileo P20 directly to YouTube, Facebook and Picassa in just a few clicks by connecting it to you laptop and using the upload button. All of this is housed in a ultra slim and stylish design which is only 22mm thick. Main Features: - 1080p, Full HD resolution. - Digital H.264 Full HD video camcorder. - Digital still camera. - 5 MP CMOS sensor. - 10 x digital zoom. - HDMI digital AV output. - 3.0” LCD monitor. - SD/SDHC card reader. - Video stabilisation. - Easy YouTube upload.

description-en_US-print: Simple to Shoot in HD - Shoot up to 2 hours of stunning HD video on the easy-to-use MinoHD - Carry it anywhere with its sleek and slim design that fits in any pocket or purse - Comes with 8 GB of built-in memory; no additional memory needed - Keep your video steady on the go with MinoHD’s newest feature, image stabilization - Power on, press record and start filming – it's that simple - Charge the internal Lithium-ion battery through the built-in USB arm; also recharges quickly when connected to Flip Video Power Adapter sold separately - Watch your videos on the large, 2" anti-glare color display - Connect the flip-out USB arm directly into your PC or Mac to launch pre-loaded FlipShare software - Use FlipShare software to organize and edit your videos, capture photos, send video greeting cards and create custom movies - Watch your videos on your HDTV by connecting your MinoHD to your HDTV with the Flip Video Cables HDMI™ sold separately - Features a flat-back panel with touch-sensitive, backlit buttons - Records high-quality H.264 videos that are compatible with most video-playing applications, including Windows Media Player, QuickTime Player and iTunes - Video: 16:9 widescreen, HD 720p (1280 x 720) at 60 frames per seconds (fps) progressive scan; recorded as MP4 files Simple to Share - Organize your videos by dragging and dropping into folders you've created, or use the automatic date-stamped folders - Edit and trim your favorite videos clips or even add your own music, all using FlipShare's easy editing tools - Create video greeting cards or use the Magic Movie feature to make movies with the click of a button - Capture photos using the easy Snapshot feature. You can grab a still-image photo from any of the 60 frames that comprise each second of your video - Share videos privately using FlipShare's attachment-free email or by creating Flip Channels; post publicly with direct video shares to Facebook™, Twitter™ and YouTube

description-en_US-print: Making a professional impression The HXR-MC2000E provides a professional look and shooting style which is ideal for weddings, corporate communications or education facilities. While light and easily portable, its full Should Mount design means your clients immediately know you mean business. Workflow flexibility is enhanced by the ability to record directly onto a removable memory card or a 64GB internal flash memory storage system in High Definition or Standard Definition. The latter option provides almost six hours continuous recording – perfect for those occasions where you don’t want to stop recording, such as weddings or business conferences. The HXR-MC2000E is designed to be the ideal, entry-level match for almost any type of non-linear workflow. It’s an exceptionally cost-effective production package for DVD or Blu-ray content, one that’s flexible enough to express your creative ideas and meet your client’s requirements. This product comes with PrimeSupport – fast, hassle-free repairs and a helpline offering expert technical advice. Which gives you the peace of mind that Sony is looking after your equipment, and your business.
description-en_US-mobile: HXR-MC2000E - 64GB, 1/4" CMOS, 1920 x 1080, 200 fps, 37mm filter, HDMI, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") LCD, 2.9kg
name: Sony HXR-MC2000E hand-held camcorder

description-fr_FR-print: Grâce à sa technologie avancée, le XM2 offre une qualité d'image sans égale dans sa catégorie Le caméscope numérique XM2 est un modèle de haut de gamme polyvalent, destiné aux vidéastes amateurs experts et aux professionnels. Ses technologies de pointe sont à l’origine d’une qualité d’image inégalée dans sa catégorie mais le XM2 reste un caméscope très simple et très agréable à utiliser. Points forts - Tri-CCD 3 x 470.000 pixels - Super-décalage de pixels horizontal et vertical - Objectif série L à lentille fluorite - Zoom optique 20x/numérique 100x - Stabilisateur d’image optique - Micro directionnel à 3 fréquence - 2 commandes de contrôle audio sur 2 canaux - Adaptateur optionnel MA-300 avec 2 prises XLR - Fonctions personnalisables Le nouveau Canon XM2 intègre les perfectionnements technologiques les plus innovants et dispose de fonctions et de réglages très performants, tant sur le plan de l’acquisition de l’image que du son. Il est ainsi en mesure de répondre avec brio à une multitude de situations de prises de vues ou de satisfaire la demande des vidéastes les plus exigeants. Son capteur tri-CCD de très haute sensibilité permet d’obtenir une résolution horizontale de 540 lignes et permet des tournages de qualité en conditions de lumière très faible. Le nouveau système de décalage de pixels assure une meilleure dynamique de l’image vidéo, notamment grâce à la réduction des risques d’apparition du phénomène de smear (raies verticales apparaissant dans les zones lumineuses) et permet d’obtenir des photos de haute résolution (1,7 millions de pixels). D’autre part, l’objectif professionnel série L à lentille fluorite apporte l’assurance d’une excellente qualité d’image, équivalente à celle obtenue en photo 24x36, et à celle de la TV broadcast en vidéo. Le XM2 produit en effet des images particulièrement nettes et permet des rapports d’agrandissement élevés sans risque d’apparition de l’aberration chromatique. La netteté est également garantie par le stabilisateur d’image optique qui élimine l’effet des vibrations générées par la tenue en main, sans incidence sur la qualité intrinsèque de l’image. Les enregistrements vidéo réalisés avec le Canon XM2 présentent une qualité de son à la hauteur de celles des images grâce à son micro directionnel qui enregistre très fidèlement les ambiances en stéréo et réduit nettement l’incidence des bruits de fond mécaniques. Ce micro offre également le choix parmi trois fréquences afin d’adapter précisément l’enregistrement sonore à la scène (normal, voix, anti-vent). Le XM2 dispose de nombreuses commandes manuelles et en particulier de touches permettant d’effectuer des réglages de couleurs et de luminosité comme la phase couleur, le gain couleur, le niveau de netteté. D’autres caractéristiques de niveau expert sont également disponibles. Il s’agit notamment de l’affichage Zebra indiquant les zones surexposées, de l’intervallomètre pour la programmation de séquences d’enregistrement périodiques et de la fonction Clear Scan pour l’enregistrement d’images affichées par un moniteur sans effet de défilement. Il est également possible d’assigner une fonction fréquemment utilisée à une touche personnalisable afin d’en assurer la commande immédiate.
description-fr_FR-mobile: XM2 - 4.7 Megapixels, 1/4", CCD, LCD, Mini DV
description-en_US-print: - 1/4" 470K pixel 3CCD with pixel shift. - Canon Professional L-Series Fluorite Lens. - 20x optical zoom/100x digital zoom F1.6. - Optical image stabiliser with VAP. - Direction accurate stereo microphone. - Two-channel audio level manual control. - 2.5” 200K colour LCD/0.44’ 180K colour VF. - Three shooting modes: normal, photo, frame movie. The XM2 improves on the market leading and successful XM1 in a number of key areas. It comprises of a brand new 1/4" 470,000-pixel 3CCD increasing image quality. Not forgetting a new manual control in picture adjustments and shooting adjustments even for professional users. Technology The XM2 includes a new high-sensitivity ¼” 470,000-pixel 3CCD for superb 540-line horizontal resolution and super low light performance. A new generation camera signalling processing LSI improves approximately 3dB in S/N ratio from the XM1. The result is an improvement in colour, low light performance, resolution and dynamic range. Pixel shift The XM2 is equipped with a pixel shift system that boosts both resolution and sensitivity and allows users to achieve superb picture quality results. Picture adjustments The following picture adjustments have been greatly improved in the XM2. - Colour gain adjustments, colour phase adjustments, sharpness adjustment and black level can be adjusted to desired value and up to 1 type of preset registration is possible. - Custom preset - after picture adjustments, settings can be stored as a custom - Slow shutter speed - XM2 can be set to slow shutter speeds to 1/6 of a second - Gain control - gain can now be increased up to a maximum of 18dB - Frame movie mode - frame mode can make progressive shooting at 25 fps. Footage with 1/50 slower shutter is very similar to fine cinema. - 16.9 guides - allows accurate 16.9 framing when shooting so that image can be cropped. Improved sound The XM2 supports a direction-accurate stereo microphone that includes two non-directional microphones to give more precise stereo reproduction. Users can choose three types of frequency characteristics for the built-in microphone: normal, voice and wide-screen mode. Additionally, a 2-channel manual audio level control where input level can be adjusted by a special dial and L/R level can be set for 2 channels. Audio-level meter with right-and-left independent 24-segment peak holder and the audio-level meter can be displayed in LCD and EVF. An optional MA -300 microphone adapter allows the simultaneous recording of 2 independent channels from microphones with XLR connections. A BNC picture Out Terminal is also present. PC connectivity The XM2 is equipped with a DV terminal for non-linear editing. By using a USB terminal, transmission of still images from a JPEG file to a PC is easy.
description-en_US-mobile: XM2 - 4.7 Megapixels, 1/4", CCD, LCD, Mini DV
description-de_DE-print:
- Dreichip-Camcorder mit 470.000 Pixeln.
- Super Pixel Shift horizontal und vertikal.
- Fluoritobjektiv der L-Serie.
- Zoomobjektiv 20fach/100fach.
- Optischer Bildstabilisator mit Vari-Angle-Prisma.
- Richtungsgenaues Mikrofon mit drei Frequenzeinstellungen.
- Manuelle Zweikanal-Tonaussteuerung.
- Als Zubehör MA-300-Adapter mit Zweikanal-XLR-Anschlüssen.
- Viele manuelle Einstellmöglichkeiten, wie sie sich an Profi-Modellen finden.
- Individuelle Voreinstellungen.
Der neue Canon Camcorder XM2 besticht durch modernste Technik und viele Möglichkeiten zur Beeinflussung von Bild und Ton.
Sein hochempfindliches Dreichip-System erbringt eine Horizontalauflösung von 540 Zeilen sowie hervorragende Leistung bei schwachem Licht. Das neue Super Pixel Shift gewährleistet einen größeren Dynamikbereich bei Video-Aufnahmen, verringert vertikale Schmiereffekte und ermöglicht Digitalfotos mit einer Auflösung von bis zu 1,7 Megapixeln. Sein Fluoritobjektiv der professionellen L-Serie liefert Kleinbild- bzw. sendereife TV-Qualität.Die weitgehende Korrektur der Farbfehler insbesondere bei langen Brennweiten gewährleistet extrem hohe Bildschärfe. Ein optischer Bildstabilisator sorgt für ruhigen Bildstand – praktisch ohne Qualitätsverlust!Dabei zeichnen sich mit dem Canon XM2 gedrehte Videofilme auch durch besonders hohe Tonqualität aus: Sein richtungsgenaues Mikrofon sorgt für präzisen Stereoklang und unterdrückt mechanische Hintergrundgeräusche. Es lässt sich zur Anpassung an die Aufnahmeverhältnisse auf eine von drei Frequenzen schalten (normal, Sprache, Windfilter).
Manuell einstellbar sind am XM2 Parameter wie die Farbphase, das Farbsignal, Kameraschärfe und Setup-Niveau. Ein Zebramuster markiert überbelichtete Bereiche.
Weitere Features sind ein Intervallometer für Aufnahmen zu vorgegebenen Zeiten sowie Clear Scan für Aufnahmen von einer Kathodenstrahlröhre. Eine programmierbare Taste beschleunigt den Zugriff auf eine von mehreren bevorzugten Funktionen.
description-de_DE-mobile: XM2 - 4.7 Megapixels, 1/4", CCD, LCD, Mini DV
name: Canon XM2

description-fr_FR-print: Objectif vidéo HD grand-angle de 30,4 mm Offrant un objectif exceptionnel de 30,4 mm, f/1,8 avec zoom optique 10x sensible et diaphragme à iris 8 lamelles, la technologie d'objectif vidéo HD professionnel de Canon permet de réaliser des effets de flou naturels. Capteur Canon CMOS HD Pro Spécialement conçu pour les caméscopes professionnels, le capteur CMOS HD Pro de 2,07 millions de pixels enregistre des vidéos Full HD d'une résolution native de 1 920 x 1 080. La zone d'acquisition de lumière des pixels est 160 % plus grande que sur un capteur CMOS classique, pour une plage dynamique plus large et de meilleures performances en faible lumière. Qualité audio professionnelle Le nouveau microphone haute sensibilité intégré est doté de 4 modes directionnels, pour vous permettre de capturer le son souhaité de manière optimale, ainsi que d'un égaliseur audio qui garantit un son parfait. Disponible en option, un microphone zoom vous permet de combiner deux sources différentes dans le caméscope lorsqu'il est utilisé en même temps qu'un microphone externe. Des microphones sans fil et Surround 5.1 Canon sont également à votre disposition. Mémoire de 32 Go et 2 logements pour carte SDXC Les vidéos AVCHD Full HD sont enregistrées à une vitesse pouvant atteindre 24 Mbit/s sur la mémoire flash intégrée de 32 Go, pour plus de 12 heures d'enregistrement. Les deux logements pour carte SDXC et la fonction d'enregistrement relais offrent une capacité suffisante pour vos projets vidéo les plus ambitieux. Potentiel créatif total La bague de mise au point de l'objectif assure un contrôle précis de la mise au point manuelle, tandis qu'une molette de contrôle personnalisable permet de contrôler les fonctions telles que l'ouverture, la vitesse d'obturation et le gain. Fonctions d'assistance de prise de vues professionnelles incluant l'agrandissement, la compensation et l'affichage zébra. Écran tactile haute résolution de 8,8 cm L'écran LCD tactile haute résolution de 920 000 points et de 8,8 cm est optimisé pour l'enregistrement en vidéo HD et offre une couverture totale de la scène. Par ailleurs, le viseur couleur rétractable permet de cadrer différemment. AF instantané ; détection de visages L'AF instantané assure une mise au point rapide et précise pour une qualité HD d'une netteté extraordinaire. La détection de visages optimise automatiquement les réglages du caméscope pour une mise au point et une exposition parfaites des sujets. Stabilisateur d'image optique Un stabilisateur d'image optique avancé garantit des vidéos fluides et stables, à chaque fois. Le mode dynamique stabilise les prises de vues en mouvement, tandis que le stabilisateur d'image électronique garantit des prises de vues stables en mode télézoom. Filtres Cinéma créatifs Libérez la créativité qui est en vous avec les filtres effet Cinéma intégrés. Faites votre choix parmi les 8 filtres de nuances de couleurs réglables pour enregistrer la scène avec un rendu cinéma idéal. La prise de vues progressive à 25 images complètes par seconde produit un effet cinéma encore plus impressionnant. Partage et téléchargement faciles Directement intégrée au caméscope, la conversion HD-SD vous permet de convertir vos vidéos en définition standard afin de pouvoir les télécharger et les partager sur Internet.
description-fr_FR-mobile: LEGRIA HF G10 - 32GB, SDXC/SDHC/SD, 1/3 HD CMOS Pro, 2.37MP, 10x zoom, DIGIC DV III
description-en_US-print: Designed to match the creative passion of experienced videographers, the LEGRIA HF G10 features professional quality Canon components and extensive manual controls for exceptional HD movies. 30.4mm Wide-angle HD Video lens Canon’s professional HD Video lens technology delivers a superb 30.4mm, F1.8 lens with a smooth, 10x optical zoom, and 8-Blade iris for natural looking de-focus effects. Canon HD CMOS Pro Sensor A 2.07 MP HD CMOS Pro sensor - designed and made for professional camcorders - captures Full HD at native 1920x1080 resolution. The light gathering area of the pixels is 160% greater than a conventional CMOS, for wider dynamic range and better low-light performance. Professional audio The new, high sensitivity built-in microphone has 4 directionality modes to ensure you capture more of the sound you want and an audio equaliser for the perfect tone. A zoom mic option is available and, when used with an external mic, the 2 sources can be mixed in camera. Optional Canon 5.1 Surround and Wireless mics are also available. 32GB memory plus 2x SDXC slots Full HD AVCHD video is recorded at up to 24mbps to 32GB built-in flash memory – for over 12 hours recording. Dual SDXC card slots and Relay Recording ensure enough capacity for the most ambitious movie projects. Full creative control A lens focus ring gives you precise control of manual focussing, while an assignable Control Dial allows control of functions such as aperture, shutter speed and gain. Professional shooting assist functions include Magnification, Peaking and Zebras. High-resolution 8.8cm Touch-screen A high-resolution 920k dot, 8.8cm Touch-screen LCD is optimised for shooting in HD and provides 100% coverage of the scene. A retractable, colour viewfinder adds to your shot-framing options. Instant AF; Face Detection Instant AF provides fast and accurate focussing for pin-sharp HD quality. Face Detection automatically optimises camcorder settings for perfectly focussed and exposed people shots. Optical Image Stabiliser An advanced Optical Image Stabiliser ensures smooth, steady video every time. Dynamic mode stabilises shots on the move, while Powered IS delivers steady telephoto shots. Creative Cinematic Filters Inspire your creativity with built-in Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 8 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect looking movie scene. Shoot progressively at 25 full frames per second for a more cinematic feel. Easy sharing and uploading In-camera HD-SD conversion lets you down-convert your movies to standard definition, ready for uploading and sharing via the web.
description-en_US-mobile: LEGRIA HF G10 - 32GB, SDXC/SDHC/SD, 1/3 HD CMOS Pro, 2.37MP, 10x zoom, DIGIC DV III
description-de_DE-print: HD-Video-Weitwinkelobjektiv (30,4 mm) Für profitauglichen Einsatz ist das lichtstarke HD-Video-Weitwinkelobjektiv (30,4 mm) mit einem 10fach optischen Zoom und einer 8-Lamellen-Iris-Blende für das Filmen mit einer gezielten Hintergrundunschärfe ausgestattet. Canon HD CMOS Pro Sensor Der HD CMOS Pro Sensor wurde ursprünglich von Canon für den Einsatz in seinen profitauglichen Camcordern entwickelt und konstruiert. Er zeichnet 2,07 MP Full-HD-Bilder mit einer nativen Auflösung von 1.920 x 1.080 auf. Die Lichtaufnahmefläche der Pixel ist um 160 Prozent größer als bei vielen CMOS-Sensoren, das sorgt für besonders brillante Full-HD-Qualität, einen gesteigerten Dynamikbereich und optimierte Leistung bei schwachem Licht. Professionelle Audioqualität Das hochwertige integrierte Mikrofon ist ideal für die präzise Erfassung von Audiosignalen. Mit vier Modi können Sie die Richtung für die Erfassung von Tonsignalen festlegen. Ein Equalizer sorgt für den perfekten Klang. Im Handel ist ein Richtmikrofon, ein 5.1 Surround- und ein kabelloses Mikrofon optional erhältlich. Die Tonwiedergabe von internem und externem Mikrofon kann im Camcorder abgemischt werden. Interner 32-GB-Speicher und 2 SDXC-Kartensteckplätze Der Camcorder zeichnet Full-HD-AVCHD-Video mit maximal 24 Mbps auf. Auf dem internen 32-GB-Flashspeicher (32 GB) kann mehr als 12 Stunden Videomaterial gespeichert werden. Zwei SDXC-Kartensteckplätze und Relay Recording bieten auch bei besonders ambitionierten Filmprojekten richtig viel Kapazität. Technische Details für Ihre Kreativität Mit dem Fokusring kann die Scharfstellung manuell präzise und punktgenau vorgenommen werden. Das Wählrad ist konfigurierbar und mit den Einstelloptionen für Blende, Verschlusszeit und Signalverstärkung belegbar. Hilfsfunktionen wie Vergrößerung, Peaking und Zebra ermöglichen Videos mit Profi-Look. Hoch auflösendes Touch-LCD (8,8 cm) Das 8,8 cm große, hoch auflösende Touch-LCD mit 920.000 Bildpunkten ist für HD-Aufnahmen optimiert. Ideal: Das Gesichtsfeld wird zu 100 Prozent dargestellt. Mit dem ausziehbaren Farbsucher bieten sich weitere Möglichkeiten zur Bildkomposition. Instant AF und Gesichtserkennung Der Instant AF übernimmt die schnelle und präzise Scharfstellung für brillante HD-Videos. Die Gesichtserkennung optimiert automatisch die Einstellungen für tolle Personenaufnahmen. Optischer Bildstabilisator Der innovative optische Bildstabilisator sorgt für gestochen scharfe Videos. Im Dynamik-Modus kompensiert er Verwacklungen, die beim Gehen entstehen; Powered IS sorgt für brillante Bilder beim Filmen mit langen Brennweiten. Kreativ zum Kino-Look Mit den neuen Kino-Look-Filtern lässt sich ein Kino-Flair zaubern, das eröffnet neue Möglichkeiten. Aufnahmen erhalten einen klasse Look. Der Aufnahmemodus mit 25 Vollbildern pro Sekunde sorgt für Videos mit echtem Hollywood-Flair. Aufnahmen unkompliziert hochladen und mit anderen teilen Im Camcorder können HD-Videos bequem in SD konvertiert werden. Das ist ideal für den bequemen und schnellen Upload von Videos ins Internet.
description-de_DE-mobile: LEGRIA HF G10 - 32GB, SDXC/SDHC/SD, 1/3 HD CMOS Pro, 2.37MP, 10x zoom, DIGIC DV III
name: Canon LEGRIA HF G10

description-fr_FR-print: Capteur CMOS Full HD de 3,2 millions de pixels Le capteur CMOS Full HD de 3,2 millions de pixels offre une véritable qualité HD et une excellente reproduction des couleurs même en faible lumière : vos vidéos auront fière allure sur votre téléviseur HD. Prenez des photos haute résolution de 3 millions de pixels par simple pression d'une touche. Le contrôle au bout des doigts Le fonctionnement est aisé grâce à l'écran LCD tactile haute résolution de 7,5 cm (3 pouces) basé sur les gestes, qui garantit un contrôle intuitif des paramètres — du bout des doigts — et simplifie la lecture. Zoom perfectionné 28x Rapprochez-vous de sujets éloignés grâce au zoom vidéo perfectionné 28x Canon HD. Double mémoire flash de 8 Go Une double mémoire flash de 8 Go vous permet de stocker plus de 3 heures de vidéo sur la mémoire intégrée. Enregistrez des vidéos toujours plus longues grâce aux deux logements pour carte SDXC ou téléchargez-les via la technologie sans fil grâce à une carte Eye-Fi. La fonction d'enregistrement relais bascule automatiquement d'une carte à l'autre dès que la première carte est pleine. Copiez les fichiers d'une carte mémoire sur l'autre et convertissez les vidéos HD en définition standard directement dans le caméscope pour un partage et un téléchargement sur Internet extrêmement faciles. Mode Smart Auto avec télé macro Enregistrez facilement des vidéos de haute qualité grâce au mode Smart Auto. La technologie de détection de la scène intelligente sélectionne les réglages optimums parmi les 38 modes scène. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à cadrer et lancer l'enregistrement. Enregistrez des gros plans extrêmement rapprochés avec le mode Télé macro automatique. Stabilisateur d'image dynamique Grâce au stabilisateur d'image électronique dynamique de Canon, toutes vos vidéos présentent un aspect professionnel, même lorsqu'elles sont enregistrées en marchant. Vous pouvez par ailleurs basculer facilement entre les modes Dynamique et Standard. Fonction Touche Décoration ludique Avec la fonction Touche Décoration, ajoutez des effets amusants à vos vidéos sans ordinateur. Écrivez des messages directement sur l'écran tactile à l'aide du stylet, ajoutez des marques ou des animations actives, telles que des étoiles filantes, et associez plusieurs images. Vidéos d'action de qualité exceptionnelle Le LEGRIA HF R26 enregistre des vidéos de qualité Full HD avec un taux rapide pouvant atteindre 24 Mbit/s. Vous bénéficiez ainsi d'une qualité optimale pour vos sujets en mouvement, ce qui est idéal pour les vidéos d'action. Vidéos courtes et amusantes Grâce au mode Instantané vidéo, la création de vidéos amusantes à partager avec vos amis est un véritable jeu d'enfant et ne nécessite aucun ordinateur. Enregistrez des séquences vidéo de 2, 4 ou 8 secondes d'une simple pression sur la touche d'enregistrement, créez une liste de lecture, ajoutez de la musique et votre vidéo est prête. Câble HDMI fourni Le LEGRIA HF R26 est livré avec un câble HDMI et intègre une connexion HDMI qui vous permet de lire vos vidéos sur un téléviseur HD compatible. Mise au point précise La détection de visages optimise automatiquement les paramètres pour une mise au point parfaite des sujets.
description-fr_FR-mobile: LEGRIA HF R26 - 3.2MP, 8GB, 1/4.85 CMOS, 20x zoom, f1.8 - f3.6, DIGIC DV III
description-en_US-print: The LEGRIA HF R26 is an ideal companion if you’re new to Full HD video. Features a Canon Full HD CMOS sensor, 28x Advanced zoom, Touch-screen and Intelligent Smart Auto for superb results every time. 3.2MP Full HD CMOS sensor The Full HD 3.2MP CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV. Capture high-resolution 3.0MP still photos at the touch of a button. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0”) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of settings and simplifies playback. 28x advanced zoom A genuine Canon HD video lens with 28x Advanced Zoom lets you get close to even far away subjects. 8GB Dual Flash memory A 8GB Dual Flash memory lets you store over 3 hours of movies to the built-in memory. Record even longer with two SDXC card slots or upload wirelessly with an Eye-Fi card. Relay Recording automatically switches cards if one becomes full. Copy between memory cards and convert movies from HD to SD in camera for really easy sharing and web uploading. Smart AUTO with Tele-Macro Effortlessly shoot high quality video with Smart AUTO. Intelligent Scene Detection Technology selects the perfect settings from 38 scene modes – all you have to do is point and shoot. Shoot extreme close ups with AutoTele-Macro mode. Dynamic image stabiliser Canon’s Dynamic Electronic Image Stabiliser ensures all your movies have a smooth professional look even when shooting while walking. Easily switch between Dynamic and Standard mode. Fun Touch Decoration Add fun effects to your movies without a PC using Touch Decoration. Write messages straight on the Touch-screen with the Stylus Pen, add stamps or active animations like shooting stars and mix in still images. Top-quality action videos The LEGRIA HF R26 records Full HD quality at a fast maximum bit rate of 24Mbps so you’re sure of top-quality footage of fast moving subjects – perfect for action videos. Fun, short movies With Video Snapshot it’s easy to create fun movies to share with friends - without a PC. Capture 2, 4 or 8 second clips with just one touch of the record button, create a playlist, add music and your movie is ready. HDMI cable supplied The LEGRIA HF R26 comes complete with an HDMI cable and a built-in HDMI connection so you can play back movies on a compatible HDTV. Precise focussing Face Detection automatically optimises settings for perfectly focussed people shots.
description-en_US-mobile: LEGRIA HF R26 - 3.2MP, 8GB, 1/4.85 CMOS, 20x zoom, f1.8 - f3.6, DIGIC DV III, black
description-de_DE-print: 3,2 Megapixel Full-HD-CMOS-Sensor Der innovative Full-HD-CMOS-Sensor mit 3,2 Megapixeln sorgt für exzellente Full-HD-Videos mit präziser Farbwiedergabe. Auch bei schwachen Lichtverhältnissen entstehen brillante Aufnahmen, die sich hervorragend für die Wiedergabe auf Ihrem HD-TV eignen. Bedienung per Fingertipp Das 7,5 cm (3 Zoll) große Touch-LCD ermöglicht eine denkbar einfache Bedienung. Einstellungen vornehmen oder Wiedergabe starten – alles erfolgt ganz intuitiv per Fingertipp. Canon 28fach Advanced Zoom Das original Canon Videoobjektiv mit 28fach Advanced Zoom bringt Sie richtig nah ran ans Geschehen. So halten Sie auch ein weit entferntes Lieblingsmotiv Bild füllend fest. Dual Flash Memory mit internem 8-GB-Speicher Der Dual Flash Memory Camcorder hat einen internen 8-GB-Speicher für die Aufzeichnung von mehr als 3 Stunden Videomaterial. Zudem stehen zwei Karten-Steckplätze für SDXC-Speicherkarten zur Verfügung, mit denen Sie nicht nur die Kapazität beträchtlich erweitern, sondern auch leicht das Videomaterial kopieren können. Ist eine Karte voll, wechselt die Relay Recording-Funktion automatisch zur anderen. Der Camcorder ist kompatibel mit Eye-Fi-Speicherkarten für den schnellen, kabellosen Upload der Videos ins Internet. Die Konvertierung der HD-Videos in SD erfolgt bequem im Camcorder. Smart Auto mit Telemakro-Funktion Smart Auto ist eine innovative Automatik-Funktion, die auf intelligenter Scene-Detection-Technologie basiert. Das Motiv wird analysiert und 38 Aufnahmesituationen werden dabei unterschieden. Im Anschluss wählt der Camcorder automatisch die passenden Einstellungen. Vorteil für Sie: Sie können sich ganz aufs Filmen konzentrieren. Für extreme Nahaufnahmen gibt es jetzt eine neue Telemakro-Funktion. Dynamik-Bildstabilisator Der innovative Canon Dynamik-Bildstabilisator kompensiert unerwünschte Camcorder-Verwacklungen. Zur Auswahl stehen bei der Bildstabilisierung der Standard- und der Dynamik-Modus. Ihre Videos werden brillant und gestochen scharf, auch wenn Sie im Gehen filmen. Kreative Dekoration per Touch-LCD Mit Touch Decoration bauen Sie ganz einfach tolle Effekte in Ihre Filme ein. Sie können beispielsweise Text mit dem Eingabestift auf dem Touchscreen eingeben, Stempel oder Animationen (z. B. Sternschnuppen) hinzufügen oder Fotos integrieren. Tolle Videos mit schneller Action Der LEGRIA HF R26 zeichnet Full-HD-Videos mit 24 Mbps auf. Ideal für brillante Videos von schnellen Motiven, perfekt für Actionvideos. Klasse Clips Die Funktion Video-Schnappschuss ist ideal, um auch ohne PC-Einsatz attraktive Videos aus kurzen Videoclips zu erstellen. Einfach Aufnahmetaste betätigen und schon wird ein Clip mit wahlweise 2, 4 oder 8 Sekunden gedreht. Anschließend Wiedergabeliste erstellen, Musik hinzufügen, und fertig ist ein wirklich verblüffendes Resultat. HDMI-Kabel im Lieferumfang enthalten Der LEGRIA HF R26 ist mit einer HDMI-Buchse ausgestattet, im Lieferumfang ist für die weitestgehend verlustlose Wiedergabe Ihrer Filme auf einem kompatiblen HD-TV ein HDMI™-Kabel enthalten. Personen präzise fokussiert Innovative Canon Technologien sorgen für wunderbare Aufnahmen Ihrer Lieblingsmotive. Die Gesichtserkennung optimiert automatisch die Einstellungen für ideal fokussierte Personen.
description-de_DE-mobile: LEGRIA HF R26 - 3.2MP, 8GB, 1/4.85 CMOS, 20x zoom, f1.8 - f3.6, DIGIC DV III
name: Canon LEGRIA HF R26
